descriptionHTML:
Er du træt af de gammeldags brugergrænseflader i ordlege?
Har du lyst til at opleve en ordleg på en helt ny måde?
★★★ Nu kan du downloade Ord Kryds og spille GRATIS på BRÆT! ★★★
 
Ord Kryds er en kreativ ordleg som udfordrer din hjerne. Spillet har alt hvad en ordleg skal have og er fuldstændigt VANEDANNENDE & UNDERHOLDENDE.
 
➤ Nyt & Friskt Look: Hvis du kan lide at spille brætspil og puslespil, vil du elske den rene og friske BRÆT-GRÆNSEFLADE ved første øjekast.
 
➤ Praktisk & Nemt at Spille: Du kan let swipe bogstaverne for at danne et specifikt skjult ord. Det er nemt at spille og sjovt at mestre for alle. 

➤ Overraskende Bonus: Log ind hver dag og få daglig bonus. Optjen mønter når du har fundet de Ekstra Ord, som ikke findes på brættet.

➤ Over 3.000 Spændende Udfordringer: Det er nemt i begyndelsen og bliver hurtigt udfordrende. Test hvor mange ord du kender. Flere baner er på vej.

➤ 100% Vanedannende Ordleg: Du vil aldrig opleve et kedeligt øjeblik! Spil dette krydsordsspil én gang og du vil ikke kunne lægge det fra dig!
 

☆ HVORDAN MAN SPILLER ☆

- Swipe bogstaverne, sæt dem i række og fyld de blanke felter lodret og vandret på brættet
- Tryk på knappen “Bland” for at ændre rækkefølgen af bogstaver
- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp


★ FUNKTIONER ★

• Flot & Rent BRÆT til dig (Følg med for personliggjorte designs)
• Find ekstra ord for at indsamle mønter
• 3000+ BANER som du kan spille
• GRATIS at få Daglig Bonus mønter
• Passende for både børn og voksne til at træne ordsøgningsevner
• Ingen netværksforbindelse påkrævet og du kan nyde ordsøgning når som helst
• Enkelt og nemt at spille, udfordrende gameplay
• Helt GRATIS for alle spillere
 

DOWNLOAD nu, træn din hjerne og bliv en ægte mester i ordleg på BRÆT!

★ KONTAKT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com

comments: Great game! I really love it and its great to play when you want to pass through time. My only issue i have is that my upgrades are so high that i go over the side barrier almost every time. I feel it would be awsome if, like bats, you could unlock new balls. Also, online leaderboards would be awesome, so we can see who holds the current record.

I started by liking all comments that said "too many ads" but after 43 i got the idea and decided to join in on the fun. Ads. Every. Throw. Would NOT recommend. Game deleted. (Without the ad spam this would actually be a great game! Such a shame.)

Game could use a little tweaking. Always take the extra coin as you will be looking at ads between each throw regardless. Had all bats unlocked in under 5hrs of game play. Most of those hrs spent closing and reopening to avoid ads. Great concept needs better execution.

A copy cat game that takes less then a week to beat. Has ads every game to get as much money out of you before you beat the game. All there is a dessert, town, and river. It just goes on and on and on repeating. Waste of time.

Addictive but short, yes there are a lot of ads but turn on airplane mode and they're gone. Easy fix. Watching an ad also doubles your score or gives you a free upgrade and they're 30 seconds so quit complaining...

Game's awesome... But you have to add more bat to the collection.. It took me 2days to unlock all the bats... Add more and more bats everyday man and one more thing it will be more interesting if you add powers to the bat..

comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five üåü s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

It's not everything I wanted, that's for sure. This is a great game and I really enjoy working aspect is fun. The rest is boring. Little customization for sim, cannot interect with others like I thought and have to level up to customize house which is sad. I wish we could start with a little more, even have to unlock our personality. Whats up with that? Overall this seems like a really good game but its not the sims I was expecting

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims‚Äô distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and d√©cor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims‚Äô lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims‚Äô appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. descriptionHTML:
Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell?

CREATE UNIQUE SIMS
Customize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.

BUILD THE PERFECT HOME
Design your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub.

SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE
Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms.

PLAY TOGETHER
Host and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.

There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!
____________

The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

comments: Better game than the other similar. I know the other game was first, but they want you to pay hundreds of dollars upfront so you start at similar pace as this one. Or wait long time, and span of that game is years! Whilst this game is fast to start, cheap, and at free play you can beat it in months, while if you spend a couple of bucks, you can beat it in days, at the most weeks. So basically they sell out this genre for a few bucks, and good riddance! It was fun for a few days, spend few bucks to beat it in few more days, or wait a bit. And thats that. It is, how it is suppose to be.  Edit: increased prices. $99 pack for similar $50 previous gems/$. No 8x multiplier now. No free multiplier in first buy. These games can take months to beat, maybe years, what I have done in few days. Dont play.

Omg ths game is so addictive, if you've never played an idle game then you'll enjoy this one. If you've played idle games then install this one anyway. Its so damn fun and as i said addictive ive failed all my GCSEs because i was just playing this for the entire time during my lessons. The graphics are phenomenal, and game play is absoloutly fantastic as mary poppins would say this app is supercalifragilisticexpialidocious. Developers please give me some tickets i need them this app is so good damn good i just need more i just need some not alot only a couple of thousand or so, so yeah not alot really please devs please. Again if you have not download it download this app is 5 star guarantee #NoNeedForGCSEs

EDITED REVIEW(new review first): game itself is pretty cool. There's nice bonus gifts that help get the game moving. Artwork is great. That ad with the voice over didnt do this game justice. Game gets 3 stars, ad gets 1. (ORIGINAL REVIEW) Saw an ad for this and must say it was awkward as heck. The voice over didnt seem like a real person or was too nervous to smoothly say the lines. Left an ill impression of the game at first glance. And while it did get my attention as ads are supposed to do, it's not a positive one.

I love who you added as the workers! I not good with comics or super heros but i think thats stanley? And i love how you added chef Gordon Ramsay! If you update this game i have 1 question, can the tech manager of the second floor be steve jobs?

Game is ok. Don't like that if you purchase items in the game and reset that you lose them. Spent money on crystals, bought multipliers and reset the game and lost them. AdCap let's you keep the items you buy, why doesn't this?

LOVED IT. It has so much to offer. The progress is really fast is the main reason I'm still hooked. It's not a boring old tapper game. It's really really refreshing. Not 5 stars because I'm getting used to all the things it has to offer. But still love it the way it is.

descriptionHTML:
Cash is the name of the game in Cash, Inc. the ultimate cash clicker game! Tap your way to fame and fortune and you’ll become the most popular billionaire in this business adventure!

Tapping money games were made for you, boss. Make money by clicking your way to the upper echelon. Tap to build one business, two businesses, three, and so much more! After all, a business tycoon has to start somewhere.

Click all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow.

The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you.

The idle clicker adventure to fame starts now!

Cash, Inc. Features:

TAPPING GAME THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!
• Idle clicker paradise - profit from your businesses without actually being there!
• Tapping will make you a fortune. Use your earnings to invest in various businesses and then sell them to win the public’s sympathy!
• Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:
• Click and tap to upgrade your businesses and keep the money flowing!
• The idle tycoon lifestyle means you get to manage profitable businesses while hanging out with superstars.
• Billionaire’s paradise: Lead a lazy, yet productive life while everyone takes care of you and your businesses!
• Make money while you renovate your business tower. More money means having better and more stunning tower appearances!
• Hire celebrities and make more money while enjoying your fame!
• Money is no object when you can earn free gifts from the Spin Wheel like tickets, crystals and time jump to build your riches even more!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH
• Rich List – Work your way up and join a community of business elites in the Cash, Inc. leaderboards.
• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!
• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

Disclaimer: Playing Cash, Inc. requires a secure internet connection.

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

Enjoyable game with challenging levels. Pros: levels won't tie you up so much despite difficulty. Gameplay is quick due mostly easy adjustment of delivery paths. You can also employ logic to help resolve route possibilities. Game does have ads, but they're not pesky and don't make you wait. Cons: Package drop circle toggles can get in the way of route-adjustment, especially on levels with many drop toggles. Suggested remedy: change the toggle-action to long-press rather than on short-press, allowing short-press to be reserved for route changing

Im not normally one for puzzle games but This game is great and addictive, haven't played a game quite like it. This game was done so well from the gameplay to graphics to controls, it is a really fluid experience and a great puzzle game, the new mechanics were introduced perfectly as I progressed and there was never a puzzle too easy or hard the level of difficulty increases and a good rate! Way To Go guys

The first levels are okay but after that there's a huge difficulty gap, got really frustrating. Controls are really bad. How I'm supposed to know where I'm taking the truck if my finger is on top of it?

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

This is a phenomenal puzzle game. It provides you with an incredibly simple concept that eases the player into the game's mechanics and turns into some very devious puzzles later on. The ads are a bit intrusive, being the ones you could accidentally tap on trying to remove with larger hands (like mine), and unskippable video ads that reward you with in-game currency needed to unlock levels, but those are never necessary, and for less than 2 dollars you can remove them outright. All in all, this is a charming and brain-teasing puzzle game that's well worth your time.
description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.2) Press play.3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:* 400 FREE levels* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans* Beautiful graphics* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!‚òÖ‚òÖ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ‚òÖ‚òÖAvailable In-App purchases: KING TRUCK* The premium version of RGB Express* Removes ads* Supports game development and future updatesHINTS* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.Please note:* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.

This is how you do it:
1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.
2) Press play.
3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!

Features:
* 400 FREE levels
* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
* Beautiful graphics
* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!

★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★

Available In-App purchases:

KING TRUCK
* The premium version of RGB Express
* Removes ads
* Supports game development and future updates

HINTS
* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

comments: It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.if you could just make it possible to win more often I'd play it more, plus give more bombs would REALLY HELP.

It's fine up to a point. The higher the level after 300+ it becomes too difficult and it forces you to spend money, which isn't that much of an issue till you see the price of the items, refuse to spend any money as it's blatant greed.  Probably uninstall if it continues like this

On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

I really enjoyed it up until I got to like level 118. The only way I could figure out the pass that level was to use the things at the bottom of the screen or the things the page where you choose what you want to put in there in advance. But if you don't buy extra coins then you can't either had moves or get anything that will help you along. Not to mention that 100 coins per item is a lot of money. When you charge $2 450 coins. I'm taking this game off my apps.

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

In One Line with One Touch you will find:
• Hundreds of challenging packs. All of the are free
• Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday
• Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!

Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?

You may have to walk away empty handed, forcing long wait times or for you to pay. Being able to play a game is the most important thing in a game and this one locks you out too often.
description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: Welcome to the world‚Äôs largest social platform for play. Every month, over 64 million active players come to Roblox to imagine, create, and play together within immersive 3D worlds built by gamers just like you! Already have an account? Log in with your existing Roblox account and play now!THOUSANDS OF USER-GENERATED GAMESEverything in Roblox is user-generated. comments: I gave it three stars because not too far along in the game, it turns into a "pay to win" game. Some boards simply don't give you enough moves, so you're forced to use coins to continue or retry and lose a life.  I don't mind hard games, but I detest micro transactions being needed so soon into it.. I'm at level 24, that's it, and already the board doesn't even give you a fighting chance to beat it without using coins.

Love it! It just needs some adjustments. Too many levels that are way too hard, that takes you 50 tries to beat when you only have 5 lives in the first place. And it should only be beat one level to unlock one task instead of needed to beat two levels to unlock one task. If it's going to take 2 stars to unlock a task it should be something big not 2 stars for unlocking a task for cleaning up a little mess!

Its a nice game! But it just takes forever to open a new level. Sometimes your on one for days. That's just to long. That's why I pay farm inland. You can play for hours with out bring stopped no lives. . I want a game that's fun and relaxing. No hard or extra hard ones. I really like cleaning and fixing thing. Be nice if you could do more area and less puzzle.

I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

This game is awesome. But the stars, please increase the amount of star not just 1. Make it 2 for the Hard Level. And lastly, it's hard to download new rooms when it always appear the Technical Error. Better if you do not require to download it and the user can open it without connecting to internet. However, the game is great for relaxing. Keep up the good work!

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com

‚Ä¢ And many other improvements

title: Homescapes

comments: The game is cool, however its doesnt always move to the lwft oe the right when swipe. A lot of times it will continue to go straight which causes me to die. I know its the game because its when I'm about to pick up something important or jump at a crucial point. Also this ismy 3rd phone and it does it on all phones. This error needs to be fixed.

I love the game. Been loving it for years. I've been noticing alot lately though that when I watch the ad video to double up on my mystery box, it's not doubling my prize. Getting kinda frustrating and just not worth watch the ads anymore. Can you fix this? If not, I more than likely will delete the app and free up the space.

this game is slightly good but  it is lost its priority to me day by day. initially this game was awesome but now a days it seems to me boring, authority takes this game only for business purpose. after finishing level 30 i lost my patience to this game. it gave more ad. but not increase their game quality. so finally i take decision to uninstall this app to release the space of phone.

Could add more city's it sucks revisiting and not getting new characters.. also the special city boards could have some special effects instead of ... I don't know... looking like a hot dog... what's the point. A hot dog with super speed and stay low would be ideal. Love the game, but to keep playing.. maybe give us something new. The only thing I love is wordy weekends. But only to get the coins back for what I spent on the characters

Sometimes, the game glitches and it's just very annoying when I have the super boots on and I jump on top of the train and then it glitches and the police catch me!  Apart from that very good game but I think the company just needs to improve the graphics...

comments: This honestly is an awesome game. The game itself is worth playing, but there is an ad every. Time. You start a new game. Im not exaggerating. That and even when you have your tower entirely balanced, one block, which should fit perfectly, falls and somehow displaces itself and screws up your whole game.

Great game but too many ads, one after every level or loss and most are 30 seconds long and the same few over and over again. Really annoying, to the point of unplayable. I don't mind watching ads but it was too much. Plus it's really unstable, like no laws on physics, it'll get wobbley even if you do it perfectly balanced.
Good game but too many ads. There is an ad after every time you play. It even asks if you want to watch an ad to continue, and if you say no it still gives you an ad. Also the blocks bounce too much.

The game won't load right for me, so I end up looking at the loading screen for a few minutes. I closed the app and restarted it, but it still wasn't loading. The game only worked once, and it was pretty fun, but the challenges don't work either. Improve the loading (I have great wifi) and make sure the challenges work, then I will redownload.
This game itself is really fun and I like it, but it has way too many ads. There's is an ad every tinge you lose and sometimes just randomly. On top of that, its the same ad every time.
I think the concept is great. But i only rated it one star, because it wont even let me play. As soon as i open the app, i get a black screen.

descriptionHTML:
Love puzzle games, but want something a bit more creative? Then look no further! Play fun puzzle games on Paint Tower!, the newest title from Gram Games!

Simple puzzle game with a twist! It’s your job to stack a tower of pieces, but it’s up to you to paint the pieces’ shapes. Match the number you’re given and paint a puzzle piece made of that many blocks!

Be careful, each puzzle piece will affect the tower’s balance. Make sure all none of the pieces fall off or it’s game over! Draw strategically, and do your best to keep everything standing in the new game Paint Tower!

PAINT TOWER! FEATURES:

Create a Tower
• Get creative! Draw different shaped puzzle pieces that matches the number you’re given
• Make sure you place the piece in a good spot or it can affect the tower’s balance
• Be careful where you stack your pieces or the entire tower could topple!

Tons of Challenging Puzzles
• Challenge your mind and complete as many puzzles as you can
• Each puzzle is more challenging than the last – stack your pieces and keep the tower balanced
• Go into the next puzzle thinking of what pieces you can paint!

Stack your puzzle pieces in just the right way so your tower stays balanced. Draw different shaped puzzle pieces and match the exact numbers you’re given. Complete challenging puzzles in Paint Tower!, the newest puzzle game from Gram Games!

Download Paint Tower! and try it out today!

comments: Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

Great app! Loads quickly, gameplay is smooth and intuitive. I also haven't found the different levels of difficulty to be repetitive, which is a good thing. I have found with other Sudoku apps, a pattern emerges from each of difficulty so that I almost know what the puzzle will look like by picking how hard it will be.  This one isn't like that thankfully!

Easy to use.   Love the pencil so you can mark choices.   Also like that it tells you if you make a stupid mistake like putting the same number in a column.   Haven't tried the hint feature yet,  but hoping it will help me learn when I don't see any options.

Definitely the best sudoku game ever. Tried downloading many others but kind of lame. This have 3 colours to choose. Pencil to write note and the level is very legit. I totally recommended this for those who want to play sudoku only okayüòè

Allows pencils marks and automatically removes them once a permanent number is set.  Has options to show when a wrong number is placed or not. Easy flow. Good game play. It has easy, medium, hard and expert levels. This is a good app.
Good game. Having a hard time not using some of the hint options, but it's helpful that I can turn them off by choice! Really enjoying computerized version üòâ
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active ‚Äì pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help ‚Äì it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features‚úì Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies‚úì Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go‚úì Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights‚Ä¢ More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid‚Ä¢ 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

The Oval, Office 701

title: Sudoku

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.

Pretty good game the Ads are insane and they want a ton of money per month to get rid of them. Seems to be the way all the games are going. For the Chinese new year could have mad a tuk tuk I think it's called a mini taxi. Or something cool for China.

Enjoyed the 1st game but, game 2 is pocket book wrecker, you can only go as far as you can pay to go. Everything is 4 times $ higher than it was in the 1st game and advancement is much slower. Just not that exciting for what it now cost, will probably uninstall soon.

comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. Sometimes I will go a whole day with no shields and the whole time I'm getting attacked. The other thing is the bonus spin. Never have I won more that 250k coins. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

Game is pretty cool but I won't spend money because what you get for your money is not worth it. They raise the prices of the chest to get cards and it's already hard to get the coins to build villages, get raided and attacked so much it takes months to get to the next villages. I hope y'all up the amount of coins on spins because it doesn't go up much at all but the cost of everything else shoots up like crazy.

I used to love this game. Even now I play this game everyday but I m getting sick and tired when I get the same card over and over. Even when I complete villages and buy chest I still get the same card. I buy all 3 type of chest but it's very hard to get gold cards. Most of the sets I need only 1 gold card to complete but it take ages to come...I m planing to uninstall it. And now I don't get any spins when my friend join in and the answer your customer support give was 'because one of my friend is a fake profile in my Facebook. How do I know if that account is fake or not? I invite alot of people to this game and how am I to identify who is real and fake...

Waste of time. The game is set up to try and get you to pay. If you don't, you get attacked a lot. Speaking of attack, your attackers are not matched to your level.  For every 8 coins you gain during regular gameplay, you lose 30 from attackers. In your frustration, you'll consider buying.  App trap...

Every time i get burn village within 1 HR ....and not get anything good point... See my point 382 and village7lvl.  ..but totally bad  to see others  points is totally low like 188 and her village 9lvl am totally disappointed on this game.... So I No need to play any more....

I would given 5 stars to this game. But from past few days I am not getting 40 spins as reward when my friends join coin master from the request which i have sent them. Its really annoying !!!!!!  I have sent so many mails to the support team but no one bothers to reply back.

descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top!

Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!

Spin to earn your loot
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!

Attack and Raid fellow vikings!
Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village!

Collect all the Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greater

Play with friends!
Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures!

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

comments: Dude it doesn't even work wow. A 13 year old made a game and even THAT worked you suck. (Edit) if I could put zero stars I would do it in a heart beat
Really great game! I don't usually write down reviews, but this game is amazing. The only bad thing is the bad hitbox of the nails. It's really tony. Other than that, it's great!!

It's a fun game... when the frame rate isn't terrible. My complaints are: the sound design is awful, it's very low quality; the music doesn't go for very long before it loops; the saw level doesn't have any good skins. Otherwise it's quite addictive, plays best with the sound off and the Wi-Fi so you don't get the ads (which aren't too frequent, but they're there).
This game is fun. It's a great time killer. That's what it's for. All these negative reviews are from people who play more in depth games. That's not the point of the game. It's relaxing.
I think it a good game going do.ewhere but fix  the bugs and improve the saw system plz and if your looking for a time killer this would be a good one
Simple yes, exciting? Not at all. Update games still simple and dull after 2 minutes
description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

comments: Only problem I have is an overabundance of chests that you get stuck with and can't possibly open them all on time and it makes you lose out on getting gold chests or Diamond chests. It would be really nice if you can choose to dump any of the chests you don't want. Or swap out the ones you have in stock for the newly acquired better ones after a ranked match. Other than that, awesome game

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!‚òÖ‚òÖ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ‚òÖ‚òÖKEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

Also TOYOCASH app is perfect for anyone in anywhere, who has free time but doesn't want to waste it, you can use this app while working, studying,.. simply earning points by watching advertisements

One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. Sometimes the touch is too sensitive. Sometimes the touch is not sensitive enough which forces me to drag the product into the production slot up to 10 ten times just to start production. I know this feedback is not much but maybe an undo button will help. It makes the gameplay million times difference if you  put your players comfort a priority.

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

They keep taking my diamonds and telling me I spent them somewhere. Like I spent 19 on fast tracking 1 Coco tree while I have Tom for 6 days and 102 Coco's in my silo then tell me they can't refund it because I'm a liar! They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

Good game. I initially wrote a one star review because this game was very dependant on microtransactions but it's actually pretty fun if you have the patience. Right off the bat you have to wait upwards to 30 minutes or an hour for basic production and warming but as you grow your farm it gets easier to deal with. This definitely isn't a game you can play for, like, an hour, consecutively, which kinda sucks but it's great for the 10-20 minites you pop in now and then.

descriptionHTML:
Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Grow and customize your farm
♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop
♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat
♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters
♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors

~~~~~~~~~~~

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Nice game Not true curling but closer then any game I have played so far and it's still fun.  There seems to be a glich where stones jump to a different position after the throw, but doesn't happen often.  There is no hog line violation and it's difficult to promote so most games end up being a culster f in the 4ft.  Once you realize it's a game and not real curling your addicted.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: Ads after ever single try, even if you only play for 5 seconds before you die. If you're trying to complete a challenge, every couple tries it will reset to free play mode and you have to go intentionally kill yourself which sometimes takes way too long. Then if you don't tap the challenge button exactly right, you have to free play again. Then every time you get back into the challenge screen, you have to scroll all the way through every one you've completed. The game would be fun if it wasn't so infuriating.

I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Why would someone only play one round of this fun game? Install this game to find out.  Hint: greedy developers like to hit you with multiple ADs between every attempt. These one-off games are only an attempt to be the next Flappy Bird, but with the most annoying implementation of AD serving.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.
description: Jump above the line to score, but beware! The higher you get, the harder the landing will be! Don't crash and keep it smooth!

comments: The game is good, but the multiplayer needs to be fixed.  It hangs on load and results in the player losing money or gems with no recourse.  It randomly drops ships, and when one player immediatlely gets the best ship and the other player doesn't receive any ship until 10 rounds later, it is impossible to catch up.  Fix the multiplayer, then you get your 5 stars.

Definitely not worth it. Was fun at first, but after the updated quests, the game took a serious nosedive in quality. Now you HAVE to beat the opponent in order to get anything, otherwise you're out 1000 gold. Before, you would get something just for playing. The new PvP just sucks.

I got a new phone and I installed this game on it and it put me on level 5. I was on level 32. I had 56 stars and my combat power was on 72000. If it don't update the game with my current data I don't think I am going to play it anymore. I don't want to star all over again.

Ok here we go I was looking for an updated space invaders game and I came across this game and I was immediately hooked so as I got up in levels I was getting upset I  noticed that this game got very hard to the point you need 2 buy items to get past the levels and if you don't have certain items you die right away..I don't like that you only have 1 life and once you die you either got 2 pay out money or watch a video either way this game takes something from you and the developers are getting paid..So once again this is a pay to play type of game..I understand that everyone needs to get paid but these store items are freaking ridiculous in the prices.. I decided to quit playing this game and find another game that's not so greedy.. If you got money to burn then this is a game 4 u..See ya

This game is great. Only issue I have is when you play online and it loads incorrectly or the other player times out , you can't exit without losing coins even though the other player never loaded. It's frustrating losing coins for no reason.

The game itself is modestly fun, but I gave a 1 because all the ads were very annoying. The worst!. At first it was a lot, like between EVERY TIME YOU CHANGE MENUS!!? ! But at least you could skip past it if you wanted to, or You could sit through 30 seconds to get another life after you died. But then it was changed so every time the menu changed you have to watch a 5 second add. It's very annoying and I do appreciate the free game but I will still rate it as a one because the adds are just rediculously excessive!!!

comments: This game is an entertaining and super relaxing way to spend time. New pictures are added every day, and there is a large selection of different things to color. I really like this app, and think at deserves five stars. To whoever is making the art on this app, it is really beautiful. If you are reading my review, (Wich you probably aren't) I think it would be really cool if you did some pictures from popular books and movies.

I love it very much. I also have some sugjestons to make. I think you should make categories for Thu pictures (animals,people,food,ect) and also have a daily challenge where you have to finish a picture (that you say) and we have to finish it. You would get a prize of a amount of coins and you could save them up to buy new pictures or tools like the bomb. But i really like this game. So even if you don't do my sugjestons I will still love it. ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

In my humble opinion, this game is truly a work of art and talent. This game can be used by people of all skill levels, due to the variations of complexity and difficulty within each pixel art piece. And it's just bursting and overflowing with hundreds, maybe even thousands of art pieces. There are hours of fun and relaxation awaiting you, and what a way it is to pass the time. Even better, it is appropriate for ages of all kind, including small children.Overall, I recommend this to anyone willing, for this is truly glorious.

AMAZING GAME! I am SOOOOOO HAPPY with this game! ITS SOO ADDICTIVE TO PLAY! SOOO MANY PICTURES TO CHOOSE FROM! THERE'S EVEN A TRUMP ONE(which is EXTREMELY funny)! THIS IS THE-BEST-GAME-EVER THAT I HAVE PLAYED!I LOVE THIS GAME SOOO MUCH THAT YOU, YES YOU, SHOULD GO DOWNLOAD PIXEL  ART RIGHT NOW! YES RIGHT NOW! SO GO AHEAD AND DOWNLOAD IT!!! (also this is the longest thing i have EVER typed on my phone!)

I love this game! There are so many pictures to color! This game will keep me occupied for hours! I just love how creative they are! But one question...Why do more pictures come by and take the place of my new colored ones? Like, why do more pictures come by everyday? It's kind of frustrating to color the new ones and then more appear the next day. Please fix, or stop the glitch. Overall, great game.‚ò∫

I love this game and both myself n my grandbabies love doing the pics. It would b awsome to have n categories or level of pic. Didn't know about the bomb and other help. I would also suggest to move or when u r doing pic for the back button n save button to hide . I'm always intrupting my pic by hitting the by accident . N also to b able to open the pic at a spot by touches instead of expanding pic. Expecially for more detailed pics. Love it Ty .

comments: Good game. Advert after every mission and some bullets can go through the guy you're trying to shoot at like a hologram. Graphics aren't good at all but you have got recoil and swaying scope that I noticed as well. All in all, pretty good game. Maybe add a toggle to gold your breathe in the future so that it doesn't sway?

The MOST IMBALANCED PVP game I've EVER played. It took me 20+ shot (30+ seconds) to kill 1 man. He shot me once and I'm dead. At least group the players by ranks (or by gear rating) to make it fun. It is IMPOSSIBLE for a non-paying player to kill a paying player. The PVP mode is a slaughter zone for paying players. What a ROTTEN game.

Listen developers, you guys should be honest to us, we download to play and for fun. But when we pass few levels we have to wait for upgrades, this game offer us such weapons which are out of our earning. This game should absolutely free, no premium, low cost upgrades, no boring ads . Either everyone will uninstall after 1 - 2 months. Guarantee

This is a great game but the bottom line is the developers want you to spend money upgrading. You get along so far upgrading with coins, which can be earned. Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck üòìüò™ Update: now I can't play even Daily Missionüò©üò§

It's a real fun game for shooting.  I am giving 3 stars because gears are very expensive. I have reached level 8 without buying anything because all my earnings are not enough to buy a decent gun. You want people to pay rather then buy through skill earned point. But still great game.
