comments: Transferring to SD is broken, yet again! Almost every other update re-enables transferring the app data to SD. Is it possible to have this feature permanent? Various updates regularly break it. The option is there, but it keeps giving a generic error message. It isn't my SD card, I have a genuine 64GB Samsung Evo Plus. It is definitely the app itself causing the issue, as I could transfer the previous versions fine. And especially as every single other app with the option to move to SD works fine. This is the only app on my phone with this feature that it intermittently doesn't work.
Amazing app if you are in a well populated area. Lots of fun interacting with other players of the community. Have made lots of friends!
Worst game when I was going to  sign in I enter all the things it always say that it is wrong password and username
I'm being forced to upgrade to a version that does not work on my phone. Kind of annoying.

Can you developers make it so people can trade pokemon and other things like items? Itll make the game sooooo much better if teamates could trade items and Pokemon. People did it with cards, atleast to trade Pokemon. My bf and i play along with his friend David and when one of them need something that i got and visa versa, we should be able to trade. If you guys can make it happen, ill give this 5 stars instead of 4.

Honestly i really enjoy the game thus far thank you for all the recent updates niantic... but there is one thing that has been bothering me and that is 1v1 with friends and trading... both features were shown in the original trailer... yet again i love the care your giving the game niantic i truly praise it but i would like to know whats happening with my 2 listed thoughts

descriptionHTML:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.

Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!
Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pokémon and items
Certain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger.

Compete in epic Gym battles
You’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers.

Team up to defeat powerful Raid Bosses
A Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own!

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!

Note:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of December 6, 2017.

One Ferry Building, Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94111

title: Pok√©mon GO

descriptionHTML:
Bemærk: I visse tilfælde virker Ramasjang appen ikke på Android 5.0 og Android 5.01. Dette skyldes ikke en fejl i appen, men en fejl i Android 5.0 og brugerkonto administrationen. Det burde kunne lade sig gøre at afvikle Ramasjang appen fra hovedkontoen på din enhed.

Besøg landet Ramasjang – de små børns helt egen legeplads, hvor de kan se tv og spille med de velkendte figurer fra Ramasjang. Her kan dit barn trygt og nemt hoppe fra det seneste afsnit af Lille Nørd til en musikvideo med Rosa fra Rouladegade og lege med sjove spil i Ramasjang.

Ramasjangs app er rettet mod børn i alderen 3 til 6 år. Den er gratis, fordi den er finansieret via din medielicens.

Indhold:
- Thomas på tur (spil)
- Luk op Luk i (spil)
- Robot værkstedet (spil)
- Mini-værkstedet (spil)
- Cykelræs (spil)
- Cirkusspil
- Sprinter (spil)
- I bad med Onkel Reje (spil)
- Robot værkstedet (spil)
- Ramasjang hospitalet (spil)
- Olines Ø (spil)
- Skæg i rummet (spil)
- Rosa fra Rouladegade (spil)
- Onkel Rejes Smadremaskine og Karatetornado (spil)
- Bamse (spil)
- Hr. Skæg (spil)
- Skæg med matematik (spil)
- Oline – Rend og hop (spil)
- Ramasjang Mysteriet (spil)
- Prutteklaveret (musik)
- Tv og musikvideoer fra DR Ramasjang
- Æggeur (sæt en tid på hvor lang tid dit barn må bruge ramasjang app'en)
- Kodelås til Ramasjangs web-tv


Rigtig god fornøjelse!

comments: Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¬§mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  üò¨ üò≤ üò† üòê üò≠  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

Great game in the graphics department however, I agree with other consumers when they say the special abilities you can obtain by playing this game ruins it. Simple is best and this uno app is anything but. Sometimes when I log in, the tokens don't even recharge overnight and I have to wait a few more hours before I play three free rounds of uno before you have to pay for more tokens. Very hit and miss app.

Okay, this is actually a decent game HOWEVER unless you buy your way through its almost impossible to win tournaments.  They shouldn't be putting people in the "club" and level 100+ with people who are like level 10 and not in this "club" it makes it almost impossible for them to win unless they're INSANELY lucky.  People with cheats can turn you from being at uno and winning, to being in last place in seconds and it honestly just kills the enjoyment of the game

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

The game is rigged for you to lose so you will buy gold pieces. I only made it to 300,000 gold before the bottom fell out.  Every match I played was against a person or computer that would hole out from 200yrds every time. Hole in one on almost every shootout. Nice game but very rigged no matter what the idiots from playdemic say. Better HONEST golf games out there. Funny I only rated it 1 star yet is has 4 stars. Also rigged

Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

First of all I love the game, I play every day. I especially love the tournaments. But now I have to congratulate you guys, you are brilliant. You took a push one button to go between guest and Facebook accounts, and changed it to pushing 20 buttons. And now you have to leave the game and go to the Facebook app to push most of them. Apparently you're not happy about two accounts. I don't know why, I spend twice as much money.  Tech monkeys, gotta love 'em.

Upgrade your clubs and unlock tours as you master your golf skills in the quest to be the Golf Clash king!   - Quick-fire 1v1 real-time gameplay.  - Revolutionary shot system that‚Äôs easy to learn but difficult to master.  - Thousands of live players online waiting to be challenged.  - Progress through more advanced tours as you ‚Äúraise the stakes‚Äù.  - Earn promotion in weekly leagues to win club card bonuses.  - Compete against your friends via Facebook to earn the bragging rights.  - Unlock chests as you discover and upgrade to premium clubs and balls.  - Save and share replays of your jaw-dropping shots.  - Banter your opponents with chat and emoji during the match!  - Advance through challenging courses and weather conditions.Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne
descriptionHTML:
The sun is shining, it’s time to play the real-time multiplayer game everybody’s talking about!

Game of the Year 2018 - Mobile Game Awards
Game of the Year - TIGA Awards

Play on beautiful courses against players around the world in real-time as you compete in tournaments, 1v1 games and challenge your Facebook friends!

Upgrade your clubs and unlock tours as you master your golf skills in the quest to be the Golf Clash king!

- Quick-fire 1v1 real-time gameplay.
- Revolutionary shot system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master.
- Thousands of live players online waiting to be challenged.
- Progress through more advanced tours as you “raise the stakes”.
- Earn promotion in weekly leagues to win club card bonuses.
- Compete against your friends via Facebook to earn the bragging rights.
- Unlock chests as you discover and upgrade to premium clubs and balls.
- Save and share replays of your jaw-dropping shots.
- Banter your opponents with chat and emoji during the match!
- Advance through challenging courses and weather conditions.

Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne

comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

Sooo amazing! I've only been playing for 2 days and I'm on lvl 10 üòÇ I guess it'll be nice if there will be more Clan activities wherein all members can participate to avoid being bored while wiating for upgradea.  All in all,  I love this!

Great time killer. The packs are expensive for the bs you get. I spent over $2000 on GOW due to the decent packs, but theres no way I'd buy any mafia city packs.
Micro transactions are distroying games in every degree. Hey production and promoting team, hang yourself. This game is garbage

Excellent game, very good graphics. I only started this to get tokens for another game. Wow, I can't stay off it. I now have my own crew and we are building. My advice? TRY THE GAME!!! you'll love it. I used to play iMobs on Storm8 but they shut the game down. This is better by a long chalk.

★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★
☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather.

Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work.

✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty.

✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle.

Excellent concept with poor execution.  The balance between chassis energy total, equipment slots, and energy used by equipment is hopelessly unbalanced. What's the point in unlocking a chassis with 2 weapon slots that only has enough energy to equip 1?
Had a 5 star before the update. Now it's pay to win. I get that you want to make money from your app but making the game worse than wanting money...poor business decision. Do not download.

It's a good concept but the developers have gotten greedy. The only way to win or advance is to pay money. It was a lot more fun before the update and the requirement to pay for any part to upgrade. Stupid decision, I definitely going to uninstall!

descriptionHTML:
Build your own battle bot and unleash its power in this stylish PvP game!

From the creators of the hit games Cut the Rope and King of Thieves, comes the most ingenious and stylish battle bot constructor! Join more than 55 million players from all over the world and become the star of the Arena!

Welcome to the streets of Mew York. Someone has to rule this place... Why not your gang‎?

Unite into powerful gangs, participate in gang battles or create a super-strong Ultimate machine to dominate the Ultimate League fights! Make every opponent bite the dust!

Features:
• Be a master engineer: design, craft, upgrade, and improve the Ultimate battle bot!
• Take the role of a mean street cat and fight against other players in fast and hilarious PvP action!
• Discover dozens of crazy weapons, gadgets and body shapes, including badass Ultimate Machines! Outsmart your opponents with your unique battle bot design!
• Create a powerful gang and rule the streets! Participate in gang battles to win unique parts, make new friends and share your secrets in your gang’s chat.
- KINGS OF THE CITY‎: Fight against real gangs from around the globe to conquer the city in this NEW cooperative game mode.
• Battle against real players and fight your way to the top of the World Championship!
• Bet on other bots and share replays of your best fights!
Get the game now for free and become the star of the Crash Arena!

Good game controls are set up for the game to play at a different location in Liverpool and Wales and the club has won the championship.

I absolutely loved the game, enough so to even pay for no ads, but it got rid of my highscore, all my hats and outfits, all of my upgrades, and just started fresh. Now I have ads again and I can't get rid of them even though I payed to have them removed. I feel ripped off. Edit: just lost my progress for a second time

It's a pretty solid game the only thing worth mentioning is if you could imply that when you win a shirt that you actually have to pay for it. After a level when it pops up it seems free and I wasted 400 coins on shirts accidentally. Other than that its pretty good

Great game, ads can be blocked without a connection to the internet, but if you're on a streak or attempting a challenge, using one for a continue is nice. I'm honestly addicted, shooting my little comrads to safety.

I truly enjoyed this game. I have been playing frequently for about two weeks. I loaded the game to continue farming for stars to see everything has been wiped as if I just freshly installed it. Seems I'm not the only one this has happened to. Developer: restore what other individuals and I have bought and achieved please. Very unhappy

This game does not have a casual mode so every time you play its time sensitive. This greatly reduced playability. Coupled with the most jerky aiming I have ever used brought this game down to a solid 2‚≠ê.
description: Tired of always losing at Hangman?Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!Gibbets: Bow Master, the sequel to the smash hit, gives you a chance to save the hangman's victims before they run out of breath! A truly innovative arcade puzzler where you'll have to aim your bow and arrow carefully to cut the hangman's rope without hurting his victims! Use all manner of bonuses and pick ups, warps and teleports, to help you on your quest. Can you handle the frantic pace and save the innocent before they take their final breath?

description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!
descriptionHTML:
Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING
Styling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.

DRIVER'S SKILLS
Upgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.

TUNING
You are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.

DRIVING PHYSICS
It's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!

Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

I kind of enjoy the game but would like it more if there were cheaper options to buying. After you buy some the prices jump to 99.99 and have yet to see cheaper prices. I'm not unloading that in one go. The people of this game would probably make more money if they bring cheaper prices. I would buy several different little packs that eventually add up to 100 bit you ain't getting nothing otherwise. Also wish you could buy more things with the gold you purchased. Like have a choice to spend loyalty or gold

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

The game is very addictive and fun to play. Some of the people playing the game are wonderful and fun to game with. Graphics are very good for a on line game played on phone, tablet or computer. The quests are challenging at best. BUT!!! BE WARNED... This game is not for young children as there is explicit language and cut throat people playing the game. After all it is a war game and nothing more. Now down to the nitty-gritty of the game. Yes it's free, but that only get you so far before you will need to buy packs in the game to advance and unlock the two new characters. The game quests are designed for people to spend if you want to get ahead fast. Large amounts of  $$$$$$ Cash are needed to play this game. $$$$$$ Personal note, I know people who have spent thousands on this game. Over all the game is great for young adults on up. PG-15
description: Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! Journey through vast kingdoms, gather magical resources, and build the strongest Empire in Final Fantasy history! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! Do you have the strength and strategy to control the Crystal and rule the Realm?‚úî Experience your very own epic FFXV adventure on your mobile phone‚úî Jump into the action with Noctis, Cindy, and all of your favorite FF15 characters‚úî Fight alongside friends and against foes in legendary battles against millions of players from around the world!‚úî Build up your large army and best strategy to win in real-time action-packed battles‚úî Create the ultimate Guild or join up with already-powerful forces‚úî Strategize with your guild to crush enemies and beasts in real-time battles‚úî Compete for the Crystal against players from all over the world‚úî Travel the Realms and collect rare resources to build an epic Empire‚úî Become a legend by taking control of the Crystal and ruling the RealmAn epic world with no rules: only magic. descriptionHTML:
Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends!

Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. Journey through vast kingdoms, gather magical resources, and build the strongest Empire in Final Fantasy history! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! Do you have the strength and strategy to control the Crystal and rule the Realm?

descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Excellent game. Best Idle, if not best game period on the market. Not really P2W, just pay to speed up. Heroes are amazing, unique and cool. There are also lots of other things to do besides just idle and wait to get stronger. So much content and you're given free gems from watching adds. Doesn't make you pay to succeed or have fun. Literally no complaints. And that's coming from someone that just in general has an issue with 99% of mobile  games. Download this!

Too much pay to win, free players hardly getting anywhere in the events and so fourth, not fair, increase the rewards of spending money and give free players more too easily solved, I previously rated it 5 stars instantly loved it but as I've progressed it's just not fair!! Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

Fun at first, but you have to pay a lot of real money for it to stay fun. Otherwise you have to wait weeks and months to progress. Some events can only be fully completed by spending hundreds of dollars (yeah, that much). Not worth it. If you have that much money, use it on something better than this. Improve your life, use your time better, don't waste it here. Good luck!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★Worldwide Arena★
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!

Contact us:
Email: idleheroes.feedback@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IdleHeroes
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IdleHeroes

descriptionHTML:
Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!

Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!

NAVY FEATURES:
⚓ New content every week
⚓ Build up your port
⚓ Themed events every month
⚓ Buy real historic ships
⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers
⚓ Trade with your friends
⚓ Explore unknown lands
⚓ Expand and manage your fleet
⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new lands

Start as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.

COLLECT SHIPS
Relive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.

DEVELOP YOUR PORT
Raise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!

EXPLORE NEW LANDS
Attracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities.

THEMED EVENTS
Vikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. Enjoy obtaining and trading with a few special commodities, sailing to shipwrecks for amazing rewards and much more!

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!

comments: The makers of this game have put their soul into it, bringing into life every element of the game. The characters are charming and beguiling. I'm in love with princess. üòÅ It's the only game where I've invested real cash, and have received  its full worth. The game is an epic. I love it. Cons: Although I've purchased gems, and bought legendary chests, I've only received relatively less efficient cards like lava hound and graveyard which help in game play only if complemented with other cards. It's a bummer. I think they want me to spend more to enjoy more desirable cards.

I don't think I need to 'review' much here. There are some points I definitely don't like about the game. Such as the matchmaking... You get matched with the same deck type in a row. Other than that and some minor flaws it's a great game. I love the competitive aspect about it.  Finally I would suggest some 2v2 with different game modes, such as ramp up 2v2. Also, add the rematch button in 2v2 challenges with random mates.  Hope I hit the 4,3k this season. Good luck to all clashers!

I think Clash Royale is a great game to play and is very well put together for all ages, it is a fast paced game and at the same time can be played with an individual pace of your own to a degree being that there is a clock ticking, also new characters are released at a well balanced rate, so that the game doesn't become boring and the regular balance of the characters strengths and weaknesses are balanced to make the game more competitive. I recommend this game for all ages and abilities. It's great for a few minutes or an hour or so and this game also has several different tournaments you can enjoy yourself or with a friend or a teammate. See you soon on Clash Royale. A.K.A. Dad.

descriptionHTML:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top

Buggy.  The game itself was pretty good but there are issues with the cloud save deleting peoples games + all their in-app purchases (like me). The support for the game is non-existent. They have one email address to send issues to, and it's been weeks, almost a month, since and there has been no response. So everything is gone and they can't be bothered to try and restore my account for a month.   In short, it was fun and addictive, but your game will delete itself eventually and the support staff doesn't care since they already have your money.

I would love to give this game 5 stars but 99% of the ground I've uncovered is covered by "treasure chests" and there's no way to get rid of them or contact the game makers for help. I've completely run out of space and can't play anymore. The chests should disappear after 3 - 5 days if they're not opened.

Love this game. Graphics are great and so much to do. Keeps me going for ages. Main concern and the reason I've not rated 5 star is the time it takes to get each token. When some levels take 7 and it takes half a day to fill up it's a major pain. Then you do a level that needs 4 and the next also 4 it takes the p*ss. Would be great to have a higher limit without getting charged or for them to fill up quicker. If this was done I would rate 5 star all round.

I am finding it takes between a few to about 5 times to hit the back button on my tablet. Plz fix, would make things alot quicker.

descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.

descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices

If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

I have now completed a 365 day streak... During this past year of playing this game daily, I've had an idea. What if once you hit a certain amount of streak days you unlock a new something? Like a new pack or flow color? That would be nice so that you are working towards something. :)

I loved flow free from a young age. I've played until 9√ó9 pack but when I reached a certain level,  the game stopped working after that and I've tried over and over again to go in but the game just keeps bring me back to the home screen and keeps stopping. Please fix it. I really want to play the remaining levels and packs

Great game. Keep coming back to it. I find it relaxing solving the puzzles, though it has become super easy! All versions are great. All in all, awesome job! One of my favourites, and works in any situation. Quick break at work, something productive ? Play. Something to do before sleep? Play. Got a few extra mins? Play! Wanna challenge yourself on timed? Play! Haha.

Addicting and Rewarding! Even if you don't buy the premium version, there are still a ton of free packs and plenty to accomplish. This game will keep you busy and entertained. I don't consider myself a puzzle person but somehow this game got me.

Flow Free® is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Flow Free features:

★ Over 2,000 free puzzles
★ Free Play and Time Trial modes
★ Clean, colorful graphics
★ Fun sound effects

Special thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!

Enjoy.

Compared to Idle miner tycoon, this game has lots of similar aspects, but the big difference in this clicker is that you actually have to give some thought into how you play.  It just isn't click click click.
I'm still getting used to the different types of production but I just started I can definitely say I will never get rid of this game so much fun!!!
No social networking or goals.... So kinda makes the game pointless.

comments: See the ad every time theres an ad playing so I said hey why not. The game doesnt even start. Lol what a joke. Maybe some marketing dollars should be saved and used for development. I am convinced your company has no financial, software OR marketing epertise. Lmao get ur old jobs if u can.

This is for the makers of this game you need to introduce rules so that players who either work for the makers or spend 100's to become strong very quickly... cannot destroy the enjoyment of the game for those of us who would like to grow in the game and play the game properly to become strong through perseverance and hard work... the cash rich players are ruining this game for everyone...

I love this game, good strategy and quite time consuming. Wish they would fix the glitches of it lagging out on world map and regular "initialization failure" when trying to switch accounts. Now, with this new update, i cant even play anymore; it just freezes up during the loading page...

Has alot to keep you busy. For that i give 5 stars. Minus 1 star because certain features in the game cannot be unlocked unless you spend money. To me thats a recipe for a slow death. For i will soon be leaving guns of glory in a blaze of glory based on that alone.

A giant mess of people who pay a ton of money to prey on anyone with impunity. Absolutely no rules regarding who or how often you can attack someone significantly lower in level. Even if you are stupid enough to pour money into this garbage, you will get your butt handed to you by someone else.

You guys really need to do some balancing. It's ridiculous that a level 22 guy can just annihilate me when I'm level 10. Its pretty blatant that you're trying to force us to pay to play. You should make it to where you can only attack X levels below you and the further down you go, the less loot/xp you get, if you attack even or higher you get bonus loot/xp. Good game but needs rebalancing asap or your game will slowly die.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the next stage of warfare with the free strategy MMO Guns of Glory! GoG’s thrilling multiplayer RTS gameplay lets you raise your own powerful army to shoot down enemies and team up with friends from around the globe.

In Guns of Glory, you take the lead as a rising Lord in a Kingdom thrown into war! To become supreme ruler and seize the Crown of Destiny from the devious Cardinal, you’ll ally with the famous Three Musketeers, slay ferocious beasts, build your own magnificent Castle, engineer an unstoppable Airship, rally with friends to destroy enemies, and more!

FEATURES:

Strategy Warfare! Train an army of loyal Musketeers, manage your resources, construct devious traps and raid your enemies into oblivion, all in order to claim the crown and turn your Alliance into an unbeatable empire!

Powerful Airships! In an era of emerging progress and science, shoot down enemies and lead the attack with deadly advanced aircraft for a new level of RTS warfare. How will you customize your own flying warship?

World War! Seamless chat translation features make GoG’s multiplayer RTS and RPG gameplay richer than ever before – making friends from anywhere in the world has never been so simple.

Immersive MMO World! Guns of Glory brings the world of the Three Musketeers to life like you’ve never seen it before! Gorgeously rendered HD graphics and vivid, beautiful landscapes make all the action in this free strategy MMORPG spring to life!

Advanced RTS Combat! Set your own strategy to attack enemies and aid allies! Guns of Glory’s strategy MMORPG gameplay lets you customize your Airship, Estate, troops, buildings, equipment and more. Develop a game strategy to fit your own style in GoG and claim victory!

Empire Building! Construct a glorious fortified Estate, master a range of devastating skills and arm yourself with indestructible weapons to ensure your survival and success in this world of multiplayer strategy war!


SUPPORT
Are you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/guns-of-glory/
Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/

www.facebook.com/gunsofglorygame

PLEASE NOTE: Guns of Glory is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Will you be able to claim Glory?

comments: Very fun and time killing. I play with my bf and 2 friends and we all try to beat eachothers high scores. It can be pretty competitive. Im prob gonna try to get more ppl to play with me too lol. There could be more variety in the blocks, and there should be like different modes, just an idea

Its cool and all but needs some extra features.  Maybe a way to store 1 brick for later or some level advancement.  Maybe challenges or a power up system. The game is addictive but its very basic. with no real progression path,  other than beating your own high score, it becomes boring.  Still,  thanks for what it is.

What they show on the preview and what it gives you in game don't even match. They make it look like it so easy. You cannot rotate the pieces. The pieces they give are so random, and most games you can barely get past a couple of turns before you can't place anymore and you lose.
Would like to sometimes when my score is really high get a second chance to redeem myself. Other wise I like the game - kills some time when neededüëç

This is very deceiving. It looks like it's Tetris, but it's not. The pieces don't come down like the pictures show. I hate apps like this who deceive people to believe its a certain game when it's not just to get people to download. Will never download a game from this developer again.

Love the game can't seem to put it down. Great time passes while you're waiting for your washing to dry at the laundromat, beats watching it spin around. Not happy with all the adds popping up after every game and sometimes in the middle of a game.
description: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
descriptionHTML: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
summary: A simple but addictive Puzzle game.
title: Block Puzzle Jewel

comments: Great game....way too many ads. I would pay for an ad free version since the ads annoy me so much that I'm going to wind up uninstalling it.
The game is great, but there are way too many ads, and you don't have an option to pay in order to disable those ads. It's just annoying
Not like actually playing a game of pool but more like a puzzle of trick shots, mostly just learning angles of every pocket on the table
Too easy, an option to turn off the direction the ball will take would make it more challenging
I like it.the way it makes me think helps me keep my mind moving forward.
Bored in 10 minutes... If you want to play pool...this isnt it Its just a game of trick shots.but if you want to practice before playing a real game its ok

comments: I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.

I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

comments: Do not waste your money on the game. I use to enjoy it and had no problem paying for things. I believe a company should make money if they do their job. Since it was sold to a new owner they no longer answer anyone's questions. They send you to a link that has everyone else scrambling for answers. They also do not replace items you lose when the game has problems. They do not care if you purchased them. The old company use to replace items and gold bars when it was the games glitches. They actually cared about the people playing it. The owners now can not even be bothered to reply. If you play it only get the free stuff. Do not waste your hard earned money on this game. They will not spend any time to make sure you get what you paid for
Why did bubblegum hill disappear in the middle of the day today? Also the power ups are not staying the allotted amount of time either? I've spent money on this app but won't spend anymore!

The game is fun, but customer support is terrible. I've had a number of issues with booster bonuses - infinite boosters are activated for 2 hours or more, but after a short time they vanish. I get no reasonable response, nor effort to make up for lost items, from support team.

Stuck at level 705 no more levels available? Everytime I load the app it tells me I'm not connected and to go online to download more episodes, I'm obviously connected on my device or I wouldn't be here.(update) Stuck back at level 705 again can't get past it to the level I'm actually at so annoyed, it's now been 20 plus days of this issue can't even play the game unless I want to play levels I've already done what is going on fix this already!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Yet another update and still the same issue, it's been a month or longer starting to think this won't be fixed total bs

theres a message saying cannot connect, download episodes...again. So I updated the app and it put me back to lvl 705 or something. Can you fix please?? I will give 5 stars. I was at level 1200 or so I think

Great game, however with the last update it will not let me move past level 705 even though I am on a level in the 1400's. It keeps saying it cannot connect and that I need to go online to update episodes.
description: Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

comments: Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

comments: Touch screen Pacman never as good as joystick. This app way too many popup vid ads. Graphics not the greatest either. But offers several additional mazes and options than standard Pacman layout. The constant forced ads cause me to close app and play something else.
Came for Sonic, stayed for a good game. I suggest adding new ways to use coins, like for different variations of pacman or the ghosts. The only complaint i have is the loading time is quite slow

This games accuracy is worse than my atari 2600 and is 1000 times worse than my 5200. It seems like in 38 years with all the technology we have today , someone would finally figure out that when you go up, You go up and not right and when you go right it goes right and not down. Not the case here. Man we have games that live life for you basically. But still cant figure out how to fix pac man. REALLY? And the ads an ad after every board. Ads ads ads and then guess what? Another ad. Very shameless
Great game but I'm a lefty so I pause a lot on accident. Messes up my game. Still love it though.
It would be nice if there were more challenges that utilize every level. Not just the same challenges and levels that I've already competed 5 times over

I am really surprised. The amount of new mazes I've never seen before just blows me away. Of course you can just play the classic version thats why I downloaded it but wow love this game. And you don't have to spend money unless you want to its very kick back. Adds of course but whats a dollar to you?

comments: I like it
Addictive

Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. Even if you don't mind to wait 200 days, you will not able to afford it (lvl 10 military Def, Atk, Health cost 100m gold each). DO NOT GO FOR HIGH MILITARY AND T4 WITHOUT FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE GAME.

Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 110 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆
Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!
☆ Powerful Heroes ☆
Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
☆ Master Your Strategy ☆
How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!
☆ Animated Battles ☆
Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!
☆ Choose Your Path ☆
Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?
☆ Summon Familiars ☆
Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. With their powers by your side, nothing can stand in your way!

Write your own legacy, only in LORDS MOBILE!

comments: This game is highly addictive. The challenges are hard but not impossible. You need patience...and planning. The Chinese new year's event made me used to the shortened energy usage, now that it's back to normal, just doesn't seem to be enough. But maybe that's where the patience comes in. Great game overall, really enjoying it. However finding copper is near impossible on any maps, but it's needed for a bigger backpack and what not.. this is a real pain in the proverbial but..

This game is very well made and a lot of fun. The graphics and controls are great and there are tons of items. The reason I only give it 3 stars is because to progress you need to build a chopper and you have to buy packs to get even a chance of getting many of the parts needed. Without it you simply cannot explore further. Seems like a very greedy way to set up the game. I've already spent money trying to get the parts and I'm nowhere close to being able to finish. Please add better loot and parts to the actual game instead of the store.

Love the game but it takes SOO long to progress anywhere. Plus I think there should be more 'events' popping up to keep it interesting and exciting. It gets a bit boring clearing the same forests and alpha bunker time and time and time again.... Other than that I do enjoy it. Have never had any issues with the updates either just thought I'd add.

This game is very fun and addictive! I got right into it as soon as i started to play. The only thing i would recommend is changing the price of the chests. I feel you would get alot more revenue if they were marked down. The game is going to be alot better when you open it up multi-player. Can't wait for clans.

Excellent game, but every single update comes with a glitch to my base.This time it seems that anyone could open my chest from outside a level 3 wall without breaking the wall. This is great for the raiders but not for me... hope they fix this bug,. Before I go raiding and loose  a lot of stuff.

The game is awesome! But collecting stuff like engine part , wrench,bolts are a huge headache . What do we need 20 engine part for building chopper [Bike] ????? Atleast be realistic. Soon i will be buying iphone so add a feature where i can link my android account to ios bcoz i got a progress of last 6 months and i don't wanna loose it..........
description: Last Day on Earth is a FREE MMORPG zombie shooter survival and strategy game, where all survivors are driven by one target: stay alive and survive as long as you can in this post apocalypse game and shoot walking dead zombies. There is no place left for friendship, love and compassion. A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a dead zone full of unkilled zombies. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies. Instructions for survivors: ZOMBIES AND ENEMIES EVERYWHERE!You are alone against other survivors and army of walking dead zombies and other unkilled in this free zombie shooter survival and strategy game. Shoot and gunship zombies and other unkilled to survive in this post apocalypse game or they will kill you.JOIN A CLAN AND GUNSHIP ZOMBIES WITH FRIENDS!Shoot unkilled walking dead zombies with other game survivors - it‚Äôs an effective war strategy for this free zombie shooter rpg strategy game. It is easier to survive in this post apocalypse game and shoot the walking dead together with other survivors. So join clans and gunship zombies as much as you can! KEEP CALM AND CRAFT! SURVIVALCRAFT IS VITAL!Improve your game strategy and survivalcraft skills and create more deadly weapons against the unkilled walking dead zombies and enemies. Choose a target wisely and shoot zombies or pull a dead trigger in wildfowl to get some food. EXPLORE NEW TERRITORIES AND SHOOT ZOMBIES!Search abandoned military bases and survivor‚Äôs camps in order to find and take the most valuable resources and deadly weapons. Keep away from the zombie frontier and gunship zombies to obtain resources.COMMUNICATE WITH OTHER PLAYERS!Use the chat. Information is the second most important resource after life in this post-apocalyptic zombie shooter rpg game. Join clans and gunship zombies or go to raid, clear new territories from the unkilled walking dead and move the zombie frontier. IMPROVE YOUR SURVIVALCRAFT AND STRATEGY SKILLS!Plague infection, wild animals, hunger, thirst and cold can kill you faster than a walking dead army. The world has turned into a residence of evil, where the plague infection rages. In this free post apocalypse mmorpg zombie survival game your own target is to craft more deadly weapons, shoot zombies and try to survive. Survivalcraft is vital for your strategy to survive in this post apocalypse game infected with plague virus and unkilled walking dead zombies. In 2027 an outbreak of an unknown plague virus infection wiped out most of the world‚Äôs population. The raging virus was named deadly plague infection. Meanwhile the pandemic of a new kind of plague virus carried away 80% of the population. Plague virus pandemic was turning them into hordes of the unkilled walking dead zombies.But the army of walking dead zombies is not your main problem. Many of those who were unkilled by the deadly plague virus will pull a dead trigger in your back. Stay alone or join clans to gunship zombies together. descriptionHTML:

There is no place left for friendship, love and compassion. A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a dead zone full of unkilled zombies. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies.

You are alone against other survivors and army of walking dead zombies and other unkilled in this free zombie shooter survival and strategy game. Shoot and gunship zombies and other unkilled to survive in this post apocalypse game or they will kill you.
