comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

This is an idle game with effort and pretty fun writing, with a lot of ways to feel rewarded without cracking your wallet. It's obviously not the driving game but if you want an idle/clicker, you can't really go wrong with this one. The character diversity is a genuine highlight more games could take a note from.

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

comments: Frustrating! Whilst it appears I have the tactical acumen of a cabbage, this game is frustratingly addictive! Only slight quibbles is the music is annoying so I have to mute the phone and it would be interesting if all the blocks were repeated in all directions. Ie 'L' shape on its left side on its door side, upside down etc.
Hate the update. Now can't play without any sound. Either have to listen to horrible music or stupid sound effects. Please fix immediately, I really enjoyed this game until now

Update sucks big time. If you mute the game, you'll hear music. If you unmute the game, you hear the blocks. The only way you can play silently is to turn off your phone's media volume which is annoying. If you cannot mute it ingame, why do you need that bottom then? üò¨üò¨üò¨
Update is ridiculous. If you press mute the annoying block sounds go but you get music!! If I press mute it needs to mute do I don't get murdered by fellow commuters on the train! Uninstalling now.

Latest update ruined the game for me. Deleting after playing a thousand times. Music? No thank you. Odd 3D squares? No. Strange animations and lights? Seriously? It was perfect, simple and straightforward... now it is ruined.

I like the new graphics. This game is a good relaxing way to unwind--satisfying after a day of working with difficult problems. Fitting puzzle pieces together and clearing the board is a surprisingly fulfilling task.

comments: Game itself is fine, just your average clicker. Word to the wise though... DON'T CLICK ANY OF THE 'NOTIFY ME' BUTTONS. They permanently enable notifications with no way to turn them off short of hardblocking them in your phone settings. A good amount of the 5 star reviews are very obviously fake as well.

Love it..ads add value worth watching!! Passed up this game a few times playing build away offered this for a prize and now I love this one n want to uninstall build away but want to see what comes next in both sooo I'll keep!!! Great game glad I installed!
The game is cool, but on world 69, i think it bugged and i stayed on world 69. Even if i tryed to destroy every block and moved on, it still will say world 69. Plz fix this
The game is good but the fact that there are no settings to turn the sound off makes is annoying and i wish you could costumize your Hero, like maybe to make it a girl.
I got addicted after a while and then I noticed that you play as Crafty Callum!  SO JUST LOVE IT
This is the best game ever I've only played it for 10 minutes and I love it. I'm glad you don't have to pay for it thank you for creating this game

Would rate higher but game constantly crashes not giving much time between crashes to actually get a feel for the game...  I know issue is not with my device seeing it is a S8+...

comments: The game is fun, but results take 2 and 3 days and if other people are on higher levels they have access to better tableware and vases, pictures etc, so their rooms stand out more and they have a better chance at getting 5 stars. And some items I've purchased don't work it gives a message saying they couldn't find it in the warehouse. But the game never gave me my gems back and of money. NEED TO FIX IT

I love this game!! "it helps a lot" with my shopping addiction because I feel like I'm buying real merchandise. I really enjoy the updates and how you guys added more room to be designed!!!! Also the 2d & 3d option to view products is awesome!! and if your  studying for interior design this is the app for you! I love the voting of others designs, you get to view everyone creativity. I really love how you guys never ask for an rating....like some apps by the 1st go you get popups please rate our app you guys never asked for an rating I choose to. Thanks for getting me addicted :))

I really love this game. I love voting and seeing what other have also come up with. I love that it is really world design where you can actually shop for pieces and not cartoon rubbish. However, I have had a number of issues where the game has had to restart and have even lost diamonds and cash after trying to collecting daily rewards when it re starts, watching endless adds and not receiving rewards for them or downloading other useless games I have no interest in and actually playing them to generate rewards and not receiving them either. These are my only issues with the game. Other than these it would be five stars.

Great application. Very enjoyable. Only complaint wish app had more international design furniture to match the themes and settings. Also need to fix the bug so that the design loading screen appears.  This is the only app that I have to reset my tablet to get my results, since the last update I have had this issue. I have made an inquiry adressing this issue and it still has not been fixed. I have changed my rating because of this issue, once it has been addressed and fixed I may change my opinion.

I love this game.  The only home design game there is. Glad that that they have added items to the shelves more realistic.  Sometimes I feel it is over designed.  I wouldn't always add that footstool or bench.  It is also difficult to play without spending money and I cannot afford to do that.  Keys are required to decorate properly (plants, decor) and can take a long time to accumulate.  This is my favourite game though and I will continue to play and patiently wait just do my best with what I have.  I do watch the videos to gain more keys but woe is me...

Great game! Love it! Only voting system is not accurate. I think  designs that not reflecting the theme should not get  5 stars. It would be nice to have experts inside the game who will review designs for THEME and reward those who follow the theme and get great result  in designing. I suggest to  give one point for those who is following theme, and get one point out if someone not. Fairness is important.

comments: Downloaded this through another app (free golden eagles) where if you downloaded and played this game, and got castle to level 10 would be rewarded. Sent off request to support a number of times with proof and no reply, and after a week still no reward.   So if you are downloading this to get reward from another app don't bother as you won't get it

The game has the same problems as the other versions. The events boost strong players which makes the gap in strength larger. The premium items are overpriced. Probably the worst I have seen, there is no protection for your silver. This means stronger players always have a reason to attack someone weaker and there is no protection in place after being successfully attacked.

Great time killer, I love the interaction and concept of the game. It can get a bit laggy at times and at it's worst, it will crash on you. The wait times are unbearable though. No ads at all since the first time I played too!

Too late to join this game. As soon as you lose your newbie protection you become a farm for higher level players, preventing you from progressing. Every morning you find all your resources pillaged and your troops dead or incapacitated. Maybe I'm just in the wrong timezone.

The game itself is great. Zero complaints there. But the fact that it I am unable to ever log in is infuriating. I've literally been zeroed out because the app won't let me log in... multiple times. It's absolutely ridiculous. Needs to be fixed.

Was never able to connect to even set up an account to try the game. Messages to support only returned with irrelevant form letters. Tried my Wi-Fi, data, and Wi-Fi at Att store. No luck and can't get an actual human to respond just a form letter telling me to uninstall, reinstall, use different Wi-Fi or get a different phone. All to try their game. LOL If that's the support you get when you are a perspective customer, imagine the "help" if they already have you hooked on their game. STAY AWAY!  (Galaxy S-7 Active Phone)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the ruthless world of Vikings, where freedom, power, fear and violence reign supreme! Become the leader of a large army, lead your troops to victory and prove that you are the mightiest conqueror among a million players.

Try on the role of a wise and courageous Jarl, respected and feared by all! Construct magnificent buildings, take part in victorious campaigns, train your valiant warriors and boost your coffers. The superb graphics, compelling story and dynamic battles will have you hooked from the moment you start playing!

Features:
✔ Stunning graphics
✔ Free to play
✔ Numerous troop classes
✔ Multiple language options
✔ Fierce and thrilling battles with players from all over the world
✔ Handsome rewards for completing a variety of quests and tasks
✔ Weapons and gear crafting
✔ Become the leader or member of a mighty Clan

NOTE: Vikings: War of Clans is completely free to play, but has optional in-app purchases for real currency. You can turn off this option or set a password in your device settings. You will need an internet connection to play.

Vikings: War of Clans is an exciting MMORTS with players all over the globe. We are constantly improving gameplay and introducing exciting new updates for you. Feel free to share your ideas and suggestions — together we’ll make the Viking world even more enthralling!

You are a Viking! You are the Hero!

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: This game is very fun and addictive but should have offline mode so we don't have to deal with a hacker every game.  Also after new update I'm having issues getting into the game. It says "check comnection" and my connection is fine even tried uninstalling it and all. Other games work on my phone and so does my Wi-Fi. The game just worked last night for me now it doesn't! PLEASE FIX!!

Please bring back the old brewery map. I have been a long time player of this game, and loved the original brewery map. The new update of the map is so radical that it feels like an entirely different map, with all the pathways and corners. The uniqueness of the original brewery map is that it is small, and relatively open, so that combat is focussed and fun. There is more time fighting others than moving around trying to find enemy players. The new update just ruins that uniqueness, making it feel like the Bureau or Legacy map. I am okay with the new brewery map being a new addition, but please make it "Brewery 2" and bring back the original Brewery.

Just good. This game is great. The controls are completely customizable so you can make it work the way you want it to. Graphics are on point, better than 2nd Gen consoles, lesser than 3rd gen. If this game came out in the age of the PS2 I would have bought it. Also, buy a box because this game couldn't have been cheap to make. This game should cost like $25.

Could you please add an offline mode...would be nice to practice on the go. Also please please please add more guns. I have been playing this game for a year and still no new guns but glad you are keeping up with the maps. I have this HUGE problem, it says check connection when I have good connection. I tried to restart my phone and reconnect but still doesn't work. PLEASE FIX.

I love C-OPS. It is one of the best FPS games for Apple and Android devices. It is very popular, few servers are empty. On lowest settings with 2 gigabytes of RAM, it runs at a BUTTERY 50 frames per second. Also, controls can be customized. I just notice a few graphical glitches.

I love the game, it's great and there's not many fps games like these for mobile phones. My only problem is I can never play ranked. For whatever particular reason I can't even find other players. The game just stays searching forever and I really want to play ranked. I would have voted 5 stars but thats the only thing that bugs me. Please fix and will be happy to give 5 stars.
description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt

Privacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/

Excellent fun and a fantastic way to introduce a new audience to some wonderful classical music as well as very talented contempory composers. My one gripe is that recently players have been given multiple oportunities to get 3 crowns or very high scores with ad powered resources. I feel this takes a lot of the challenge from the game. Anyone can get 3 crowns in 4 or 5 goes where us old guard of the game did if in 1 or 2 Still an awesome game though and well worth the download anytime.

descriptionHTML:
A Collection of
the best and most addictive logic puzzles
with minimalism graphics and unique level design!

"Puzzledom" merged best puzzles like Connect, Blocks, Rolling Ball and Escape which are easy to learn and fun to master into ONE game collection.
As a puzzle lover, you don't need spending much time on searching new brain teasers any more. We will give you a ONE-STOP game experience from now on!

"Puzzledom" collection currently has:
★★ Connect ★★
Connect is a simple game involving connecting dots with same color. When you draw the lines, please make sure the lines don't cross over each other. All the space should be filled.

★★ Blocks ★★
Blocks is a classic puzzle that you need to fill the entire board with different shapes of blocks. You just drag the right block, move it onto the board and match the right place. It's a perfect logic game for brain training.

★★ Rolling Ball ★★
Rolling ball is a path guiding game that you need to slide the blocks to create a channel which makes the white ball move from the start point to the end point.

★★ Escape ★★
Escape is a well known game called Chinese Sliding-Block. The goal is moving the red block to the exit. This game will test your observation skills.

★★ MORE puzzles coming soon★★
We are now working hard on developing new challenging puzzle games. Puzzledom will be the king of brain teasers!


FEATURES
• Tons of manually designed levels
Over 8000 free levels inside and more funny levels are under development.

• Easy but Funny game play
We only put best puzzles inside which will make you can not stop once start playing.

• Minimalism graphics
The art design is simple but beautiful. It's a game for all ages.

• Playing the game with your FRIENDS
We will support online rank list soon! You can challenge your friends by achievement and leader board.

• No time limit
Unlike match 3 games, puzzledom has no time limit. You can play it anytime even with no WIFI. You can use hints to unblock obstacles when you feel struggled in some levels.

Enjoy the game with your family ;)
If you have some good ideas about Puzzledom, please send us an email in the game!
developerAddress: 3 Garden Road, Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: 1.Add a new puzzle game
2.Fix some minors
3.Optimize the game play
Enjoy the game!!
summary: Get the most addictive, app store featured puzzle games in a single download!
title: Puzzledom - classic puzzles all in one

comments: Absolutely love all of the geometry dash games! Colors and graphics are awesome, game play is challenging but fun, and the music is perfect! Only thing I can complain about is that I wish all of the levels from these free versions were in the full version. I own the full version and would much prefer to be able to play these levels without ads and with all of the cool characters and colors I have unlocked. Other than that though, amazing work you guys, keep it up!

Woah. WOAH. WWOOAAHH!!! Oh. Another Chllenging game but thhe only thing i like in it tha it has Dantdm's Old Intro at the press start! Wow. I am pro at Geometry Dash Games and another one oh yea and there is Sub Zero(MK) name there like i saw them quickly. And i would say for the creator: plz. Creator keep the good work! Ok!!! And make more Geometry Dash and can u make something more fun for more people to play with!!!

Oh my god... This is the best geometry dash free game I have ever played,  and is almost more fun than the full version.  Robtop, you have regained full respect after what happened with meltdown. I'm just speechless, at the amount of work that was put into these three levels, going from the camera angles to the animations. This game is not like meltdown,  which is three short amateur levels, but with three long, harder levels. This game is like a preview to 2.2, and I know it's going to be good.  We'll done, Robtop! Keep up the great work!

This game is awesome!! Just one thing... You might want to fix Power Trip, because if you miss the gravity pad in the robot part it's pretty much an insta-win. I don't know if it was meant to be there but if it wasn't, you should probably put some spikes there or something.

This just blows my mind... one thing I would like to see in the future is some rob-top made tutorials on how each editing items works in the game so other players can feel more comfortable making their own levels and not be intimidated by all the other fan made levels... I am one of those players who is intimidated by the other fan made levels... This could help young and creative minds to create their own levels their friends can enjoy. Thanks 10/10

I love this game so much.  Some of the effects and colours added into the game make it so fun to play and watch. Its challenging and thats what makes it fun. Its not like one of those games that are so easy you finish it in an hour. This game takes time and effort. Also the backround music is pretty cool. Especially nock em with headphones. controls are very easy to use, just tap to jump and usually hold to use the vehicles, so easy! This game is perfect and absolutely fun. I would highly recommend downloading geometry dash subzero.

comments: It's OK I love to play the game when I'm bored and it helps me to be settled back and have a good time. But these all happens when I'm offline. But when I'm connected to Wi-Fi there's too many ads just slapped into my face. Yes I understand that you'll get these ads but ketchapp seriously,will you give and ad while I'm playing the game??!! It's too much for me. But still I love the game so I just play it turning my Wi-Fi off in my mobile.

Well before I say my review, I would like to clear out a few of the negative reviews. There are not very many ads at all, in fact I barely ever even get any. Second, the controls don't suck, they are just wobbly, but that is the point. Without the difficult turning, the game would be too easy. With that all said, this game is pretty fun.
I know people were asking for different controls, but the new tap contols are turning the game into something so much less original.  Why don't you make the steering wheel work like in real cars?
THIS GAME IS THE WORST!!! Save yourself some time and DON'T install this thing I can barely move the car so please make easier to control. I know your trying but I,m sorry I,m uninstalling this game.
It's stupid. It's really boring after your first try! And, when you come to a turn, the car doesn't turn fast enough. When you turn before a turn, it turns too fast. This thing is hacked.
Difficult to master, weave through the road and collect gems on your way. Simple and addicting. Ads get a little annoying and are placed in a bad way (bottom of the screen).

comments: Should be called adzy. During the level theres an ad banner at the bottom. At the end of every level there's an ad, some you can't skip and have to wait an entire 30 secs to sit through. To make matters worse, the chests can be boosted by 50% by watching, you guessed it, an ad.  They don't even give you a shop option to remove ads for a small amount of money or some sort of package. Pure plain greed

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

This game is simple. So simple that it is stupidly addictive at times when my mental and physical ability equates to a bowl of fruit. Nothing in this game brings me more satisfaction than the immensity of lag when bolts are caught in rapid bounce in a confined space. I say that with the utmost sincerity, no sarcasm at all. The lag is so intense, so joyful to watch. Please don't take it away from me. It is beautiful.

Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

descriptionHTML:

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
It is a great and fun game. Challenging and it works on your patience and timing. However it deleted all my progress for some reason and I lost all of the obstacles I unlocked, which was a lot
This is the best game to relax. But i have a problem i do i change the music there are some music that i like and i want only that to play so i request ro put a music option  Thank you

descriptionHTML:
Touch your finger at the point on the screen and slide on the line which is shown randomly without taking your finger back. The only work you need to do is to pass the barriers and keep away from the sides. That is an endless game with dozens of barriers! You will never get annoyed as far as you play that game. You can either compare your score with your friends or with other global players by Google Play Games compliance or you can make targets to reach. You can even share your score on Facebook or Twitter.

comments: I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

Uninstalled and reinstalled app because the update made it to where the game was unplayable. Went to login, using Facebook credentials. It says it failed because I would not allow them access to my friends list. Something doesn't seem right about that. Never had a game NOT allow me to login, after denying access to my friends list. Sorry, would prefer you not send messages to all my friends with my name tagged on it.

This is a rage review. Bc it crashes.  I've been playing the game for a couple of week. It is the third time I re-download it. The reason being is that when I get to a higher level tier and I am winning for some weird reason it crashes. This time I had a perfect unbeaten record and it crashed. Smh. What a shame.

I am in love with this game.. But the only bad thing happened today and I'm very disappointed. I won carnival cup so I should get the announced price which includes 2 VIP  cards also. I didn't get my prize and I'm really very upset. I have a screenshot of winning cup also.. I hope miniclip will help me. I'm expecting my prize from you. I really love this game.

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Borussia Dortmund, FC Zenit, FC Schalke 04 and more!
• Conquer an extensive Career Mode to earn medals!
• Upgrade your player and equipment and take on the world’s best!

comments: Such a Blast to Play. App never seems to grow boring like some other games. Also the apps not constantly hounding you to spend on Upgrades and Advances which is nice. Your character jumps higher, flips and twirls faster as U advance further. I play it once or twice a day at least. All in All a great/fun app....ENJOY !!

In this game once you have all of the flips it gets really boring. Also there are way to many ad breaks. This game was really fun but now that it's newer it's boring. It lags to much and kicks me out. I give this 1 star

Ads ads and more ads. And really pushy ads that you can't just close straight away too. You spend more time watching ads than playing the game, and honestly you can't advance in the game without watching ads for coins anyway, so it's basically an advertisement with a mini game in between. Scummy sell out app.

This game is great but I would only rate it a five if there were less adds. Every game I play, as soon as I finished it said "add break". This is very annoying as the adds are up to 30 seconds long. Please get rid of them.

The game desparately needs to offer more coins as skill level increases.  The frequency of coins remains the same while the skill level demands more and more coins (in the thousands).  Watching ads helps, but the player finds themselves doing that exclusively, which defeats the purpose of the game.  Physics, graphics and gameplay are good.

One Of My Favorite Games  So. Let me start of by saying I LOVE it! So I like very few games, in fact nearly no games. But this  game is epic! It's interactive, fun, motivate and time killing. But there is one problem and that's there are to many adds and most of them are inappropriate

comments: Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..üòâüòâ I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...üòÇüòÇ Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. üòòüòòüòò‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.

I really like this game. But here is why I gave it 2 stars.  I completed all of the challenges but still don't have have enough score to finish ranking up.  The 5 day to secret ball never works for me. It resets after 2 days even though I play everyday.  There should be a counter for how many times you switch lanes. Some of the challenges were impossible because you had to switch lanes exactly x amount.  Also I don't think you should have challenges that make you avoid getting the coins, because the whole point of the game is to win spheres and lanes...

comments: I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks

I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

I like this game, it's so cool, but, whenever you have to leave the match, it punishes you for leaving the game! You loose trophy's. So you can't leave the game if you don't want to lose trophys. Sometimes we often have to leave the game because other important stuff get in the way or our moms are saying that we need to get off. Having a punishment for leaving the game is the most unfair and cruel rule in this game. There shouldn't be a rule of punishment because they think if you leave the game, you are a sore loser. This needs to change, because we are not all sore losers when we leave the game Pixel Gun 3D!

Overall this is a great game but before i give it 5 stars you really need to fix a bug the matchmaking system. It keeps matching me up against a team who is almost 10 levels higher than my own, which means they get more health and have better weapons. This is making it really unfair.

This game has some faults (microtransactions and pay to win) but overall is amazing. Doesn't need a powerful phone to play, can occupy you for hours, and can help you meet new people. I got this game a month ago and haven't stopped playing since. This is one of my favorite games of all time, over all devices and consoles. I highly encourage you to download this game if you enjoy minecraft-styled graphics and multiplayer fps. And surprisingly there is a truck load of customization: Clan Forts, Home Base, Skin Editor, Armor, Weapons, and Pets. Sandbox has lots of toxicity but is tolerable. Overall 10/10 and a must-get for try hards and casual gamers alike.
description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

——————————————————————————————————

comments: Very simple. Gives me a lot of nostalgia. Two things though, it seriously needs music maybe some Celtic tunes or shanties. And secondly it needs more stuff to do. When I first saw a whale I was excited about doing some whaling but nope. The whales do absolutely nothing. Maybe even some treasure hunting puzzles or something. Good game just needs a little more content.

Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

please, please, please. update more maps or make it more challenging, ive already conquered all the islands and there's not much i can do anymore. so please, either more maps, or let others conquer my islands and let me reclaim it. i know you guys can still add up to this already amazing game. also, improve the controls, really cant see much when im steering. but over all, its a really fun, relaxing game. ;) thank you.

descriptionHTML:
Krydsord.dk’s nyeste app på markedet fokuserer på lette kryds & tværs opgaver. ‘Den Lette’ er til dig, som ønsker at få et dagligt fix af krydsordsopgaver, som kan løses på ganske kort tid.

Som det er tilfældet med alle de andre apps fra Krydsord.dk, er ‘Den Lette’ 100% gratis at benytte. Betragt det som endnu en gave fra os til jer. Og som med de øvrige apps, finder du ligeledes altid mindst 30 opgaver i app’en. Og der lægges en ny opgave online hver dag.

Opgaverne er udover at være populære hos voksne, velegnede til børn og unge der ønsker at styrke deres sproglige færdigheder.

Afhængigt af dit niveau, så kan opgaverne normalt klares på helt ned til et par minutter - netop derfor har efterspørgslen på disse nemme krydsord været høj. De passer helt perfekt ind i en travl hverdag, hvor vi af og til har brug for et øjebliks fravær fra vores daglige gøremål.

Krydsord.dk ønsker dig rigtig god fornøjelse med ‘Den Lette’ - husk også at holde øje med vores øvrige apps: Krydsord.dk XL (designet til tablets) samt vores ‘Den Lille Daglige’ som er mest velegnet til smartphones - nøjagtig som det er tilfældet med ‘Den Lette’.

Hvis du oplever problemer eller har spørgsmål til nogle af kryds og tværs opgaverne hører vi meget gerne fra dig på gert@krydsord.dk.
summary: Light and free crossword to the busy life. Always free, new cross every day
title: Krydsord.dk Den lette

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!

comments: This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

For a shoot 'em up racing android game it's really addictive. I'm always playing it. It's fun. My only complaint is the time it takes for the fuel to charge, 30 mins? Come on! Otherwise very challenging. Challenge accepted!

I really enjoyed this game until it started crashing mid game. Happened to me just recently and I wasted all my available fuel trying to frantically restart the game.  I was just completing the assigned jobs when the game suddenly stalled and I had to restart it again just to find it stalling again, all the while consuming the fuel with each restart. Hope to see this problem rectified soon, otherwise it's an enjoyable game nonetheless.
I enjoy playing the game. I gave you 2 stars because of one thing: the fuels are gone after I open my data connection even though it just got 5/5. Can domebody please tell me where did the fuels go..

comments: Definitely pay to win. When you scroll up or down it thinks you are clicking on something. Stamina is a nightmare as when you reach a high enough level that takes more xp to level up, you can't play for hours as it takes to long to recharge. Should make gems easier to get for non paying players so it is more fair. Other than that pretty good.

Dont expect any support for this game. I've been locked out and i am still waiting on a resolution, like many here. I've paid money and i know i wont be getting any compensation let alone how long its going to take to fix it.

One of the few games that I don't mind spending a bit i.e. $10+ every month. Requires team guild effort to achieve stuffs together definitely gives a good feeling. Event is weekly and community is lively. Card's artwork feels like Rage of Bahamut but using matching puzzle style to deal damage. Skills of card matter as well increasing the complexity and fun. Only thing to improve would be cheaper ingame currency to encourage more people to have better decks thus higher activity rates.

Number one of the best games I have ever played on my phone. I'm watching ads for bonus experience when sacrificing my cards. And I love the fact of that availability. Especially since it pays them which increases chances of more games like this one. Keep up the great work. Really helping my cognitive development of pattern recognition

Was looking forward to playing this game, but couldn't get past the first loading screen. Closed and reopened the app multiple times and the game would be loading and then freeze my phone. I enjoyed the interactive ads enough to get the game, to bad the ads work better than the app itself

Its a match 3, pay to win game with heroes. Its pay to win lootbox style pay to win mechanics enures that unless you are extremely lucky or9 intend to pay alot, you wouldnt win jack. The match 3 RNG can also make the game infuriating, such as when there is little to no matches or the matches are for colors which yohr team doesnt have. However, unlike other match 3 games, it is fun for longer.

description: Commander! They‚Äôre here‚Ä¶Battle is waiting[Survival]The Virus has gotten loose, and a large portion of the human race has been turned into mindless walking deads. Only a few of us has gathered enough supplies to barely make do on this zombie stricken land. Yet things only worsen as dusk approaches. We need YOU, Commander, Come train your Army, to resist, to Build your Empire and lastly to rekindle the dwindling flame of humanity.[Rebuild]The definition of humanity isn‚Äôt just survival, but to flourish, as soon as we regain our grounds, we need to take the next logical step. Rebuild.Roads, city planning as well as the strategically placement of every building and infrastructure, these essential duty are on your shoulders, commander, may our city be productive and prosper under your command.[Repopulate]As much as we want to ignore this fact, but there are still people in the outside world at risk of being devoured by flesh hungering zombies at every tick of the clock. They can be anywhere, and we MUST help them, not only is it the right thing to do, but they‚Äôll also be important members of our community, and eventually help us, in building, production and fighting off zombies as well as bandits.[Trade]Being isolated isn‚Äôt ever going to help the development, even if the world is over ran with zombies, and what‚Äôs the best approach to break the isolation barrier you ask? One word, Helicopters, Somehow in the midst of all the destruction, we managed to salvage a functional one, and it‚Äôs now at your disposal commander, use it well, so we may obtain and trade the resources in dire need for our survival, production and our future.After the dust settles, how will you rule?Facebook Fan Page: https://business.facebook.com/Last-ShelterSurvival-1052880828147974/?business_id
descriptionHTML:
Commander! They’re here…Battle is waiting

[Survival]
The Virus has gotten loose, and a large portion of the human race has been turned into mindless walking deads. Only a few of us has gathered enough supplies to barely make do on this zombie stricken land. Yet things only worsen as dusk approaches. We need YOU, Commander, Come train your Army, to resist, to Build your Empire and lastly to rekindle the dwindling flame of humanity.

[Rebuild]

The definition of humanity isn’t just survival, but to flourish, as soon as we regain our grounds, we need to take the next logical step. Rebuild.

Roads, city planning as well as the strategically placement of every building and infrastructure, these essential duty are on your shoulders, commander, may our city be productive and prosper under your command.

[Repopulate]
As much as we want to ignore this fact, but there are still people in the outside world at risk of being devoured by flesh hungering zombies at every tick of the clock. They can be anywhere, and we MUST help them, not only is it the right thing to do, but they’ll also be important members of our community, and eventually help us, in building, production and fighting off zombies as well as bandits.

[Trade]
Being isolated isn’t ever going to help the development, even if the world is over ran with zombies, and what’s the best approach to break the isolation barrier you ask? One word, Helicopters, Somehow in the midst of all the destruction, we managed to salvage a functional one, and it’s now at your disposal commander, use it well, so we may obtain and trade the resources in dire need for our survival, production and our future.

After the dust settles, how will you rule?

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? descriptionHTML:
In LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise, boys and girls can use their imagination to create their very own LEGO minifigures and fun vehicles like cars, helicopters and trucks.

Collecting coins will unlock LEGO sets in the game that can be built with a few easy touches – and which will become part of the game’s colorful 3D scenery for your child’s next drive-through.

Create & Cruise provides plenty of inspiration for real-life LEGO builds and imaginative play scenarios that you and your kid can reenact out at home – like how to mix and match your LEGO bricks to build something new, or how to interact with your creations. Play as fun characters like a ninja, princess, police officer and many more!

Features:
*No in-app purchases
*NEW levels with engaging scenery
*NEW models – which means fun new build and play experiences. Now your child can play with helicopters and big trucks!
*Minifigure selector and lots of creative vehicles to mix and match – the more you play, the more you unlock!
*Bright, fun and friendly animations and soundtrack
*Intuitive icons and navigation for easy gameplay – no reading or writing skills required
*Virtual building with LEGO® bricks
*No third-party advertising
*No links to websites

About LEGO® Juniors:
LEGO® Juniors is designed to give children age 4-7 a great first experience with the LEGO brick through iconic, fun and Easy to Build models. LEGO Juniors sets contain quick start elements and numbered pre-packed bags that can be built without help from Mum or Dad – which makes any small builder extra proud.

LEARNING MADE FUN
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is a free learning game for boys and girls. You choose your role, edit your character and drive through a fun and friendly environment. This game is a fun educational game that will allow your kid to develop his mind and motoric skills in one of the best education apps for kids.

BRAIN GAME FOR KIDS
This brain game for kids will develop your girl or boy and it is even fun to play by adults. It includes a “pretend play” feature that allows your creative kid to edit his LEGO character and customize it in an original way while cruising through the environment.

BUILD AND DRIVE
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is one of the trending apps and games in Google Play. Having more than 50+ million downloads confirms that this is one of the best games for kids in 2017 and can be considered one of the best games for girls and boys.

LEARNING THROUGH PLAY
Help your kid develop skills and understanding by playing the best game designed for kids by LEGO in 2016 and 2017. Creativity and play are the main values behind this game and it is a great experience for kids to learn and understand play on digital devices.

GAME WITH NO IN-APP ADVERTISING & GAME WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASES
You can be sure that your kid will be able to play in a safe environment. This game does not include any in-game advertising and parents can consider the app a safe digital environment for their kids. Furthermore, kids cannot purchase anything inside the app.

FAMILY GAME FOR PRESCHOOLERS
This is primarily an educational game for preschoolers because it helps them to play and develop their brain and skills in a 100% safe environment.

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.

Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.

description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.

THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!

♥ Join the fun world of Amy and help collect her precious toys! ♥

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. Crunch all the same colored cubes by using various boosters such as brick-busting blasts, rechargeable power-ups and many more!

descriptionHTML:
One of the best free games in the world, MY TALKING TOM HAS BEEN THE NO.1 GAMES APP IN 135 COUNTRIES! Play now and see for yourself why the game’s so popular!

Adopt Talking Tom as your very own baby tamagotchi-style kitten and help him grow into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat. Dress him up in different outfits and fur colors, and choose from loads of accessories to make him look however you like! Whether you’re a kid or an adult, there’s no end to the cool fun you can have with Tom as your virtual pet!

With this new update, TOM FINALLY GETS HIS DREAM OUTFIT – a fireman’s uniform! Now he can look cooler than ever before. And you can both have fun playing with his new interactive fire-breathing dragon helmet!

Join the fun now and play for free!

- PLAY POPULAR MINI-GAMES: Earn gold coins and have fun playing all kinds of games, from puzzle to action adventures! Rocket Fun, Tom Run, Flappy Tom, Happy Connect, Bubble Shooter, Rainbows, Brick Blast and more are all free to play!

- NURTURE YOUR VERY OWN TOM: Name him, feed him his favorite foods, play with him, tuck him into bed, and watch him grow from a cute baby to a fun kid, and finally into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat.

- TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD: Collect your tickets and fly to meet other Toms. Fill your album with postcards from different places and unlock clothes fit for a true adventurer.

- UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY: Customize your very own Tom by choosing from thousands of combinations of furs, outfits, and accessories. Decorate his home and choose the best furniture to make his house look cool.

- INTERACT WITH TOM: Talk and Tom repeats everything you say. Poke, stroke and tickle him, and watch how he responds.

- ENJOY LIFELIKE EMOTIONS: Tom can be happy, hungry , sleepy, bored... The list goes on! His emotions change based on how you play with him.

- GET REWARDS AS YOU PROGRESS: Help Tom grow through 9 different stages and 999 levels, unlocking new items and coins as you go!

***Take good care of your favorite virtual pet, Talking Tom, and make him a part of your life!***

Download the game now!


This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: After last update, the game added 2 losses to my running score  It seems to hang up way to many times. I have  slowed playing, and viewing all the ad's. I have have now stoped playing Trivia Crack. You must tighten up your App. Over the last 2 weeks, Trivia Crack has added 4 losses to my running score. I stopped playing for a week, and it still added more losses to my record. Fix it and give me my correct score  I will not play this game again in any form, and watch your endless ad's until my score is corrected.

I generally like it, but it keeps having freezing moments. Right now it's trying to load an ad so I can continue on with playing, but it's been doing that for 5 minutes now. That has been a continued problem to where I lose my progress. I will also add the too many ads problem. Whenever you want to do anything, it's all ads based. I probably spend most of my time on the game watching ads rather than actually playing the game. I just downloaded today and that's already getting old. I like the concept of the game but needs adjustments.

Would probably give more stars if I could play. When I try to sign up via Facebook it says the date and time on my device are incorrect (???) And when I try to sign up with emial it says there's a problem with my internet connection. (Hint: there's not).

TOO MANY ADS. I get you need to have SOME, but for every 5 seconds of gameplay you get 7-30 seconds of ADS. I got one question wrong and had to sit through a 30 second ad. Its really annoying I just wanna answer some trivia but every 10 seconds I literally have to watch an ad.

Actual trash sometimes. Ill tap to watch a video to get another chance but it just completely ignores that I've watched it and ends my turn and to make matters worse, it plays an ad after that as well. Figure it out
It is fun to test your knowledge against others. Most likely the best game app I've ever used. It's been kind of skipping  on me lately, could be my phone?

descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ Take a crack at Google Play’s most downloaded trivia game!

Step up your quiz game answering fun general knowledge trivia questions!
Love games with friends? Challenge friends and family to fun trivia questions! Prove you are the smartest one not only by answering trivial questions, but by suggesting multiple-choice questions.
Show the world how clever you are while you learn new and interesting facts with the world’s best trivia app. Be the star of these quizzes!

Test your knowledge in six different categories led by exciting characters. Spin Willy the Wheel and let fate decide where to start your quiz question game.
• Can’t get enough trivia for road trips? Tito will show you the ways of the world through Geography and share his world-class knowledge. Can you guess which country has a city called Batman? Did you know that the unicorn is Scotland’s national animal?
• Albert is the go to guy when it comes to Science. If you love good trivia questions, he can quiz you on math, chemistry, physics and even technology!
• Hector will defend your honour through the ages and make sure you’re aware of all major historic events. Make your mark in History by overthrowing your opponents in a duel.
• Are you MVP material? Bonzo can keep you in shape for the upcoming seasons with sport trivia.
• Can you tell the difference between a Van Gogh and a Monet? Let Tina test your knowledge of Art.
• Spoiler alert! Pop will keep you up to date with fun trivia questions on anything Entertainment related. Prove your knowledge of the latest TV shows, videogames, movies and music.

Have we mentioned that you are in charge of the content?
• Know any interesting facts? Show other users what you’re made of by creating questions. Make this game even better by introducing new and exciting content.
• Speak multiple languages? Prove your linguistic skills and make the content in your language even richer by translating.
• You’re the boss! Decide and improve what makes it into the game by rating questions made by other users.

New to the game?
1. Spin the wheel: We’ll quiz you on one of our six categories. Answer correctly so you don't miss your turn!
2. Fill the Crown gauge: Get a character by landing the wheel on the Crown section, or answer three questions correctly.
3. Collect the characters: Win them by answering three questions correctly or challenging your opponent to a duel to snatch one of theirs! Get all six characters to win the match!

Other features!
• Visit Trivia Rush to place your bet and play with your opponent in a real-time, trivia question of the day challenge. But stick around, there’s Tournaments every week!
• Play Single Player Mode to answer questions non-stop and beat your high-score. No turns, no waits, enjoy trivia of the day at your own pace!
• Win our biggest rewards ever with Missions!
• Go on a Treasure Hunt! Collect answers to progress through the map and dig up amazing prizes!

Spectacular social extras:
• Check your quiz games ranking and see if you can get more correct answers than your friends
• Share your progress through social networks.
• Chat with friends, family or random opponents.
• Collect fun character cards and win rewards.

Gain an extra edge with Power Ups
• Use Bombs to remove two incorrect answers.
• Don’t think you’ll get the question right the first time around? Don’t worry, use Double chance to get another go.
• Quizzes & questions too difficult? Use Skip to go to the next one.

Have any questions or concerns? Check our Support page!
http://support.etermax.com/customer/en/portal/articles

Don’t miss a beat! Follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/triviacrack
- Twitter: @triviacrack
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/triviacrack
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/TriviaCrackOfficial
- Google+: https://plus.google.com/+TriviaCrackOfficial/
developerAddress: Capdevila 3448, C1431FKP, Buenos Aires, Argentina

‚óâ Bug fixes
summary: Have fun and learn something new while playing world's most popular trivia game!
title: Trivia Crack

Download now, paint by number and release your inner artist and re pixel mania! **Simple and QuickColor by numbers as known as pixel coloring or sand box coloring is the new trend, but what makes Voxel unique is that you can paint by number in 3D. Choose from a variety of beautiful 3D templates, follow the numbers and color box, and bring these color block to life! Try to rotate the screen and enjoy the beautiful 3D pixel art. **Stress Relief and addictiveMany grown-ups do pixel coloring to anti stress, since number coloring book is like a pixel art therapy.
