descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

comments: I like this game, I really do. It is intense and fun, but the ads are a little too intrusive, if I connect to a game and the players disconnects before the map starts - you get an ad. I do understand that the game is free and all and I want the game to have ads to support the game, but this game has the most ads of any other game I know, so please atleast have a limit to the ads shown a day or have it shown every 2 games. Also I think it would be cool to have an option to watch a couple of ads to get a club ticket or have it to speed up the 24 hour cool down on the club arenas. Overall this game is really fun and I hope Ninja Kiwi keeps improving it.

The only thing I do not like is how you need the vip membership to use the special modes, which I get you guys need money to keep it going but I think like one day a week there it should he free for that day or and hour or two. Keep up the good work Ninja Kiwi üòä

You have hackers playing this game. I just played a game against a guy who ballons kept passing all his towers but no points came out of his health. I rember why I delted this game in first place. I could have a ton of gallons go thru people's line and they not lose health.

FORCED ADS! I loved playing this game for years but had to bring the rating down atleast one star because of the forced ads that I usually refuse to watch in games. So now my sessions playing this game end as soon as an ad shows up. Very disappointed.

It is very fun, but if you chose to do a match with the modifiers that make it way more fun, which are the ones where you pay medalions to join,  if your opponent has a high win rate, expect them to try to kill you as soon as they can. It would be nice to have modes where there are the fun modifiers but medalions aren't on the line.

What happened? For some reason, when I just updated the app, I am stuck at downloading vital information on the screen, but stays there. What did you do Ninja Kiwi? This update ruined me! Was 5 star, but now only 3-4 to the update that failed me.     Edit: I deleted the app and reinstalled it and now it is finally working again!
description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play‚Äôs Festive Updates.Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses. Check out these awesome features! * Head-to-head two player Bloons TD * 27 custom Battles tracks * 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades * Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent * Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time * Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode * Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends * 16 cool achievements to claim * Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list. The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now! REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTIONPERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.YouTubers and Streamers: Ninja Kiwi is actively developing, supporting, and promoting channel creators on YouTube, Twitch, Kamcord, and Mobcrush. descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.

Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!

Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses.

Check out these awesome features!
* Head-to-head two player Bloons TD
* 27 custom Battles tracks
* 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades
* Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent
* Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses
* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.
* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent
* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time
* Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode
* Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends
* 16 cool achievements to claim
* Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp

If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list.

The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now!

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION

PERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

YouTubers and Streamers: Ninja Kiwi is actively developing, supporting, and promoting channel creators on YouTube, Twitch, Kamcord, and Mobcrush. If you are not already working with us, keep making videos and then tell us about your channel at youtube@ninjakiwi.com.

comments: Game is getting better with being fair. Free to play people can actually roll decent heroes after a while with persistence. IGG is still unbelievably money hungry for their newest released things - but I guess it's better to wait for everything or pay for it upfront. I chose option 1. Thank you IGG for making rolling a little more fair.

WTH HAS HAPPENED?? Been playing for 3+ years and have NOT EVER seen the game "rolling" system so broken. I have not rolled anything worth a $$@ in almost 3 MONTHS. Don't give me the it's random thing. I have never had anything like this until after an update a couple months back. You have obviously changed the system and it is apparently to screw the long timers in favor of generating more $$ but it's only making long timers like me BORED and frustrated!! I'm not spending any more money until it's fixed. Tired of wasting cash!

I've been playing for almost 4 years and CC used to be better before you could purchase top level heroes. IGG really sucked what little competitive nature was left in the game out with pay to win. If you want to spend money on a game and still be competitive, play Summoners War instead.

Some people use this for a dating app or say innapropiate things and kids play this game obviously. But that isnt the games fault its the players fault. However i would like it if the creators would sensor all of that
OMG This app is annoying in all ways... And on Certain hack things I play this for 30 seconds but still don't get a pass! Tell CoTops to give me my credits

Lol I'm changing my review once more. I love the game but every new hero you guys drop completely messes up the game and makes things unfair. I don't know if your way of trying to fix it is by making more OP heroes but it simply makes the game less enjoyable. The last few heroes that came out completely made my account useless and if I don't put in a good couple hundred dollars is just gonna stay useless. I think that's unfair so for now I'm taking off a few stars. I know you guys don't care but its the only thing I can do to express my opinion. In my humble opinion you guys should balance the useless heroes you already have rather than coming up with new ones that make the old ones  useless.

comments: Has to be one of the worst games I habe played. Iaay here for about a half hour figuring stuff out and the only upgrades are for real money .and their are adds every time you do anything pretty tap any button . these 5 star votes are clearly bots. 1/10 do not recommend.

This is that type of game where you can either be paitent or rush it by wasting ur time. I have played the game by just opening it and letting the box fill up at 3,000 coins every hr and 20 mins. In the past 2 days i am currently at 30k coins. The game advertisement is false. Unless it has not updated for me yet. If you are just here to look at ads every time you like to get at most 300 coins or even 20. Then this is your game. It has no upgrade system unless, you are willing to pay actual cash for it. Which it is stupid. A $5 gift card is 4,500,000 coins. It might take you at least about 2 weeks to maybe get that. Good luck folks.

At the rate you get coins it would take youbabreally long time for you to redeem for five dollars, but the ads are not very intrusive, and the game works.  If I can get an extra 5. Bucks by the end of the month, I'm happy.
The amount of ads is truly ridiculous. And if you intend to actually make any money at all with this game you will have to play for probably over a year to make 1 dollar. don't waste your time
I really like this game. It's a great time killer but can you please not have the double reward and x2 thing pop up all the time. It is really annoying

Nice game it's nice to make a bit of money. But.. there are just to many ads. I do not have a nice and normal experience while using the app. If you can lower the ads it will be a good app. I uninstalled because the ads where way to annoying. Please lower the amount of ads. Thanks

comments: Its the best  game ever and has great look but when I'm  Ms pacman or pacman  I can see the in side of them and a piece  of there leg is cut and Mrs pacman dose the same tricks as classic sonic and pacman dose the same as tails. And what are the power pellets  for ü§î??oh  no I can see Amy's under wear  and when shadow and Amy fall's  from the bonus  stuff or a boss when they land they run like sonic for two seconds and Amy run bad

What really drew me into this game was the the Pac-Man promotion, I love a good crossover and I can say with total certainty that I wouldn't be playing it if I couldn't play as Pac-Man, he's such a good inclusion. It's a super addictive game, setting it aside to do something else is quite difficult, hours go be seamlessly when playing it. The graphics as well are beautiful, very vibrant and colourful.   I have a few minor gripes with the game though, it crashed on me and when I restarted the game I had briefly lost all my content, that gave me a minor scare. The game is heavily geared towards microtransactions as well, unless you're prepared to pay money, get ready for a very, very long grind trying to get the stuff you want. Having said all that I absolutely love the game, very glad I downloaded it.

The game is really solid, serving as a great precursor to Speed Battle in terms of basic gameplay. The missions and occasional events really give the game some gameplay value and the music is a really nice tune, but it will get old not too long after you start playing. I think it's a shame that the characters have no differences; it's purely aesthetic. Different abilities for the characters would have rocked, and Speed Battle improved this slightly, but not much. It's definitely worth a play or two, but don't stick around too much, you're not missing much.

Sonic dash is a fun speed based game I play it about 20 mins a day! P.s. PLS ADD CHAOS  and I still know that chaos is in forces speed battle but still and also why didn't we have a chaos fight in forces?and add zero from Sonic adventure dx as Amy's boss.

Literally nothing works since the latest update!  If you're lucky, it'll actually boot up, but even then, only half the buttons work, and not the essential ones, such as PLAY!  I had to delete the game and reinstall to get it to even semi work in the first place, so of course, I lost all of my progress due to it not syncing properly with Google Play, all the characters were unlocked via hundreds of Tokens that I'd collected, I'd maxed out many of the characters, and had over 220 Red Star Rings.  Shambles.
It was good. Mostly positive things to say. I wish I could go from one round to the next faster, though, without all of that extra stuff. Also, way too many ads.

descriptionHTML:
Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.

SONIC…
The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?

…DASH!
Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!

AMAZING ABILITIES
Utilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Sonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS
Choose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Face off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!

POWERUPS
Unlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. Including head starts, shields, ring magnets and unique score boosters!

KEEP ON RUNNING
Get more rewards the more you play! Level up your score multiplier by completing unique missions, or win amazing prizes including Red Star Rings & additional characters by completing Daily Challenges and playing the Daily Spin.

SOCIALLY CONNECTED
Challenge your friends on the leader boards or invite your friends through Facebook to prove who the best speed runner is…

comments: Lost all of my bikes when I re-download the app. It shows the 500+ wins I have, but I don't even see a way to get the basic ones unlocked again without paying for their stupid VIP package. It sucks that they ruined this app, looking at the iOS version its obvious they haven't bothered to update this in years.

Overall, the game is OK . But there is a few issues. My bike tips back and I can't stop it from tipping back until I die. But this doesn't happen all the time. It happens about every five weeks. Also, I was given a 5$ gift card and a 10$ gift card but I can't buy any of the bikes.

Been playing for a few years and absolutely love the game.  Got a new phone, Moto G5 Plus, and now there is a half second pause every time I hit the gas or break in every race.  Extremely annoying when you're racing friends.

Bugs and Glitches... Multiplayer links are not being sent back and forth properly. Some games keep giving me desert level 1 and not showing any replays or ghost bikes are doing a different levels then the one I am suppose to be racing against. Please Fix!!!

I love playing this game but id give it no stars seeming that there are so many ads and when I collected enough stars for a ghost bike I DIDNT GET IT!! HORRIBLE!! unless you can fix this, you're not getting a good review on my hand. Oh and also, for anyone wanting to know, it's 21 dollars a month for some bikes. Not in real life. Wow such a great deal... No really a great deal.

I have heard of multiple instances of people with free trials running out and them not being notified and this game charging them and not providing refunds even though the app wasn't even used. This is a horrible way to provide services to customers and I refuse to play another game provided by these developers just because of how their policies are so deceitful.

descriptionHTML:
Bike Race is one of the best racing game on Android! Race and have fun against millions of players. Bike Race is one of the top-rated free games! And it's free! Speed up the wheels and get ready for fun!

Addictive racing gameplay
- New game mode: Tournaments!
- Race against millions of users on multiplayer
- Train on single player to improve your skills
- Fun guaranteed
- Simple and intuitive driver controls
- Challenge your facebook friends
- Play without wifi

Amazing features
-Hundreds of crazy tracks and mad worlds
-Cool stunts
-Tons of amazing bikes
- Don't miss the free updates with lots of new content

Forget those dumb drag car racing games. To become a master motorcycle, skills matter (a lot). As they say: no pain, no gain! So, start practicing right now to become a pro bike racer and rule them all. It will be addicting, we guarantee fun at the tip of your finger!

Bike Race is brought to you by Top Free Games - the creators of the addicting game: Racing Penguin.

● Details about user created levels
If you want to play more than 3 featured user created levels per day, you will need to buy a level pack. You can play unlimited free levels created by you or your friends if you have their codes. You can also play unlimited free levels shared publicly on the internet by other users. Levels can not be created on a mobile device. To create a level, surf to www.bikerace.com

● Play it anywhere
Bike race free does NOT require any internet connection. you can have fun racing in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on the toilet!)

● Low data usage
This free game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music

● Compatibility and support
We're continuously working (hard) so that all Android phones and tablets run the game smoothly. please report any issue you may experience to support+bikeraceandroid@topfreegames.com

● Age rating disclaimer
It does NOT contain violence nor any other mature content. it's just a simple and straightforward racing game. feel free to play it with your boys and children. we bet it will be fun and they're gonna love it!

● Privacy policy
http://www.topfreegames.com/privacy/bikerace

comments: Sudoku is very addictive -- one star off for that; otherwise this implementation is near perfect.  The controls are quite good, wisely omitting features that automate gameplay.  Ads are  minor nuisance, but that's how the bills get paid.

Great way to relax. Hard to stop. Application is reliable and easy to use. Never freezes. Difficulty seems accurate, but I generally play at easy. For difficult puzzles, you may need paper and pencil.
Love it.  Keeps me entertained when I have long wait times between classes and when I have no wifi.  Definitely keeping this app
Love the game but would like an undo or back button, as sometimes i accident press on the wrong square and lose the number that was there before
Without the assistance is just like the paper ones.. perfect
Enjoying it. Needs better help. Very hard can be very easy or impossible. Not consistent.

It's a great game to spend time playing on but I would like the controls to change, their to annoying when I jump I die and am like WOAH... I JUMPED, THOUGH!!! otherwise. Great game.

I did it I mean I get my high score and then I died makes no sense right snow total stands but not mad at this game because like I can definitely not beat it it's like a fun and active game I would give it like a 5 of I didn't die like the heck

comments: I really like this game, kind of wish the progression system was a bit quicker though, other than that, the tight controls, open world and variety of creatures you can eat make it a solid game. The special sharks look really cool, and I even considered buying one until I saw the 50$ price tag.   On a side note, what's the difference between this app and the Hungry Shark World?

i would rate 5 stars... but.. something with the cloud save broke, i used to have the megalodon, without any cheats.. but now i have the mako. could you fix this somehow? And do i email the support team? Im not good with all the emailing stuff.

Winnings suck. Instructions are very vague. Way too many ads. Feel like in order to play you have to pay in order accomplish levels and continue story campaign. Sorry guys but I bet my criticism has been said over and over again. Result is boredom. Too many other games to waste my time playing. Need to fix these if you wish to keep this game on the market people!!!!

I thought it was SUPER DUPER AMAZING. Keep that game like this and don't change it. But whenever I would eat like a lot, then I don't get bigger and it said the more you eat the more bigger you get. So I think you should make that better. If u wouldn't have done that then I would be impressed by the game.

Amazing game. I completed this game in 48 minutes Hahaha! Because I used luckypatcher :) I downloaded the luckypatcher in Googlechrome But it can harm your Device..... And the last shark is Moby dick His baby is as big as Megalodon.

The is the most intense game ever.When you think you've got it ,it's gone. Can't figure out how to boost. Controls aren't the best.Rhis game could improve. Oth er than that it's fine I guess.Too many pop up ads. Really frustrating. I want to play the game not look at ads. Sometimes  you can't back out of the ad.

descriptionHTML:
Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!

Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way!
Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!
Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!

In this action-packed aquatic adventure:

• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures
• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves
• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep
• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers
• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!
• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects
• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions
• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher
• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes
• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features
• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls
• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!
• Synchronize your game easily across Android devices

Compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.
This game contains advertising.
Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

Loved this game!!! It is my new favorite game I love all the powerful weapons and armor. I wish there was chestplates instead of amulets and leggings instead of bracelets and an easier way to find out what your hero level, But else then that it was perfect. I loved how you can choose the controls to your own preference. Chame on anyone who gave it a less then 5 Star review. I still dont know ho to tell what your hero level was but still my favorite game.

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

The best game on market right now. No ads, unless you request it for coins,(which I doubt you'll need to), many modes, including HELL(Infinite waves), MAP(To gain access to abilities and magic) and BATTLE(Normal wave advancement with bosses every 5 levels.). By far the best game that advertises it is not pay to play. Because it's not, despite the option to buy coins.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

I can't help but love a mobile game that doesn't constantly shove advertisements in your face. No silly energy system to make you wait to play, and while it has a real money store, it's tucked away in a corner where it belongs. Different control options and simple, accessible gameplay make this a hidden gem. 5 stars all the way. Kudos to the developer.

In general, this is an ordinary RPG, but how is it done! uhh, already captures the spirit. Well, maybe not the first time, but you can not sleep at night until you pass it and you do not know what at the end of this trip on interesting lands and locations. By the way, there is no plot in the game, but it will appear if you can play long enough! In any case, which of us does not like to shoot and douse a dozen evil creatures? The game has 60 levels or so. And to pass them you need to sweat. The explosions, shooting, guns. You can also find spinners and gyro-paceters, which are likely to become invincible. The truth is not forever.Also in our game you will have your own bitcoin farm! comments: Honestly, I like this one the most. I like that it keeps the mini games present, but it has a new game style as well. I also love that you can play as the characters, as well as the fact that they now have a backstory! The game itself isnt too difficult, making it a nice game to play at all times. The only thing i dont like is the amount of ads, but it is a new game, and ot needs its funding to stay up and running. Overall, good job Metro! Keep it up! :D

Nice game. I like the concept of rebuilding but this game was meant to kill time, I hope so. Keep adding characters and what we require is a hell lot of mini games so that they may keep coming and coming and coming. I do not intend to harass you but try to add more and more mini games after each update. I'm sure that in the course of  time you may be able to compete with the best games ever created but do not make the game larger than DWTD 2. Add more new locations too otherwise we will not be able to consume the tokens. The game is nice because you do not have to consume money for characters and get them through gifts instead. It is also nice because tokens can be collected easily. Please think about my opinions. I‚ù§ this game.

Brilliant! It is absolutely fantastic! Bit of lag and ads but apart from that it's perfect. Also it's very different from the other dumb ways to day which goes to show how much effort the creator(s) put into making them.They didn't just quickly make a few quick games for the money. No. They put effort. It is amazing. The deaths are funny and the characters are cute and so is the art style. Creator, GREAT JOB!!!

The first two were much better. I liked them because they were similar to warioware, in that you play randomized mini-games, and they get faster and more challenging. This game is not like the first 2 In the slightest. There are a total of 4  minigames. The main point of this iteration in the series seems to be to repair arbitrary houses and structures that have zero impact on gameplay whatsoever. You repair them "just because" I gave it a few hours, and I find this game to be a boring ad machine.

Dumb ways to die 3 gets 3 stars. No, seriously, I loved the first 2, but this one is not good. Only 4 minigames, not really different each from another. Remember FASTER FASTER FASTER ? It disappeared (I miss it), and is now ADS ADS ADS. The goal here is just to use money and play as often as you can for ADS ADS ADS. The main thing here ? Minigames ? Nooooo, just getting (or buying) tokens and use them to repair houses (no impact on gameplay). Why would this game be nice ? The graphics are still good. Yes, that's all. Have a nice day. ADS ADS ADS

The character models are cute and all, but the games are getting a bit repetitive. WAY too many ads. Like, ridiculously too many. The app forces a couple right after you finish some of the minigames. You have enough to offer us - forcing even more ads on top of that is tiresome. Get rid of them.
description: Dumb Ways to Die brought you the dumb little Beans that the world fell in love with. Now it‚Äôs time for another dumbfounding adventure!¬†Help rebuild and keep the once great town of Dumbville safe, travel to the scorching deserts of Dumbgypt, hike to the frosty summit of Dumb Peak and journey to the curious planet of Dumbtune in Dumb Ways to Die 3: World Tour.¬†Game Features:¬†‚Ä¢ Get your tools ready to help make the town of Dumbville and the rest of the Dumb World safe once again.‚Ä¢ Collect and play as your favourite Beans!‚Ä¢ Send the Beans down the steep slopes of Dumb Peak - but watch out for those cheeky penguins.‚Ä¢ Launch the Beans through asteroid fields deep in space.‚Ä¢ Soar through the skies above Dumbville in a crazy plane flight!‚Ä¢ Dash through the mighty Pyramids of Dumb-Gypt.‚Ä¢ Collect unique outfits for all the Beans!‚Ä¢ Do your best to keep the Beans safe - but if they do get hurt, patch them up in the hospital!
descriptionHTML:
Dumb Ways to Die brought you the dumb little Beans that the world fell in love with. Now it’s time for another dumbfounding adventure!
 
Help rebuild and keep the once great town of Dumbville safe, travel to the scorching deserts of Dumbgypt, hike to the frosty summit of Dumb Peak and journey to the curious planet of Dumbtune in Dumb Ways to Die 3: World Tour.
 
Game Features:
 
• Get your tools ready to help make the town of Dumbville and the rest of the Dumb World safe once again.
• Collect and play as your favourite Beans!
• Send the Beans down the steep slopes of Dumb Peak - but watch out for those cheeky penguins.
• Launch the Beans through asteroid fields deep in space.
• Soar through the skies above Dumbville in a crazy plane flight!
• Dash through the mighty Pyramids of Dumb-Gypt.
• Collect unique outfits for all the Beans!
• Do your best to keep the Beans safe - but if they do get hurt, patch them up in the hospital!

comments: Amazing game... Loved it...üòç The tunes are AWESOME!!!  And Bryan swag zone At first even I thought that But... It is a maze so it'll obviously be twisted... (No Hate) It is actually that you should click maybe after the third or fourth turn to get it right... Even I took time to understand that So it's okay üòä

Love it,love it Love it! I love the free updates and the designs are divine! The levels are really hard well some of them! I hope you make more dancing line versions and games! A prequel,sequel or a dancing line 2,3,4,or 5 is something you guys should make! I love this game! This girl I used to like got me hooked on this game! Make more Dancing Line games! This is by far my favourite mobile game to date. Loads of fun and not covered with ads like every other game out there (while there is a few this one isn't as bad). My only complaint is the new continuation thing. That wasn't there but now it's forced me to watch ads even though I played to remove ads.

Seems like controls tend to be problematic, and synchronisation has to be adjusted for every song. However the game is wonderful, precise, compelling and worth spending time on! Everything is well thought, new levels and lines are frequently added. So far my favourite app ever, looking forward to playing some new levels and the match option.

I originally had it as 5 stars, but I noticed the longer that I've had the game, the more bugs I'm starting to see. Sometimes the music won't line up with the levels, which is the point of the game, and other times the game won't register my touch and will screw up my progress. If this gets fixed that would be great, and I'd move the rating back to 5 stars!

I really wish you guys didn't update it. It truthfully bugs me that I can't listen to the full song on the menu anymore. The songs are absolutely amazing and the game is very addictive. I hope you will update the game again so that we can just sit and listen to these master pieces if we wanted. Thanks for an awesome game!
description: Dancing Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.Game features:1. Original background music2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap4. Music is the key to guide youSupport:Are you having problems? Send email to dancingline@cmcm.comBusiness Cooperation:Cheetah Mobile is now sincerely inviting all the amazing mobile game developers globally to achieve mutual success! we are looking forward to the great games! Contact us on: publishing_cmplay@cmcm.comPrivacy Policy: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/privacy.htmlTerms of Service: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/tos.htmlAd Choice: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/ad-choice.html
descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap
4. Music is the key to guide you

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to dancingline@cmcm.com

Business Cooperation:
Cheetah Mobile is now sincerely inviting all the amazing mobile game developers globally to achieve mutual success! we are looking forward to the great games! Contact us on: publishing_cmplay@cmcm.com

Privacy Policy: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/privacy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/tos.html
Ad Choice: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/ad-choice.html

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

comments: Perty good Edit: We're in the middle of an event and the game won't load. Finally says down for maintenance. It would be nice to get a heads up on when that happens. Gonna put a hindrance on the event that's over on Friday. Do hope it's resolved soon. Still like the game tho, but would like it better if I can play.

Right.  First off, If you are not a fan of Idle games, then don't play. This is the epitome of an Idle game.   The Early game is pretty simple. Click, Collect, Make your way to Level 80. You have the option to buy gold, but I wouldn't bother.   Multiplyers come from a variety of Sources, and regular events give permanent boosts to the Main game.   Good to pick up and play for 10 minutes at different points of the day, Deep enough to just about keep my intrest beyond this.   Issues. Events: They keep adding new things to Events and not really following up on them. Betting hasn't been used in a while, Costumes are confusing, and the card collection in a previous event was a fairly obvious cash grab, requiring that upgrade the cards you have using gold.  Event's are often straight copy pastes of previous events, and will sometimes continue to reference previous events'  All in, pretty good.

Well guess they deleted my last post cause I complained that the game took up 1.8 gig till I uninstalled it and reinstalled it then lost my saves because of bad programming.   Don't waste your time or money on this company.

Not a bad idle game, but feels very "pay to get anywhere at all", let alone "pay to win. Gold ingame seems a bit overpriced compared to most other game currencies and the offers to earn free gold don't work, either the offer just happens to no longer be there once you've done it, or it is still there and just doesn't register that you've done it, and this is after a few days of waiting, not the hour or two the app promises.

They put so many buttons to purchase things ion the main screen. When tapping as is the nature of the game, it brings up confirmation for your purchases. If you're trying to play fast, you could easily spend $20 in mere seconds without noticing. Put all the purchases in one place instead of cheating players.

Fun game for what it is.  Some of the ads (especially for Stash) get stuck and don't have an "x button" when they finish playing...forcing me to close the game and restawrt without the bonus I was offered for watching the ad.  Fix that and I'll add another star.
description: Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game! Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won‚Äôt be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!KEY FEATURES:*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you‚Äôre offline?*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionHTML:
Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game!

Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won’t be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!

KEY FEATURES:

*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you’re offline?

*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.

*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!

Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

One thing though, the other reviewers are correct in their complaints about how often and when ads pop up. That shouldn't happen smack dab in the middle of a maneuver.

comments: It is inexcusable to allow ads to make such noise when both my phone is in silent mode AND I have the sound off in the game settings! I went over other reviews and the developers wanted to know which ads. Seriously?! How about all of them?! They have to be aware yet refuse to fix the problem. Do not download this intrusive app. Also I get a migraine with the annoying "Ready? Let's go!" voice when the sound is on.

Great strategy based game, awesome, however out of 326 levels only 323 could be completed. Level 324 the colors are not chain linked they are totally erratic and the colors you're given are inconsistent. They alternate in color as well to ensure failure. Still I enjoyed it. Side note, I played the game without using any cheats, which is the reason level 324 is a trapdoor the idea is to purchase cheats. Thanks great game.

Fun, but... Worst aim system. You can see ball curve away instead of following straight path. Color balls rotate without your input. You are shooting blue, but yellow goes instead. This happens very frequently. Lastly, had 20 straight of same color. Only needed one of another color to finish that level. Still playing, but game is very frustrating.
Takes so long to start a level you have lost interest in the game before it starts. Keeps my attention for about 30 secs. Phone will not respond to button presses after game has finished.

Liked it but sometimes it just wouldn't give me the right bubbles to win at the end when I absolutely could've. If there's 4 bubbles left and none of them are yellow why do you give me a yellow one? I felt cheated
The coding in this game obviously needs work.  Balls given not colors needed.  Spot aimed at missed and ball lands somewhere else.  The last chest I opened lvl 30 something gave no item.

comments: So far I've been enjoying it. It's nothing too special, typical mobile fighting game but Tekken. The fact that's it Tekken makes it more enjoyable than average because I love Tekken, but that's just me. I feel that acquiring new characters needs to be way easier than it is, especially when you need to take on harder missions for bonus materials and currency. I don't like how you have to wait for characters health to regenerate. If characters healths auto filled per mission, I would definitely put more time into the game. Since it isn't, I have to constantly stop playing and wait for the health to refill, and I don't wait to use healing items because it takes away from my in game currency, which itself is difficult to obtain if you aren't constantly grinding. Aside from that, it's fun. Very fun, I recommend.

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

This game is beautiful! I have always loved Tekken ever since the 1st and have played them all. I only wish some of my favorite characters weren't missing, like Lei and Bryan and I haven't seen Yoshimitsu or Heihachi Mishima. Overall I am very impressed. Thanks, I have been waiting for this on Android for a long time! I would rate 4.5 stars ‚ò∫

Am I ever going to play this game?  All it does is download stuff Update:. Graphics are great, game play is ok, seems like I'm just hitting random parts of my screen.  Healing component is going to make me uninstall.  There's no area to practice to figure out what you're actually doing.

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

This is so fun and cute! I love the cute little furries, Awesome graphics and simple BUT FUN gameplay. One down side is It's little glitchy while doing levels and maybe some Furries from TV, Disney, books ect.like for an example: Mickey mouse, Pikachu, Totoro ect....If you can fix this I'll rate  it 5 starts

The only I wanted to tell is that the game shows that the master players are very rare and we have a chance of getting them but trust I have been playing fifa for a lot of time and I never got like a player in like chance or in free packs I do not even get silver players. comments: It's honestly a fun game, and I'd love to use it as a stimulating activity (ah, who am I kidding, it's just a great time killer), but it makes my head hurt-- and that's a problem. I'm not even the type of person that is negatively affected by fast-paced graphics or rapidly changing colors. It'd be five stars if it didn't give me headaches, but, for now, it gets three; good graphics, smooth gameplay, but no matter how great the app, it isn't worth physical discomfort. (Note: if you are looking for something similar, try "Run". It has the same sort of concept, but without the advertisements and headaches.)

comments: If you like doing mazes, then I highly recommend this game. It's by far the best maze game app I've come across! Not only is it addicting, but it is fun and more challenging/authentic then any other maze games I've tried. There are plenty of levels/modes to keep you entertained. It's the only maze puzzle app I've found worth playing! üòÄüíú

Time killer. B&W colors are a bit hard on the eyes after awhile. I wish the controls weren't so touchy. Even if I'm using my stylus it's easy to move into a wrong corner by accident when you know it's not the right direction.

I'm not far into it, but it's fun so far. My eyesight could be why it's not a 5-star experience. The more complex levels are very small and give me a headache after a couple of mazes. I believe the contrast and color schemes could be improved and make the game better. It's still a very good game though.

I love mazes and this game keeps me on my toes. Even though I haven't played it too long, an adult ad popped up that I felt was inappropriate. This concerns me because my 7yo daughter is also fond of mazes. Now I'll have to download a separate kid version for her.

5 stars, the game does exactly what it should do, and the controls are simple and intuitive, but please, can you add a feature to prevent the screen from turning off? It messes a little when I try to mentally solve the classic mazes
I like the mazes. Strongly dislike that the game plays half the maze for me. As a player I have the right to do the work myself. Cannot find controls to turn that off. :( :/
description: Mazes & More is a classic maze/labyrinth puzzle for kids and adults with fun tweaks and surprises. Just swipe your finger and guide the dot through the walls to find a way out and escape the labyrinth. Minimal 2D graphics make it feel like a classic and retro maze game, while new game modes keep the adventure fresh (and sometimes scary!). No marker needed. We don¬¥t experiment with mouses or cheese.MAZES & MORE KEY FEATURES- Easy play, forget about awkward tilt controls or unresponsive accelerometer. Better than using a marker!- All mazes are made by hand, no randomized levels- 5 categories: Classic, Enemies, Ice Floor, Darkness and Time trial. More will come!- Easy mazes for kids and hard labyrinths for adults.- Minimal and retro 2D graphics, forget about complicated 3D mazes.- We don¬¥t use poor mouses in the labyrinths nor tasty cheese is wasted.Guide the dot through different routes in this free maze adventure. Run, explore and find a way out through the intricate walls. Is there a Minotaur?  Complete all 450 labyrinths and become the king of the maze. Have fun :-) No mouses were hurt during the creating of this game.
descriptionHTML:
Mazes & More is a classic maze/labyrinth puzzle for kids and adults with fun tweaks and surprises. Just swipe your finger and guide the dot through the walls to find a way out and escape the labyrinth. Minimal 2D graphics make it feel like a classic and retro maze game, while new game modes keep the adventure fresh (and sometimes scary!). No marker needed. We don´t experiment with mouses or cheese.

MAZES & MORE KEY FEATURES
- Easy play, forget about awkward tilt controls or unresponsive accelerometer. Better than using a marker!
- All mazes are made by hand, no randomized levels
- 5 categories: Classic, Enemies, Ice Floor, Darkness and Time trial. More will come!
- Easy mazes for kids and hard labyrinths for adults.

comments: I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
Game is very addicting but after a little while of playing you can't hit jump or land! Maybe just me? Also, I don't want to pay for upgrades. Should be merit based on how well you race.

Disappointing...the game would easily be 5 stars, as it is very fun, but once you reach a certain point, it becomes pay to play as you need gold to upgrade your bike to stay competitive with the CPU rider.  Can't even play anymore because it's impossible to progress any further.

descriptionHTML:
Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun
- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized
- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look
- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free
- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2
- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players
- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!


Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!

Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!

descriptionHTML:
Join over 120 MILLION players worldwide and experience Hipster Whale's massive viral #1 hit!

Play Crossy Road on the Big Screen with Android TV!


Why did the Chicken cross the road?
Why did the Pigeon leave THAT there?
Why did Specimen 115 abduct that cow?
Why did Unihorse eat all that candy?


FEATURES:
- Play Crossy Road on your big screen with Android TV
- Collect over 150 retro-styled, pop art inspired characters
- Cross roads, train tracks, and rivers – endlessly hop forever
- Dodge traffic in a candy wonderland with the Android Robot
- Simple, pure, innovative gameplay
- Free to play


Have any problems or suggestions? You can reach us at inappsupport-googleplay@crossyroad.com.


**DON'T LOSE YOUR CHARACTERS!**
- Go to game Settings and Sign-in with Google Play to save your characters, game progress, scores, and achievements!
- After signing in, your progress will be saved to your Google Play account
- To restore your game progress, go to Settings and click Restore Game to restore all of your characters
- You can only restore saved progress that was saved from version 1.0.6 onwards
- We are working to support saving from multiple accounts on a single device in a future version. The current version works well with one account per device or one account across multiple devices.

The game require access to the following Permissions ----------

- Read device state and identity - READ_PHONE_STATE permission

- The game requires the LOCATION permission to target and deliver video-based advertising:
The game implements opt-in video ads that players can watch to earn free coins if they choose. Watching video ads is voluntary if players want to speed up the rate they earn coins to win new characters. We require the Location permission to provide location based video ads to provide more relevant ads to players.

descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

description: Epic Puzzle Action RPG for PACIFIC RIM fans!Command your own Shatterdome base and defend your district with human-piloted mechs called Jaegers against monsters from the breaches known as Kaiju.‚òÖ RECRUIT iconic Jaeger mechs from the entire PPDC to join your Strike Groups stationed at your Shatterdome.‚òÖ UPGRADE Jaeger mechs with new tech and weaponry to enhance their damage on the battlefield.‚òÖ EXTERMINATE enormous Kaiju monsters hell-bent on destroying Earth in fast-paced battles that can be completed in minutes.‚òÖ COMPETE with other players in Multiplayer Tournaments to win rewards for your Shatterdome and Jaeger Strike Groups.‚òÖ JOIN FORCES with other Marshals to form Factions and compete in War Games for prizes.THE STORY:Born into a world at war, you join the military and quickly ascend to the rank of Marshal in the Pan Pacific Defense Corps. 21 countries across the Pacific Rim have banded together to create the PPDC and fight the most dangerous foe mankind has ever seen: KAIJU. These giant alien behemoths have come to Earth via dimensional Breaches and will not stop until the human race is exterminated.As a Marshal, you along with teams of human pilots from around the world take control of a team of military robots known as JAEGERS using a mental synergy called Drifting. The only way to stop the Kaiju threat is to amass and outfit the most powerful array of Jaegers possible and send the Kaiju back through the Breach!FEATURES:ACESSIBLE, STRATEGIC GAMEPLAYEndlessly challenging, enjoyable core gameplay where players mix Jaeger power with puzzle strategy.TONS OF SINGLE-PLAYER CONTENTWage war against the Kaiju in an EPIC single player campaign featuring hundres of unique battles against over 25 different Kaiju monsters.DAILY MISSIONSMissions add to the fun and adventure as you work to compete objectives for your Shatterdome base.PVP JAEGER BATTLESTake your strongest Jaegers into simulation battles against the best teams of other players.COLLECTION & CUSTOMIZATIONOver 50 unique Jaegers can be collected and upgraded in many different ways. Combine them into Strike Groups to battle against impossible odds.MULTIPLAYER & CO-OPCompete alone or join a Faction in ranked, multiplayer leagues. Chat with other members of your Faction to share strategies.NOTE: A network connection is required to play.Get the latest news, feature updates, videos, tips, and more!Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pacrimgameLike us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pacrimgameWatch us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pacrimgame/Subscribe at: http://bit.ly/KFFYouTube
descriptionHTML:
Epic Puzzle Action RPG for PACIFIC RIM fans!

Command your own Shatterdome base and defend your district with human-piloted mechs called Jaegers against monsters from the breaches known as Kaiju.

★ RECRUIT iconic Jaeger mechs from the entire PPDC to join your Strike Groups stationed at your Shatterdome.

★ UPGRADE Jaeger mechs with new tech and weaponry to enhance their damage on the battlefield.

★ EXTERMINATE enormous Kaiju monsters hell-bent on destroying Earth in fast-paced battles that can be completed in minutes.

★ COMPETE with other players in Multiplayer Tournaments to win rewards for your Shatterdome and Jaeger Strike Groups.

★ JOIN FORCES with other Marshals to form Factions and compete in War Games for prizes.

THE STORY:
Born into a world at war, you join the military and quickly ascend to the rank of Marshal in the Pan Pacific Defense Corps. 21 countries across the Pacific Rim have banded together to create the PPDC and fight the most dangerous foe mankind has ever seen: KAIJU. These giant alien behemoths have come to Earth via dimensional Breaches and will not stop until the human race is exterminated.

As a Marshal, you along with teams of human pilots from around the world take control of a team of military robots known as JAEGERS using a mental synergy called Drifting. The only way to stop the Kaiju threat is to amass and outfit the most powerful array of Jaegers possible and send the Kaiju back through the Breach!

FEATURES:

ACESSIBLE, STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Endlessly challenging, enjoyable core gameplay where players mix Jaeger power with puzzle strategy.

TONS OF SINGLE-PLAYER CONTENT
Wage war against the Kaiju in an EPIC single player campaign featuring hundres of unique battles against over 25 different Kaiju monsters.

DAILY MISSIONS
Missions add to the fun and adventure as you work to compete objectives for your Shatterdome base.

PVP JAEGER BATTLES
Take your strongest Jaegers into simulation battles against the best teams of other players.

COLLECTION & CUSTOMIZATION
Over 50 unique Jaegers can be collected and upgraded in many different ways. Combine them into Strike Groups to battle against impossible odds.

MULTIPLAYER & CO-OP
Compete alone or join a Faction in ranked, multiplayer leagues. Chat with other members of your Faction to share strategies.


NOTE: A network connection is required to play.

Get the latest news, feature updates, videos, tips, and more!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pacrimgame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pacrimgame
Watch us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pacrimgame/
Subscribe at: http://bit.ly/KFFYouTube

1950 Sawtelle Blvd. Suite 320
Los Angeles, CA 90025

description: Play the classic and most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 colors and clear levels. Don‚Äôt miss out this fun relaxing game! In this good old version you need to aim & shoot, to drop & burst all bubbles. Train your brain with this original puzzle as you blast balls online or offline - anytime! Bubble Shooter is the best FREE app available on Google Play. Ready to start the action? Aim, match and smash all the balls in this relaxing color-matching adventure. This incredible shooter is simple and easy to learn, perfect for both adults and kids to enjoy!  Put your strategy skills to the test! Compete against friends and family and see who can reach the highest score and get 3 stars on every level. Earn coins while you play and use them to get cool boosters. Use your logic and puzzle solving skills to complete the fun missions and clear the board, and make sure to collect special daily bonuses. Download NOW the Best Bubble Breaker Game & Start Cracking Bubbles!Play the Classic Game Mode - So Simple, So Fun.Match 3 balls to blast and clear the board, complete the missions and win coins & awesome rewards. Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to take a shot. It‚Äôs important to form a strategy according to the different bubbles layout in each level. Shoot and pop all the colored balls in this fun free game, aim carefully and hit the target! Work your way through all the different challenges and puzzles, solve the brain teasers and win levels.Enjoy the Arcade Game Mode ‚Äì Never get bored!Pop the balls in this cool retro mode, and rediscover the classic arcade experience straight on your Android device. Advance along thousands of fun puzzle levels as this addicting game gets even more challenging. Enjoy the best retro gaming experience anywhere and whenever you want, no internet connection is required. You can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited! Try the Puzzle Game Mode and Discover the Ultimate Bubble Popping Fun!This shooter is a thrilling balloon popper free app with thousands of challenging puzzles to master. Shoot the colorful balls to advance to the next amazing puzzle level, train your brain and test your matching skills while playing this addictive, casual game for free. descriptionHTML:
The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner?

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests’ preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn’t like it? Try adding some salt. It’s fun to get the “ew”!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon
- Onion
- Octupus leg
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react on burning hot sauce, sour lemon and laugh at loud burps.

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

***

Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy
