description: ‚úî ‚ÄúA brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10‚Äù ‚Äî PocketGamer‚úî ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.‚Äù ‚Äî Android and Me‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before ‚Äì it‚Äôs a legitimately great shooter on mobile.‚Äù ‚Äî Droid Gamers‚úî ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.‚Äù ‚Äî AndroidCommunity‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.‚Äù ‚Äî 148Apps‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!‚Ä¢ Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!‚Ä¢ Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.‚Ä¢ Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! ‚Ä¢ Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!‚Ä¢ Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain‚Äôt no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won‚Äôt fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!

- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want

The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

First off, I'd like to give a big thank you to the developers for this game. It's amazing.  However, I've been encountering quite a few bugs lately. One day, picking up a hover feather crashed the game. Today, I can't pick up llama horns, and the background blur that happens when you go into the workshop stayed into an actual run. I took this as a challenge and continued playing. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 9.7 running Android Marshmallow.  This is just to tip you guys off on some bugs.

The game is addictive, but i cannot play it more than 10 minutes at a time, because it gets boring. The awful part is that since 1 week, i dunno why, it crashes while i'm playing.. Anyway, it's addictive because after you start playing, you start thinking about it while you're not playing

So idk what happened with a recent update, im a premium player so maybe it was in that update but my game will randomly force close now, thought it might have just been my phone but recently got a new phone and it is persistent. Can you guys please look into a fix, i love this game and the force crashing seems to be happening more frequently
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders ‚Äì all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:‚Ä¢ Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay‚Ä¢ Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding‚Ä¢ Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more‚Ä¢ Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system‚Ä¢ Chain together combos to maximize points and speed‚Ä¢ Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals‚Ä¢ Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!‚Ä¢ Acquire the wingsuit from Izel‚Äôs workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic‚Ä¢ Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design‚Ä¢ Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"‚Äì WIRED"One of the best mobile games"‚Äì The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"‚Äì IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"‚Äì TIME
descriptionHTML:
Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

Reviews:

"A piece of interactive art"
– WIRED

"One of the best mobile games"
– The Verge

"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"
– IGN

"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"
– TIME

comments: Good I hope they fixed the bug where you double buy a car and it gives you the same car but still takes your money. But its still a great game. Ohh! And also raise thr chance if getting a legendary I played for almost a year and I never got one l. My friend got one all the time on his apple but there Is a glitch with android.ive never had one.

Good, but has some bugs I'm sorry if I'm being too critical in this review but especially on Mobile Data, Smashy Road can lag. This is to the extent the game will no longer work. Moving on to a positive, the graphical interface is very nice, the perspective, movement and background vehicles is very well created.  Very good game overall

It's good but... I enjoy playing this game, there isn't too much skill involved but it's a good way to kill time and it stays easy enough to make it enjoyable while raising the difficulty.  The only thing I want to see is no more of this, automatically backing up stuff. When you are nose first in an object, the game automatically backs you up, but I've lost countless games because it doesn't stop or doesn't back up enough. Let me choose when to back up!

Awesome It's a very good game, great graphics even for a bunch of cubes, but I also have an idea. You guys should make a game called smashy water, where we can choose from a wide variety of different boats that run away from boat police. Hopefully I helped you with my idea and I will download if made;-). You can work on the title if needed. Please reply:-)

Excellent could use weapon pickup like smoke machine gun or oil slick.... A health bar which is unique to each vehicle depending on if it is made for speed or for just ramming stuff and an add health pickup... a bouncing red or blue stack of cash equal to a hundred dollars once action picks up and a 1000 dollar pickup after a ten minute counter for those who have gotten very good and lastly an arrest count down when stopped.... Sometimes you get only a breif second to get away other times you get like ten seconds???

Good but... you can sometimes glich and get trapped but it's a good game anyway like you run from police. Also when you start off you have to press right or left to start so you can't go straight forward when you get on. I really liked it though it is one of my favourite games! I'm out  Later ima go play some Smashy Road now!

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

I don't know what the game is even like. I couldn't even get past the loading part because it won't let me tap on the screen.  I find this very irritating because I like trying out new car games. But please promise me you won't play this game any further as its a waste of your time.

The controls is very floaty like your car is late responding when tilted and i really like that this game is very fun and time wasting but it lacks car selection very small but i know it will add soon. And i thought the pic is real but it is not even the same on the game for its originality that all thanks

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

This game should be really good. It has all the components of an excellent puzzle game.   However, there are WAY too many ads. Am ad after every level, completed or failed, it's excessive. To make matters worse, some of those ads play sound even if you have disabled sound in the game!   Improve the ad problem, and you are looking at a much higher rating.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere

comments: I DONT LIKE THE UPDATE THAT GIVES YOU MORE TIME AFTER FORCE OF CARDS . IT ALLOWS PEOPLE WAYY!!!!! TO MUCH TIME TO COMPLETE THE BOARD. AND IT WAS MORE COMPETETIVE B4. I DONT WANT MY RANKING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF LUCK.  +Ima a REAL RISK FAN. I have purchased everymap package available. Its fair priced and affordable.The new maps are too easy in my opinion. MAKE MORE MAPS I'LL PAY idc jus MAKE them MORE Challenging

Terrible. I looked up the rules for risk the defender defends with one less than the attacker,but on here they will do the exact same amount as u and will defend with two even though u have only one attacking. After that I tried the blitz thing and I lost 6 characters even though I had the advantage. Horrible game. Never going to plsyvthis game ever again.

This game is great but it could be so much better.   1. The expert AI is too easy to beat. Risk players normally gang up on an opponent, if they are dominating. There should be a legendary option.  2. It would be nice to have a match summary and timeline at the end of a game.    3. There should be an auto-save game feature when playing against the AI, in case the game drops out.  Edit: They seem to have addressed my third point.

This is a very frustrating game. Every single time I play my turn (in a multi-player game that is) I get disconnected! .. and I've to replay it again .. only to get disconnected again! and so on and so on till my time runs out. Sometimes in the middle of all this 'replaying' I even lose my troops to other players .. VERY FRUSTRATING! And No .. I've both a very good data and wifi connections.

Was fine for a couple weeks.... Then it started freezing up in the middle of my games.... All of them. I'm using a LG V30+ with 128g ram so it's definitely not a lack of storage issue.   I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone who likes uninterrupted gameplay.

I joined to get the one free game per day. Be aware, that if you do not subscribe (like me), the dice are loaded...  I actually had an army of 9 or 10 roll over against an army of 1 on quite a few occasions... statistically highly improbable.

descriptionHTML:
NOW WITH FULL ONLINE MULTIPLAYER AND MATCHMAKING!

Everybody wants to rule the world! Now you can, with a new way to play the classic game of RISK. Play on your TV with Chromecast for the ultimate living room experience or take the battle online with Global Domination mode (must be over 13). Defend your territories, draft troops, and launch attacks for the ultimate conquest against friends, family, and foes. Try the game for free or unlock for unlimited mobile play!

NEW GLOBAL DOMINATION MODE
• Join or host battles against new opponents online
• Use Automatch mode to be pitted up against players of similar rank online
• Climb leaderboards & rank up to Grandmaster
• Additional achievements to earn

Draw Something is the “World’s Most Popular Drawing Game”. Have fun with your friends and family exchanging doodle art. Sketch a perfect work of art and participate in our contests. Pick up your brush and start painting now.

Highlights:

descriptionHTML:
Scale is a free and an addictive arcade game with an unique gameplay containing slicer and balls.

Truly a brain teaser and Its super fun!


How to play?


Its easy, all you have to do is to cut and shrink the board by placing the slicers.

You need to be strategic to scale the board wisely and watch out for the ball!

If you touch the balls before your cut is complete, you lose a life.


Increase your score, get diamonds, check the leaderboard and compete your friends.

Try this fun game now!

Best arcade game ever, how far can you go?

comments: This is easily one of the top 5  free game apps I've ever played. Yes, it gives you the option of buying gameplay, but it has more than enough gameplay for free. I can't tell you how many apps I've installed, then uninstalled the same day because of how boring they were or how the only way to actually accomplish anything you have to pay. This game is flat out awesome!

3 stars and I'll explain myself.   1. The game is very addicting and fun, the looks are nice and must I say I love how the northern lights strain look when it's fully grown.   BUT   2. There aren't many strains, would be cool if you could create alot more strain by mixing or idk discovering by accident. Those would add to the game. The game feels like there isn't much to do once you get so far at a given point
Will have to stop playing, massive battery and overheating issues. CPU load is too high. It's just lagging my phone. Shame quite enjoy the game play.

I love this game. Only complaint is that with the latest update I can't rotate my screen the opposite direction. Definitely not a deal breaker, just extremely annoying when I want to charge my phone while paying. Definitely something you guys should look at.

Awesome and fun to play, if you managr your resources well then it doesnt take forever to level up and you dont have to pay to get anywhere. Awesome free stuff sometimes to help you out when you're down, and the story just continues and never loses its spark. Very fun and many things to do other than just grow weed and sell it.
it's a very addicting game that I would recommend to my kids.  Cause it shows them the ethics of real life.  And honestly who doesn't give weed to babies these days...?

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!
descriptionHTML:

The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. descriptionHTML:
The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. NEW & UPDATED version: one of the most popular VR games just got even better with 3D fantasy ride & alien music ride!

Samsung Galaxy S8 (+) users please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution for the best experience. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

This game features multiple Virtual Reality (VR) Roller Coaster rides. You're ultimate attraction / theme park VR app is one install click away. Download it now for free.

VR no gyroscope?
No worries we got you covered. If you have a device without any gyroscope sensor please tilt your head left or right to rotate the view. You do not control the vr rollercoaster, but can view 360 degrees during you ride.

Multiple rides
Why settle for one roller coaster if you can enjoy many? Swing by your very own roller coaster park and going to be like being the tycoon of your own theme park and picking your own roller coaster ride when ever you feel like it!
The rides come in different tastes and thrill level from all over the world. Pick a more classic cedar roller coaster edition or take the fastest high speed crazy ride and discover at what point you'll get queasy.
We offer both recorded 360 videos of real rollercoaster rides and NEW an amazing interactive 3D roller coaster ride in a fantasy world that will make your jaw drop!

The 360 video rides come from real life footage making this a roller coaster simulation that is as real as any simulator can get. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. Experience the roller coaster racing down the track at top speed in full 360 VR.

Latest rides
New in the 2017 a ground breaking new 3D VR roller coaster ride that interacts with live music. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.

Compatibility
The VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. Our known compatibility includes: VRTX One, Stooksy, VR KiX, Durovis Dive, Merge VR, Refugio 3D, ANTVR, VR Smartview, ColorCross, VRTRIA, FIBRUM VR, VR View-Master, Nibiru. Please contact us if you have any issues.
Furthermore you can use this app to enjoy the rides without any VR headset through touch controls as well.

If you like VR apps and games, and specifically thrilling VR Roller Coaster rides then this is a must download for you. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Get into the VR groove and claim your free VR Roller Coaster now!

comments: This is a very entertaining game that is simple to play. It has provided me with hours of fun! The only thing is that I wish there were more combinations, there are things I've tried that you'd think would make something but don't. For example, Crayon (or Pencil, or Charcoal, or Paint) + Paper does not make Art.

Love love love it solo much, it made to the top ten best games in my head! It has more items but mixing some items don't really make  sense like Domestication and grass makes wheat that is one item that don't make sense otherwise you can cheat from little alchemy 1 so yeah 55 star from me!

I love this game. At first time I open it after download, it still okay. But after that, at second day I open the app, my phone will be turned off immediately. I try to uninstall it and just redownload today, but still same. My phone keep turned off if I open the app. Please fix this, I really really want to play :(

This game is pretty addicting. I get stuck sometimes but I always find something new.  Small issue though, I it won't let me pull rust out onto the screen for some reason. I've used it before, but now it won't let me use it anymore. Perhaps it is an issue with my phone rather than a glitch in the app.

This is leagues better than the original alchemy game. There were a lot of bugs but they've all more or less been patched out. It took me 2 months of playing everyday to get all of the items and combinations cleared.

The interface is not so good. Big icons are not convenient, we have to scroll down long everytime, I could only imagine how much effort would it take if I had 500 items discovered. Please make icons small or a different tab just for icons or just make it like little alchemy one.

comments: I love Beat the Boss 4! But there are some things that I would like to be fixed. For example, when naming your custom boss, the name duplicates. The way to fix it is by putting spaces after it. Another example is that the boss customization screen sometimes switches back to boss selection screen and can't go back after being there for long periods of time. I would love to give this game 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

I loved it. I understand the ads are so that you can continue your work. However, there is a few probelms. First of all, when you click on the judgey/uneven eyes, they change to even eyes. Second of all, when you click on a custom character, the game doubles the name, and following along with that, sometimes it undoes it. I understand if it takes a long time, but i'm asking you, if you can, to please fix these when you can. Sorry for bothering you.      Doge is waiting

Too many ads. It's annoying especially when you are connected to the internet. The King Boss is not working and is always saying "Something went wrong, please try again later" and crashes the whole gane. On the other hand it's a super addictive and fun game to play.

I'd happily purchase this game but that doesn't seem like an option. Tge ads, especially the LOUD BLOW UP EXPLOSIONS game that go on for 30 seconds are especially annoying. I'll gladly buy it, if only to not deal with Fing ads all the Fing time!!

Game is now unplayable due to ads and KIIP rewards popups. The ads bring up my status bar so I can't X out of the ad, and the app hangs when trying to load the KIIP program. I have no interest in trying to play something that shovels ads in your face more often than you can actually play.
Recent updates have made this guy unplayable. Now you have to wait  through a 24 second ad that keeps reoccurring.  Not fun for kids and worse for their parents. Kids loved it before these updates.

comments: Not completely sold on the game. Major problem: hoarfrost was not designed for touchscreen! Trying to clear the frost moves the screen, pulls down drop down menu from the top, pauses repeatedly, zooms & unzooms repeatedly...nightmare! Game has too much going on with collections, story, various games....to enjoy the game. I like the parts where I find stuff. The rest just gets in the way and bores me.

It's fun. It reminds me of another game I used to play, not sure if it based on that or by another company. I find the puzzles OK. Some are getting a bit difficult. I enjoy playing it but I get the feeling very soon I will have to spend some real pennies and when that happens I will probably stop playing.

More complicated game mechanics than most hidden picture games, but the game walks you through them very well. Instead of a linear path, you are given the choice of several quests to choose from or you can ignore the quest and play any stage you have unlocked. Completing quests helps you learn more about the game world and its inhabitants. Very enjoyable with several mini games as well.

Good game and great entertainment so far, been playing for about 10 days. Some levels challenging but not enough to be discouraging. Good way to develop focus, observation and memory. Those rubies are hard to get though and expensive in real money...

Addictive game play, with an interesting storyline.   I appreciate that the object placement is random,  although the visibility in some of the special levels makes it particularly difficult to find everything without using hints and tools.  I've been playing now for almost a year, and there seems to be unlimited potential for long-term gameplay

I'm addicted to this game.  You don't have to spend money to enjoy it either.  Illustrated beautifully and I love the fact items move around plus also have different modes to keep you intrigued. I only find it frustrating not having enough energy to keep seeking

comments: Game is good as all just dance video games. Daughter enjoyed it until noticed that she had only a few dances then had to wait. There should be at least a shorter time to wait. Or some sort of option to earn more coins. Because 2 videos weren't enough. And one of them didn't work because the connection was lost. Again game was okay as for game play. But not sure its a keeper.

I like it, I use it to exercise and have fun with my sister. Only question I have is: How accurate is the kcal Burned counter? I played for over an hour and I am told I burnt 1,252 KCals. I question the accuracy of this. You update the game often, so can you put in the game somewhere the average calories the song the user is choosing to play burns? That is my biggest concern. Otherwise, no issues. Fun, easy to use. Great way to get exercise in all the while enjoying it with family and friends.

It's fun to do and this game is perfect for me because I love to dance. Dancing is my favorite thing to go when I'm bored. I love the songs and dance moves it's awesome to play and do. Thx for making this game cause now I can do more dancing and dance moves. You guys should download this game for you new people cause it's awesome to learn but in a fun way. So if you suck and don't know how to dance then you should download this game it's perfect for you if you want to know how to do simple but hard dancing moves.

It's a good game overall but the songs that are supposedly meant to be free aren't. I would rate it 5 stars but I can on play 3 songs every 24 hours. I'm trying to workout while doing this but a workout isn't a very good workout if it's only for 6 minutes. Please give us a higher coin  limit and cut the wait time down some. Then and only then will I rate it 5 stars.

Honestly, the game is great. It loads good, has amazing graphics and is easy to play. However the credits situation is absolutely retarded. I feel as if we shouldn't have to wait twenty-four hours to play ONE dance then wait again or pay $2.99 per DAY just to dance. You should at least have a page of good free dances for when someone has nothing to do!

I really enjoyed playing this... Or at least the two songs I was able to play based on the coins that I had. My only criticism so far is that there should be ways to earn coins other than waiting so long for refills, watching ads, or buying coins. This strict control on earning coins doesn't make this a great game to play with a group of friends (though I know that you can buy VIP passes which are valid for a limited amount of time). It would add to the game play (as well as the overall experience of the game) if coins could be earned during the game in power ups or when you get perfect scores. This would give incentive to keep playing, let the games potentially last longer, and add to the competitiveness between players to enhance gaming fun.

comments: Whenever I try to open the app the screen starts flashing black and it'll stay like that or keeping turning back to the screen I was on and off, which ends up somewhat strobe-like. The actual game itself is amazing despite having a hard time trying to beat the bacteria level but, what's the point of a good game concept, if the game won't work properly

I thought the new scenario was a free-trial only like the simian flu. (At least you can unlock it after being a brutal pro at the game) I'm gonna enjoy playing this a good few times and unlock even MORE scenarios. Keep up the good work! I wanted to make a suggestion, but I just can't remember now. Oh well...

Quite an enjoyable game and different to games I normally play.  It is a strategy game were you have to try and create a deadly virus and wipe out the world, before the scientists find a cure.  What makes this game different is that instead of trying to save the human race, you try to destroy it.   Just a good job it isn't real.

The game is addictive but when you get to a certain point the cure kicks in and it stops giving away DNA points and it makes it hard to advance in the game. I have read the hints in the news it gives, but I still can't manage to beat the game. I want to delete the game. Butim going to continue to try. I just wanted to mention it idk if its the game or just me. I won't tell others about the game only because its frustrating to play. These games are not good for people to play that has any type of mental issue unless they want to buy a new phone.

Fun game. I wish the rate of death was more consistent. 37,000,000 a day at one point, but waiting 6 months for 100,000 to die towards the end. The disease didn't change, the rate of death shouldn't decrease just because there are fewer people. Good game otherwise

From beginning to end I've been pleasantly surprised and let down but mainly let down. I was all for this game when it came out but now you wanna make a quick buck on a scenario app... pay more for something that should be part of the game. Overall good game business practices not so much.
description: Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

comments: Money sucking game!  You can only play once a day for about 5 mins. without making purchases. I dumped 50.00 into this for extra rubies and it only provided a couple hrs of play. Fun, but it's a rip off and no way to play more than a few mins each day. Bad design, not enough incentives to get good game play...just a $$ pit here.

Not a bad game would rate higher, however i can not make myself do so. This is mainly due to i can not stand it when games make it a "quest" or "objective" to rate them. Kind of pathetic that such a great mental exercise and entertaining game feels this practice is necessary.
Just updated game and its locked all the locations . Lost all my boosts and I had loads. All collection items have gone and monster weapons. Not very happy what a waste of time
I would log into the game everyday and play but it would tell me I missed 1_2 days and not get the daily reward.  I gave it several chances but it happened today so I'm done with it
This was my favorite game ever until it started crashing every 3 min! Now I  can't even get the game to load! Total BS!
New update won't get past loadin screen then the app just closes on it's own.

descriptionHTML:
#1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!

Get ready for a journey unlike any other!
Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.

In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● 41 eerie locations to search
● Over 2968 quests to complete
● 430 collections to piece together
● 33 distinctive characters to meet
● 15 monsters to battle in mini-games
● Play with your friends to fight the evil together!
● Regular free updates with loads of new content
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

comments: Now these days, to be powerful is cards. And it's really sad to see it in one of my favorite fighting game. I have a galaxy s8 plus and when I put the controls on large, it feels like there on medium. If your playing duel and your opponent has 5 power points ahead of you, just call it a lost. Do better. Battlefront 2 is about to be banned in Germany because of the card system. I hope you look into it.  Edited: it's still the same. It feels like a pay to win. I'm going back to shadow fight 2. You know. The good one.

The game is a lot of fun but there's one big problem the only way to advance in the story mode is by leveling up and getting better armor but the only way to level up is in story mode so your other option is spend real money on better equipment. So it's kinda just a money grab. If that was fixed I'd give it 10 stars

I really like playing the game. It has great animations smooth gameplay and isn't too easy or hard. The one thing I dont like is you can't sell your old equipment or skills. If there was a shop to sell them or add runes to them or be able to combine them to make either new or more powerful ones of the sane type I would give this game 5 stars.hopefully the Devs will take this and add this feature in a update. Speaking of updates, I just installed the latest one it was like 403MB but nothing changed! What was the update for then?

Hey NEKKI i have the best suggestion ever. WHY DON'T YOU add a grab button separately or at least give the option. Also make the side quest more satisfying. Just giving me commons just isn't going to work. Please nerf the herlad faction. 1 its crit chance is to stupidly high 17 percent is to much. Its also so quick and has long range

Would be great if there were a better sign in feature. I had to restore factory settings on my phone... Now the game won't allow me to log into my account. Which sucks a lot, I have spent money on microtransactions and a bit of time into leveling up. But now that seems to be all gone...

Poor game poor tech support. Tech supports says they get 1000s of issues everyday and can't support everyone. Then why they have to charge their customers when they can't offer proper support. Moreover they don't even bother to understand what customers are telling and don't know who their payment partner is either. Wonderful Nekki! Continue to serve with superior support in future and provide more reasons like the one you gave to me.. Hats off!
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: Updated 3/7/2018: Magic Jigsaw Puzzles is one of the best, if not The Best, puzzle game avaliable for free download. The puzzles can be set to whatever skill level you need, and all are beautiful. In fact, some are absolutely breathtaking! Many of the puzzles are free or, if you like, you can purchase a specific theme pack. But purchase is totally optional. In two years, I have yet to run out of free puzzles which are just as picturesque as those for purchase. I did a Graffiti puzzle set to 280 rotating pieces and knew I'd be bald from pulling my hair out by the time I completed it! Thankfully, it's finished now, and most people don't seem to mind my shorter hair-do! üòâ I've been playing Magic Jigsaw Puzzles for two years now and it never gets boring. I've even made puzzles of my own art work and they were just as challenging and fun! Download highly recommended.

They used to offer discounted puzzles occationally that you had several days to look at.  About 2 or 3 months ago they changed to just 1 day only with them sending out the notice about THE DAY AFTER IT HAD ENDED.  The second time they did this, I sent them a note about about the problem...  they couldn't even bother to reply back.  Today it happened again.  Got the notice the Day AFTER.   Now, I use the game every day at least twice.  The notice wasn't sent yesterday OR EVEN THIS MORNING.  They need to get their act together because consistantly getting the notice about a special the day after the special just makes people angry.

It's a nice jigsaw puzzle app for at least the one puzzle I worked on. Unfortunately, the controls don't work well on my phonr. It takes several tries to move a piece from anywhere on the screen to anywhere on the screen. If it wasn't for the controls this would have been a 5 star rating. I absolutely love the thunderstorms in the background. Wish it wasn't so frustrating.  Edited 3/7/2018: Well, I've been playing this on my tablet now and I love it. However, just recently the app has started restarting itself and turning the sound off. I try going to the settings to turn it back on. It indicates that it is on but it really isn't. So I close the game, clear my storage cache, and restart it. Sometimes this makes the sound last for a good bit. Other times it just restarts several times in a row and turns the sound off again. At that point I just decide I don't need the sound anymore but I really wish it would stop restarting.

I absolutely love this app. I have had major problems since I downloaded it!!!  I can't put the game downü§£ü§£ü§£The best part about it would have to be the different lvls of difficulties. I cannot surpass the most difficult and in the beginning, very slow but totally challenging...love it‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ Qtn:  Can I change the background color?

You get to watch a 30  second ad before you do a puzzle every time you want to do a puzzle real annoying will be deleting this app. Don't waste your time getting this app. Used to love it before all the ads now it just sucks

Hours of challenge with lots of fun.  Pics are beautiful! Only frustration is that sometimes it doesn't mark the puzzle as completed and sometimes it marks it done but then it does not save that it has been done.  Still the best puzzle app available!

comments: I absolutely love this game. It's so addictive and a really good game if your bored. I'm really curious to find out what happens when you have collected all the balls, does the game just carry on or is their more challenges?? Overall, this game gets five stars from me üòö

Its a really good game. The only thing is, that I wish there was maybe some instructions that appear at the beginning, because I didnt know that you couldnt hit the black lumps etc. Maybe if you add little phrases that say what to do and not to do, then it would be almost perfect.

Great time killer I love everything about it and it is a great game to wake up to. The only down side is that you fall off the ledge and that makes it harder to dodge the black. Everything else is 5 stars so that is what I think about roller coaster.

This game is amazing! It is addicting and fun to play!! The only thing is that I was hoping for some sort of introduction to the game, to tell me how to play etc. Also, I was hoping to be able to choose what kind of ball i use, the black one is plain and kind of boring. But overall its an amazing game!!
Its really fun and addictive. Awesome game play and good for passing time. Not always so friendly to my battery and too many adds. Other than those little hick ups I absolutely love it.

I think that it is ok. I don't play it a lot because its not really fun to me I think that I am going to cleat it because I don't like it that much. I don't like it there are to many adds. They always happened at the beginning and I hate it. I don't think you should not install it its not fun.

comments: I like this game. But i have one issue involving the achievements with the google games. Why is it i had completed some of the achievements but it still shows zero progress??i don't know if it is just only me but i really want this to be fix or any solution can the developer suggests. It is a big deal to me since I enjoy playing games with a purpose to achieve something haha btw GREAT GAME!
This game is so good! Far too many ads tho. I am addicted!!! Dont get the wrong idea guys  from other reviews - ads dont come up in actual gameplay its just when u lose or inbetween levels

Just finished the entire levels of Part 1. I might have stolen a lot of cash by being Bob here but in reality I lost a lot of money because this game wouldn't let me focus at my work! Haha! Great work to the inventors of this game! King of all the mobile phone games out there!

Great game of my childhood. Unfortunately, had problems with award when you connected Google. It's okay that game didn't count some levels, but I replay all suburbs and didn't receive any medals and there is no progress. It's really sad :(

Great game! Very addicting & its just like your being a real robber & make the people don't catch you, i like it when they investigating open doors & when they hear the dog bark because its like its realistic. Please add more Levels & make many characters not just Bob. Thank you. .

Robbery Bob is an amazing game, it's very challenging. You just can't stop playing it. It doesn't have a lot of adds, it's the. Number one game to me. I've never had a game this good. I'm planning on installing Robbery Bob 2 when I finish this one üëç
description: Introducing the Man of Steal‚Ä¶ Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life. ‚Ä¢ SUPER SNEAKY Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection. ‚Ä¢ THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one? ‚Ä¢ LOOT YOUR HEART OUT Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes! ‚Ä¢ CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative.
descriptionHTML:
Introducing the Man of Steal…
Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life.

• SUPER SNEAKY
Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection.

• THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one?

• LOOT YOUR HEART OUT
Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes!

• CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME

description: Hama Universe Take your beads with you when on the go! Play with the familiar Hama beads in Hama Universe! Let your child fly into Hama's new digital universe, where princes, pirates, princesses, elephants, dragons and parrots are waiting in a creative play with beads. In Hama Universe, a version of the free and limitless play awaits for your child with empty pegboards and three challenging theme islands where your child can make the classic Hama patterns. Your child will be presented with the play that enhances fine motor skills as you know it. Where beads are placed on the pegboards, patterns must be reproduced and beads must be ‚Äúironed‚Äù. Hama Universe supports creative play and enhances the child's concentration, creative abilities and desire to make things. Your child is allowed to create colourful and impressive islands, where bead designs make a magical scene where only the imagination sets the limits. ¬†Hama Universe welcomes to many hours of entertainment in a fun and developing framework where your child can immerse itself in a constructive and entertaining play. Hama Universe is the digitisation of Hama's colourful bead play, where children can explore the pirate, princess and circus islands. Here they can play with different patterns and let their creativity flourish. The features in the Hama Universe: 	‚Ä¢	Immersion in a whole universe	‚Ä¢	Creative fun	‚Ä¢	Training of fine motor skills 	‚Ä¢	Focus and concentration exercise ¬†¬†¬†	‚Ä¢	Adventures with Hama's classic pegboards and beadsIt will now be possible to play with beads in the rear seat of the car or in surroundings far away from the analogue beads of the play room. With Hama Universe, your child can play with beads, also when on the go. Hama Universe is designed for children aged 5-7 years as the primary target group, but Hama Universe is also for all others who like the creative fun with beads.
descriptionHTML:
Hama Universe

Take your beads with you when on the go!

Play with the familiar Hama beads in Hama Universe! Let your child fly into Hama's new digital universe, where princes, pirates, princesses, elephants, dragons and parrots are waiting in a creative play with beads.

In Hama Universe, a version of the free and limitless play awaits for your child with empty pegboards and three challenging theme islands where your child can make the classic Hama patterns.

Your child will be presented with the play that enhances fine motor skills as you know it. Where beads are placed on the pegboards, patterns must be reproduced and beads must be “ironed”. Hama Universe supports creative play and enhances the child's concentration, creative abilities and desire to make things. Your child is allowed to create colourful and impressive islands, where bead designs make a magical scene where only the imagination sets the limits.  

Hama Universe welcomes to many hours of entertainment in a fun and developing framework where your child can immerse itself in a constructive and entertaining play.

Hama Universe is the digitisation of Hama's colourful bead play, where children can explore the pirate, princess and circus islands. Here they can play with different patterns and let their creativity flourish.

The features in the Hama Universe:
• Immersion in a whole universe
• Creative fun
• Training of fine motor skills
• Focus and concentration exercise    
• Adventures with Hama's classic pegboards and beads

It will now be possible to play with beads in the rear seat of the car or in surroundings far away from the analogue beads of the play room. With Hama Universe, your child can play with beads, also when on the go.

Hama Universe is designed for children aged 5-7 years as the primary target group, but Hama Universe is also for all others who like the creative fun with beads.
recentChanges: Technical update
summary: Play with the familiar Hama beads in Hama Universe!
title: Hama Universe

comments: Love the app. Great time killer. Certain times of the day when playing I notice a change of cards I get dealt usually the after noon I start losing every hand forcing me to get off. I have a straight the next person always has a higher hand. Seems suspicious. I know u can't win all the time but still. Also private tables where only friends/poker buddy's can join would be a definite plus to add to the game. As some of the randoms just f around and bet all in from the start.

For a poker fan that doesn't know this game it's worth the gamble lol. The game play is good, poor player avatar customisation options as it's simply a small selection of picture options with no options for using one's social media profile pic. To that end frequently there are multiple players with the same profile pic. It struggles a bit as a social game of cards because conversation is limited by time. It has nothing to stand it out & above other poker game apps for either negative or positive reasons. If you just want to play a good game of poker with random people from around the planet though it won't disappoint. It does give the option to buy top up chips and a daily option to get chips for free from both in game buddies and a poker machine. From the entertainment point of view it ticks all the right boxes.

I've found it very disappointing when  other user's connection is bad and their counter time takes forever while they're not even active. IMO if it happens twice they should be kicked. No one likes slow poker, especially when the player isn't even playing.  Other than that everything else is pretty awesome.

It's totally pay to play. It puts you on a fast table with higher stakes to start. You burn through your initial free chips in five minutes, then you have to either wait half a day or buy more. Well I'm not waiting 4 hours just to play cards, and I'm sure as hell not spending money when it goes so fast. Not fun at all.

Hands dont seem to be computer greedy to take your chips. Nor give higher level players generated wins with getting obvious flop or river cards giving them a win on a ridiculous hand they go all in on.

I recommend not to install. You can get banned anytime even without a warning or any explanation, and when u contact support you will get auto response. Bad customer support. I got banned a second after reporting two cheaters or bots idk and they took my 12 billions.

The game is really interesting and entertaining. The graphics are smooth and and the controls are manageable.   The thing I disliked through my game play is that you don't get any clues what you have to do and/or how to defeat the new "enemies". While you understand what exactly you have to do, you've lost some lives. But that's not so important.  I will strongly recommend this game just because of its graphics, entertainment and due the fact, that this game is not pay-to-win game.

I really liked this game. The levels are very challenging and this game is addictive and fun. The only issue is that there are only 5 short lives  that when our lives ran out, we have to wait 18-19 minutes long to have 5 lives again. Of course, there are many hard levels in the game that keeps us dying and think a way to pass the level. So if possible, please shorten the time, like 5-7 minutes only and let us really enjoy the game. It's more even challenging and thrilling if there are many lives. And this game will be really perfect for us. Thank you.

Remember the old days when platformers taught you through trial and error how to interact with new game mechanics? If you don't like that, you'll hate this game. So much fun, so creative, and once you start to get down one of the new features, it ramps it up and keeps you learning creatively how to beat the level. I love this game, it's a fantastic platformer that will challenge you to learn as you go instead of giving you a tutorial every time something new comes up.

Completed all but just couldn't get enough of it. Everyone should play Redball 4. It is D best android games I've ever played. Amazing game reminds me of the old school games . But the only problem is the lives you give us to play. They are so few and they take a lot of time to refill. PLEASE remove the life or ball things from this game it will be the best if you do that cause I was playing and level by level I was getting exited and I wanted to rate this game 5 stars but suddenly this GAME OVER thing comes and I had to give you this ratings.please let us play without stopping and waiting for the life to come.

description: You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.GAMEPLAY- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke- Balance that wobbling glue eater- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts- Swat wasps before it's too late- Best not invite that psycho killer inside- Carefully remove forks from toasters- Help self-taught pilots- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools- Have patience at level crossings- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully- Mind the gap! Board the train safely- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!- Stop the clothes dryer. It‚Äôs a terrible hiding place!- Scratched the drug dealer‚Äôs ride, now avoid his bat- Taking expired medicine is not recommended- Stitch it up before bleeding out! - Perform a daring rescue from a burning building- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents- Remember to stop at level crossings- Everyone loves bacon!  Even rattlesnakes!- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit- Only cross at pedestrian crossings - Remember the sequence for a fireworks show- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash- Sprung a leak?  Sprint to the shore!- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground - Avoid eating rotten food- Leap over forest obstacles- Screw down the glue cap- Find the psycho before he finds you!- Smash the asteroids - Hunt for treasure, but don‚Äôt get hunted yourself- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon- Walk the plank, but don‚Äôt fall over- Barricade your home to stave off zombies- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney- Package the chocolates or feel love‚Äôs bite- Don‚Äôt Dumb with scissors- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)PLUS- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw
descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

GAMEPLAY
- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!
- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke
- Balance that wobbling glue eater
- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts
- Swat wasps before it's too late
- Best not invite that psycho killer inside
- Carefully remove forks from toasters
- Help self-taught pilots
- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools
- Have patience at level crossings
- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!
- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?
- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully
- Mind the gap! Board the train safely
- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!
- Stop the clothes dryer. It’s a terrible hiding place!
- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat
- Taking expired medicine is not recommended
- Stitch it up before bleeding out!
- Perform a daring rescue from a burning building
- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents
- Remember to stop at level crossings
- Everyone loves bacon! Even rattlesnakes!
- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit
- Only cross at pedestrian crossings
- Remember the sequence for a fireworks show
- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash
- Sprung a leak? Sprint to the shore!
- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream
- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground
- Avoid eating rotten food
- Leap over forest obstacles
- Screw down the glue cap
- Find the psycho before he finds you!
- Smash the asteroids
- Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself
- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon
- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over
- Barricade your home to stave off zombies
- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion
- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you
- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots
- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable
- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney
- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite
- Don’t Dumb with scissors
- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)

PLUS
- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station
- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!

Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.‚àö Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN‚àö Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you‚Äôll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.‚àö Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.‚àö Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!‚àö Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.‚àö Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn‚Äôt the only way to make the big bucks!RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE‚àö Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.‚àö Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there‚Äôs no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!‚àö UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.‚àö CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL‚àö Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.THE STORY:In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano‚Äôs perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/GVonFacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram:http://gmlft.co/GVonInstagramYouTube:http://gmlft.co/GVonYoutubeForum: http://gmlft.co/GV_ForumPrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula
descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.


_____________________________________________
