description: OVER 860 MILLION PLAYERS GLOBALLY!Race with the Minions in the award-winning, fan-favorite runner, Minion Rush!Run as fast as you can while jumping, dodging, rolling and knocking Minions off the track in despicably action-packed levels. Rush to collect Bananas and play exciting Special Missions to increase your score as you enjoy unexpected Minion moments.ALL THE FUN OF THE DESPICABLE ME MOVIES IN THE OFFICIAL GAME!‚Ä¢ Race as DAVE, CARL OR JERRY -- and straight out of the Despicable Me 3 movie, MEL!‚Ä¢ Wear incredibly UNIQUE COSTUMES, such as Lucy, the Surfer or the Ninja Minion.‚Ä¢ Speed through ICONIC LOCATIONS inspired by the Despicable Me movies, like Bratt's Lair, the Anti-Villain League and ancient Egyptian temples in The Pyramids.‚Ä¢ Power up your Minions by riding the FLUFFY UNICORN or GRU'S ROCKET.‚Ä¢ Play SPECIAL MISSIONS to discover new content and new Costumes in each update!______________________________________________You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, watching certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN. In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never. Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. descriptionHTML:
OVER 860 MILLION PLAYERS GLOBALLY!

Race with the Minions in the award-winning, fan-favorite runner, Minion Rush!
Run as fast as you can while jumping, dodging, rolling and knocking Minions off the track in despicably action-packed levels.
Rush to collect Bananas and play exciting Special Missions to increase your score as you enjoy unexpected Minion moments.

ALL THE FUN OF THE DESPICABLE ME MOVIES IN THE OFFICIAL GAME!

• Race as DAVE, CARL OR JERRY -- and straight out of the Despicable Me 3 movie, MEL!
• Wear incredibly UNIQUE COSTUMES, such as Lucy, the Surfer or the Ninja Minion.
• Speed through ICONIC LOCATIONS inspired by the Despicable Me movies, like Bratt's Lair, the Anti-Villain League and ancient Egyptian temples in The Pyramids.
• Power up your Minions by riding the FLUFFY UNICORN or GRU'S ROCKET.
• Play SPECIAL MISSIONS to discover new content and new Costumes in each update!
______________________________________________

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, watching certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
______________________________________________

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling

description: Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist.¬†We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic).¬†In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.¬†You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.¬†Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.¬†Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.¬†For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.¬†All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist¬†Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3ATwitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudioFacebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames
descriptionHTML:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist. 
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic). 
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
 
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
 
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
 
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
 
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.
 
All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist
 
Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio

descriptionHTML:
🎹Piano by Gismart is an electric keyboard simulator app with virtual musical instruments to help you learn chords and music notes for free! Learn how to play the piano keys in many interesting ways! 👍

The only realistic piano and musical instruments learning app with free songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners! Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your Phone or Tablet for free!

Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of music instruments: from a grand and fortepiano, to the violin, harpsichord, accordion, organ and guitar. Carve out original melodies and record them to play back via different musical instruments. You can also share your musical creations on social media, including Creatubbles, a safe sharing place for children and adults.

Enjoy our cool mini games and start playing the piano without any lessons. Perform famous songs by tapping keys under falling tiles in the Magic Tiles game. Improve your sense of timing and tempo by tapping random white and black keys in the Magic Keys.

comments: This game has highly disappointed me.  It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.  I have found that you can complete as many offers ad you want but the game won't ever unlock and emailing the support web site doesn't do any good either. They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time.  Don't waste your time on this game.  Go out and find yourself something worth playing because this surely isn't it.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD CAN NOT BE COMPLETED DUE TO A BUG!!!!!!  After buying you eventually get to the accordion level just before leaving the prison roof only for one (or 2 on some phones) ball being outside the play area which makes the mini game impossible.  Many reviews all over the internet highlighting this bug but the developer has not bothered to fix it.  AVOID THIS DEVELOPER !!!!!!!!!!

It would be a good game if it didn't keep freezing up on me. It's a shame too because I really love these types of games (like Escape from the Titanic). Couldn't get past the level where the inmate has the task of cleaning the glass pane and has to gain entry into the clerks' office...it just freezes up and I can't resolve it no matter what I tried.

It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.I tried  to complete many offers such as surveys, installing a playing another game for certain level, but this game never unlocked no matter what! They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time. This game has highly disappointed me.

On a serious note, you need to give me this game for free. I downloaded and played two different games to get the game for free and 5 hours later I still don't have the full game. I've had to install 5 different games just to get this one for free and I STILL don't have the full game. I'm not impressed!!!

Game is ok.  Tasks are sometimes unclear.  After a few tasks you have to pay to keep going or complete some offer.  Tried several times, but never lets me continue.  Should say it's a trial version in description.  No clue how it got a 4+ star rating.

descriptionHTML:
No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...

Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?

Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.

With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock! ....Good luck!

• 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.
• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.
• Hints and Answers available as IAP

Escape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.

comments: Purchasing the other ponies is worth it. Don't know why other people are complaining. It's only 5 dollars, you could get a DQ lunch for 5 dollars. Anyways, game is amazing. What's cool is that you can reset your progress so you can have fun all over again. Amazing work Budge Studios!

This game is my 5 yr olds favorite thing to do during trips. She loves the music and animation, and the gameplay is entertaining enough to keep her engaged. It's definitely worth the few bucks to get the add free version.

Installed it, launched it, after the bungie screen was presented by a full screen ad for some game involving a woman + handcuffs + panties. Not a good look for a game aimed at children, my 6 year old was standing behind me.

Why advertise the game as "free" when it really isn't?  You can only get so far with the "free ponies" before you hit a pay wall that requires parents to purchase additional ponies to finish the quest.  The reason I say "free ponies" is that your child is subjected to a ridiculous amount of ads in order to play. The only way to get rid of the ads is to buy the ponies.  Even though my daughter loves the game and it's easy for a 5 year old to play, I had to uninstall it due to the ad content.  You really should be more careful who you solicit ads from for content designed for children under 8.
Ads popped up every 45 seconds. I timed it. Made the game useless for my son (4). And he really wanted to play it too.

My daughter loves this game so much! Good job guys. However we need your help, i made a purchase to unlock all ponies, however, somehow they got locked again and we needed to purchase again to unlock everyone. It was kinda disappointing, please help us on this matter.

Run, jump, fly and restore the colors of the world with all your favorite ponies!

Budge Studios™ presents My Little Pony Rainbow Runners! A powerful color-stealing spell has been unleashed on Ponyville and it’s up to your favorite ponies to break it with the power of Friendship! Run, jump, awaken your ponies’ Rainbow Powers and use their epic abilities to bring the colors back to the world!

A COLOR FILLED ADVENTURE
• PLAY exciting missions all over Ponyville!
• RUN to close the color-stealing portals, one platform at a time!
• JUMP, FLY and SLIDE to avoid obstacles, holes and muddy puddles!
• TRANSFORM your ponies into their epic Rainbow Power form!
• COLLECT Pony Power and upgrade your ponies’ Rainbow Powers
• EMBARK on a personal quest with each pony

6 PONIES, EACH WITH THEIR OWN RAINBOW POWER AND SUPER FORM
• PRINCESS TWILIGHT SPARKLES: Clears the way of obstacles with her Magic Blast
• PINKIE PIE: Jumps higher than ever with her Mega Bounce
• RAINBOW DASH: Dashes and smashes through obstacles with her Rainboom
• RARITY: Attracts Pony Power with her Magnetic Personality
• APPLEJACK: Turns obstacles into apple sauce with her Apple Strike
• FLUTTERSHY: Glides gracefully over and above anything with her Super Flight

descriptionHTML:
Discover the fantastic world of Masha and the bear through these 30 educational games. You will love it! The educational games of Masha and the bear are aimed at children up to 6 years old.

This game is based on the characters of the popular serie that deals with the adventures of Masha, a girl who is cared for by a bear and her friends, animals like the tiger, wolf, penguin, squirrel, hare...

Masha and the Bear Educational Games is composed of 6 different categories of games for children to have fun:

- Paint and color: the most fun drawings to paint with colors.
- Word Search: learn words in different languages
- Memorize objects and silhouettes: They will help improve visual perception and memory.
- Solve puzzles: with pieces of different sizes and shapes.
- Music and instruments: play the xylophone, the piano or the drums.
- Simple numbers and operations: learn the numbers from 1 to 10.

A series of games featuring the characters of the children's favorite TV series with which they will learn while having fun playing alone, with friends or with parents.

Your kids will love playing with the educational games of Masha and the bear with which they will enjoy hours of entertainment and assured fun.

The "Masha and the Bear" series has become a family hit worldwide because it is a smart and fun entertainment designed to educate both children and parents. Masha and The Bear educates children about true friendship in a fun and intelligent way.

THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!

Edujoy has more than 60 games for children of all ages; from kindergarten to teens.

comments: I love this game. Its and absolute tome waster and lovely to play. However, I had set my phone to the side to let it play out (as I was over 1400) and it reset on its own. I had cleared the screen the round previously so there was no chance of me losing to that. It was behind me and I never would have reset it. Is this some sort of glitch? If it is, please fix it soon. Aside from this, this is amazing.

I beat my high score, & watched the ad to get a second turn.  Great right?  Apparently not.  I always try to press the back button to get out of ads once they are over, but that didn't work.  So I pressed the 'X' in the top right corner & boom... The #&$@&#@ Play Store opens... So I went to close it... & The Play Store replaced the game!!!! So when I closed it, I closed the game... So yeah I'm pretty triggered.  I PRESSED THE 'X'!  The game itself is awesome. But now I'm triggered.  Please fix that.

I really, really love this game, but, I keep losing my ball count and I don't understand why this is happening. For instance, I have 90 balls and I'm supposed to have 92, I don't get the 92. I will give 5 stars until the bug is fixed. The ads I don't care about because that only happens at the end of each game which is ok. Please fix this so I can give you 5 stars.  Update- I figured out why I keep losing my count with my balls. Everytime I get the balls by the number blocks, it wouldn't count themüòê I could get a lot further if this was fixed. description: Fit words into a grid in this popular game, often seen in puzzle magazines as fill-ins. The grid looks like a crossword, but there are no normal clues. Instead you must find the right place in the grid for each word from a given list. The game has an easy to use interface. Either drag-and-drop the words to their correct position, or tap the grid and then the word.Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.‚Ä¢ Play an unlimited number of different puzzles!!‚Ä¢ Multiple difficulty options. Start with easy puzzles. Then change the settings to play more challenging puzzles.‚Ä¢ Game contains achievements integrated into Google Play's "Game Services".Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.You can configure:1) Grid size    Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.2) Screen layout    Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.3) Minimum & Maximum word length     This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).4) Starting letters     The game can start with one or more letters already placed in the grid, in order to help you get started.5) Language     Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries.  24 languages are currently available (see below).6) Orientation    Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".Other features unique to this app:1) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.2) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!3) Your can also play and fit with numbers and symbols in addition to wordsDictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later
descriptionHTML:
Fit words into a grid in this popular game, often seen in puzzle magazines as fill-ins. The grid looks like a crossword, but there are no normal clues. Instead you must find the right place in the grid for each word from a given list. The game has an easy to use interface. Either drag-and-drop the words to their correct position, or tap the grid and then the word.
Play with an English word list or choose one of 23 other languages.

• Play an unlimited number of different puzzles!!
• Multiple difficulty options. Start with easy puzzles. Then change the settings to play more challenging puzzles.
• Game contains achievements integrated into Google Play's "Game Services".

Designed for fun games from the smallest mobile phones up to the largest tablets.

You can configure:

1) Grid size
Specify exactly how many columns and rows to use (from 3 to 20). Even non square grids (e.g. 12x15) are possible.
2) Screen layout
Choose how much screen space for the grid and how much for the word list, using our unique movable split bar.
3) Minimum & Maximum word length
This helps avoid searching for many small words (a common problem in word apps). Also useful for specifying really difficult games (e.g. set both minimum and maximum word length to three).
4) Starting letters
The game can start with one or more letters already placed in the grid, in order to help you get started.
5) Language
Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries. 24 languages are currently available (see below).
6) Orientation
Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically.

This app gives you the ultimate power to play the game just the way you want.

Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level.
Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services".

Other features unique to this app:

1) View the definition of the word from an online source (e.g. Wiktionary), optimized for viewing on a small screen.
2) When you play with a word list in a foreign language, the word definition will (where possible) be in your own language. This is great for language learning!
3) Your can also play and fit with numbers and symbols in addition to words

Dictionaries available are English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

There is the basis of a good game here. However the fact that the grammar is atrocious makes it very difficult to decipher what areas you should be investigating for certain quests.   I find myself having to just randomly walk around hoping to come across what I'm looking for. I enjoy the game but feel that this matter needs addressed to avoid wasting time aimlessly walking.

A surprisingly good game and relatively easy to pick despite the lack of any guide/tutorial. I would have given it 5 stars but not being able to play same game on several devices brings it down. Fix that, and some of the English grammar, and I'll up my score.

A hidden gem. Premium currency is handed out in enough amounts to buy important things. Easy enough to figure out but a lack of a tutorial could turn away some. Only reason I took a star away because musketeer class line has high dex and str scaling skills..??

3 out of 4 members of the team died and the last one cannot carry the weight and I'm stuck because I have maximum load and I cannot leave the fight drop cannot collect cannot leave. I can't do anything. A big problem that should have been anticipated.. fixed

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

======Contact Us======
Follow our Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2
Join Discussion: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groups

comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

The game was fine for 4 days. Do understand that that is maybe 40 min game play as it is so restricted. However it was a nice enough game that I was prepared to work with that. Today it has a bug, it requires me to click a certain button to continue, a button which is not onscreen. No way to proceed. Contacted WB and was told to file a report. Filed a report and the reply was you will not receive and answer.....well that's an unusual approach to customer service. I now have no option but to uninstall.  I could install it again, but really is there any reason to believe it won't have more similar issues?

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Decent premise. I'd love this game if only you had more life available. It makes you use several rounds of life to get these stars but then makes you use 1 star per task. Its extremely tedious. I do enjoy the scene hunts you basically have to find the objects in the picture, and get points which add up to a star.  It just moves too slowly....

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

comments: The game had me hooked as I spent a week trying to find a character and job class I liked. Keep in mind that you will be doing a lot of grinding, but leveling is not surprisingly unreasonable.  There are some aspects that will make you believe you have to pay to win, but it is not necessary. Although it would be cool to help the devs or too. All in all love the game and can't seem to put it down ( I let it auto-grind while I live my life. Haha).

Well, I loved the looks of it. Seemed really fun so I downloaded it. Then I spent 30 min downloading the patches, to find out at the very end I didnt have enough space on my phone. Uninstalled as much as I could, and still didn't have enough space... Could have said in details of the game how much space it REALLY takes up... Would have been really nice to know.  -a not so happy consumer

So, far really love to play. I only just started though. The controls are hard but that's probably because I'm playing on a tablet and I got small hands. Unfortunately, I don't think I'll be able to continue playing this. For some reason it makes my tablet terrifyingly hot to the point I'm concerned. I'll hold on to the app for now in case it gets better in the future.

An amazing mmo that really does a great job of handling farming, the game play although has an auto feature still utilizes the controls. The depth of all the items and armor and weapons is awesome. I've been really happy playing this game. The clans are great. The 30 vs 30 opensiege is a nice feature. This game is super fun even for the people that want to play for free. Netmarble does a great job with daily rewards, login bonuses, and events that all allow for players to get great items for free!! Best game I've played in a long while. Only thing is constant crashes and bad story line. The game keeps me turning it back on and I haven't went one day without logging in.

Addicting game with auto-questing and battling. You can choose to do it manually, which I do for boss fights. I don't have to buy anything from the shop, in fact, you get free gear every day! The graphics are amazing for a mobile game with it being an MMO. I have a Note 8, so it does run really well. I play with my monitor using SideSync for full screen awesomeness. There is a lot to do for all types of players, being in a guild doing dungeons reminds me of the old-school MMORPGs of sieging and doing weekly raids.

Everything about this game is really good, but since this update today I can't even open the game it keeps closes and sending me to my home screen on my phone... Doesn't give me a error report or any messages just closes the app. Id really like to continue playing please fix . Galaxy S8+

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

Good concept, but wont really teach you anything about coding. Lacks the ability to change anything once a loop is initiated, aside from resetting all your work. Game is also very short and puzzles tend to vary from hard to easy and back again with little reason. There is also a lack of a hint option for anyone who is stuck. Game has potential, but seems more like an early beta release.

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Great puzzle game. Good for introducing programming concepts in a fun way. Suggested improvements: A way to break out of infinite loop without losing work. Also noticed that steps cannot be edited after pressing stop part way through simulation. Hats off to the devs overall. I'm looking forward to future puzzles.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.
description: Do you want to improve your Coding logic skill?Coding Planets is Educational, Brain training and puzzle game. In this game, you have to give instructions for a robot to solve the puzzles.  Every ages can play the game.Nowadays, Programming is very essential. descriptionHTML:
Do you want to improve your Coding logic skill?
Coding Planets is Educational, Brain training and puzzle game. In this game, you have to give instructions for a robot to solve the puzzles. Every ages can play the game.
Nowadays, Programming is very essential. And every country developing the applications for learning programming so we developed this for local.
It is exactly bring to you the amazing things.

Special thanks to our team LM-17/01(SamsungTechInstitute2017).
developerAddress: Yangon, Myanmar
summary: Play game and learn Coding Logic skills.
title: Coding Planets

comments: I bought the mission mule, and it gave me nothing. I even got a confirmation email from Google play. I thought it was just because he's a mule, and I am in the savannah, but I still had to watch a video to get missions. So 1 star. Will rate 5 if I get my unlimited missions  EDIT: The team at yodo1 got back to me in 24 hours, and helped me understand what was up with the mission mule.  Amazing game. Everyone I tell about it, gets addicted to it.

This game was played by my sister, than I wanted to play it as soon as I saw it, cause of its amazing graphics. Now that I'm playing it, I just had to rate it. But I had to wait but I never ever preset the never show me again because I knew I was going to rate it some day. And I guess that was today. Love you created a of rodeo staped! And the people who play it too!!‚ù§

Love this game It's very Addicting. I don't want to say to much because I'm still trying to figure it out. **update**  I understand how to play it better now. I want you to know I don't really play much In the way of games anymore but a friend showed me this game and now I'm addicted to it. Also wanted to mention that I'm 49 years old so in saying that this game is for the young and old alike.

Game is addictive and fun to play, great sense of reward when you discover and tame a new / rare animal, however there are way too many ads. Every time I die in the game there is a high chance for an ad which really puts the fun fast paced gameplay behind bars. Adds for deaths should only occur once you pass a distance of 3000 or more distance, as you already must have enough ad revenue from doubling coins on a opening and after a run.

The game is very fun itself but after some time it wouldnt work and im still trying to make it work again. It says download fail when i turn it on even though i have had it for almost a year now. But overall a fun addictive game
Great game, I play it when I have a lot of free time. However, I am stuck on a boss mission, I wish there was a way to skip it or replace it like with the other types of missions.

comments: So I LOVE THIS GAME. I beat it once and had to uninstall it due to space issues. I couldn't find it until now. It is a very nice game controls graphics everything on point. Overall my review is 4 stars. ONLY because it needs more levels as the difficulties aren't extra levels but just harder  versions of those so maybe more levels and islands if possible and more stick warriors and it can even go into the skies or galaxy or so although I don't know if that sounds like too much but more levels. If it had multiplayer (online as optional) also, so u can play offline but if u want multiplayer u get online. I'm not trying to be picky. Such an awesome game finished too quickly.

I loved the original. I've gotta say though, the part with the wizard dying and the endless mode game over scene is kinda sad. Also i found a glitch, if you go to tournament mode and select an icon you haven't unlocked yet and then go to the main menu. You can go back into tournament mode and you'll have the icon even though you didn't unlock it.
Its a good game up until you play on anything other than normal. The upper difficulties make it impossible to progress past spartans unless you buy gems and get power ups, smh

I love the game but its frustrating when you have all 8 Spartans and the sword guys get in the way so maybe an extras set of controls to control where your men start or something. Also for me the screen keeps jumping I try to look at enemy and I catch a glimpse but then it jumps to my side then back again and again and again please fix this.

Great game. Seriously like my fav app. One minor glitch they needed to patch though is that, at least for me, it's not giving me the achievements for the zombie mode. Like I've survived 24 nights but I don't even have the achievements for"survive 5 nights". I should have all the achievements unlocked but I don't because some of the zombie achievements I'm not receiving for some reason. But besides that minor annoyance, it really is a sweet app.i used to play the classic version back in the day and I was so happy when I found out they made it into an app. Right now my goal is to win the tournament mode on insaine 100 times, I'm currently at 59. GG!

This is one of the most awesome game of all time and thanks to the creators you can play it on mobile too. But it still lack some awesome components, 1. Add Chaos Empire, 2. Add multiplayer!!! Overall still AWESOME!!!
description: One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!New Features:‚óè	Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?‚óè	Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads! ‚óè	Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"Campaign Mode:In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war. The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear. You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.
descriptionHTML:
One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!

Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!

New Features:
● Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?
● Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads!
● Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"

Campaign Mode:
In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war.

The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear.

You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.
developerAddress: 1A-205 Chatelain Drive, St Albert, Alberta, Canada, T8N5A4
recentChanges: - New translations!
- Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?

comments: Right most of my day has just disappeared whilst playing this came. It's extremely engaging, sucking you in with its simple yet elegant menus. Race day and management options are stream lined but complex enough to do the job. I do feel like some kind of driver training scheme wouldn't go a miss but we can't have everything. It's definitely worth your attention, fantastic product.

Great distraction Top job over Xmas, TV was lacking this wasn't! Be great to see some more features, perhaps making races longer and qualifying a little more technical. Introduction of suspension set up and track condition could be cool. The amount of stuff to start off with as a new person is just right though. May put others off being too complex. Hope this helps!

Great game, been playing for just two days and I already love it. Tutorial at the beginning could be better though and maybe some more instructions as you progress through the game? It's fun, realistic and fairly addictive. Doesn't need WiFi, so you can play it anywhere. Would be fun if you could actually see the cars during races rather that just coloured dots. But all in all, I'd really recommend this. It's not good enough that I'd pay money for it, but then again I have yet to find a mobile game that (in my opinion) is.

I love everything about this game, entertaining, addictive and I can lose hours playing!   I have a question for the developer though - I have just changed phones, and I have been trying to transfer my profile to my new phone by playing and then uploading my progress from Google Play Games. However I can't  manually save my game progress on the old device and transfer the progress to the new one. Could you tell me how I can do this, as otherwise I will need to start all over again on my new device (and I'm nearing the end of the game!)  Thanks, and keep up the great work!

I really like this game. Very addictive and very enjoyable.great when im on my way to work to just run through several races. The only setback id say way history of your own car could be better. For example history of drivers that you have hired over the years of development. Thats just me being picky though. If you love racing games with a tactical feel. Then you will love this.

The best app ive ever played What else can I say, being a racing fanatic this game is perfect to me. As long you understand the game and strategize perfectly, you wont be dissappointed. I even deleted my sim city app because of this addictive game. Btw as of this review Im on the continental super cup winning like hell, saving up some money for upgrading my HQ and wages for my 2 drivers with 99 overall. Thanks you Christian West for this game. Cheers from the Philippines!

So basically I just sat down to play stick hero. And my goal at the end of the day is to reach at least 100 cherries. Same today. But as I start playing I don't find any cherries on my path. "That is weird!" I say to myself. I try to double tap to get cherries it doesn't allow it. So I go to the home page to see how many cherries I have ..... the icon isn't even there???   Despite that concern, love the game its so much fun ! For u people who are looking for a fun catchy game to play here is the perfect game. Please download so much fun and a great game to put on your device!

Awesome but I have some ideas This game is awesome and it never ceases to make me happy. But buying new characters is kind of pointless. Developers you probably won't see this or even care if you do but I think that when you buy new characters the characters should have abilities that you use once a round for free or you can refresh the ability using cherries.

Amazing game...nice timepass.. I love this game.. It is good for kids and I enjoy playing this.. The game doesn't hang and I can't just stop my fingers writing the review.. In the first level o thought it's going to be hard but to my surprise it was easy and smooth... And I loved.. For hours I kept playing it untilthe battery was dead!! The other parts of the game are nice as well especially the voice one!!! Do downloadüòä

False Advertising I mean, in a way. The help example is slower than the actual game. The platform grows faster and the guy runs across instead of the leisurely stroll in the 'tutorial'. Maybe have an option for speed, slower or faster depending on what the player feels like tackling that day. Still a fun game, but come on. We're not all finger-ninjas.

Simply but satisfying It's a very addictive game. I think the little character(s) are adorable. The only complaint I have is when you grab a cherry and then you fall because the stick isn't long enough-in my opinion you should still get the cherry put in your "bank". I also like the watermelon level.

comments: Being honest this is the best puzzle game I've played so far with some really new concepts. The game is so finished and classy. Just fell in love with this game. This game gave me a thought that there could never be any other puzzle game better than it but right after i completed this game i came to know about its sequel 'RED' and i am looking forward to it. RED is already in download. Super excited to play it. Awesome work BART.‚ù§Ô∏è

You're just plain fun! You really understand the right amount of challenge to keep it fun but not aggravating. Have to admit I did use some hints. May I make a teeny weeny suggestion. Make a link at end to "rate the game," I wanted to, looked around, in end clicked link to play red then find yellow to do this rating... that's cuz I like yah... thanks for the smile!

This is as simple as it can be, yet perfect in every way. Relaxing music that doesn't distract you from your game, smooth gameplay, easy controls. I liked the fact that you are tossed into the game without any tutorials, left on your own. I am not really into puzzle games but I completed this game in a single afternoon and it had me asking for more.

Just finished this one less than 5 minutes ago, I'd definitely have to say I enjoyed red more. yellow had some more difficult puzzles. Some of them were (kinda?) reused in red. I overall enjoyed it a lot!   I'm really looking forward to the next one!

It's so captivating I finished it in a single morning! I love how challenging the puzzles are at the same time they are fun. The level 49 made me go crazy because I couldn't get it right, I had to draw the squares  so I wouldn't press the wrong one. I totally loved it and I'm so going to download red!

The color... Only yellow..its just yellow!! I've played this game once amd its taken over my life. My bedroom walls were once blue..now all I see is yellow! My red hair is yellow, my brown cat is yellow.. Everything IS YELLOW. As I sink further into the eternal abyss of yellow, I can only scream. God has abandoned this app.. God save us all

comments: It's a great looking game, the controls are good as well. The major problem I have with it is the ads are oppressive. They play after almost every round and the rounds are sometimes very short because you only get one shot per round. I think as far as the design goes you should really have more than 1 hp or have a infinite mode where the bullets don't kill you because it's really is irritating how quickly a round can end on you
What a shame that this game has been ruined by too many ads, because it's actually kind of fun.  But the ads are just ridiculous.  Regretfully uninstalled due to that reason.
I have not played the game yet BUT IF YOU GUYS DINT WANT ADDS TURN YOUR WIFI OFF ISNT IT OBVIOUS
Autoplay video ads are a cancer. The devs should be ashamed.
Ad popped up and i instantly deleted the game.
It's a nice game. But so many ads!!!!! Even if u watch all ads for more life's and i'm not gonna buy that game.

comments: I'm incredibly thankful for this game. Finally there is a game that is enjoyable, relaxing, calming and the best way to take my mind off of the worries all around us. Words cannot fully express what this game means to me! Thanks to the developers I look forward to playing everytime. The music is wonderful! I highly recommend this game. Thanks again ‚ô°

As much as I understand that you want to make a few bucks, the amount of advertising and the way the advertising is being presented has gradually become quite intrusive and annoying. I would much rather pay a one time license fee that this crabby implementation of user annoyance  / advertising. The other problem is that on the high end phones (read pixel 2) the board are so big that the tiles as a consequence are made very small so they fit with a final result that makes it very difficult to see/read

I think the game is great. I love Mahjong. I'm unhappy that I paid 1.99 to stop the ads but when I collect my 2,000 coin bonus I still have to watch an ad to receive the bonus. I will not be paying 1.99 next month just to still have to watch ads.
The latest update places advertising banners in the play area. You can't move them or play around them and I don't want to install the advertisement app.  They suck out loud.
Addicting! Amazing! And when you message support for anything, you get a HUMAN replying, (not some automated reply) and they are awesome! Love everything about this game!

Does not even lay tiles down in a solvable fashion. Had no repeats thus shud be solvable in any order, wasn't, what's the point? Sort ur algorithm out.  Also, non stop ads and u want us to pay monthly for ad free? ¬£8 one off fee wud b highest I went for an app I'd want to keep

comments: Just constant ads. Every time you go into a menu you haved to watch an ad. After awhile you need gems for every upgrade. P2P gameplay and ads filled. Gameplay is good, but this game seem to only be maded as a cash grab.
They begged me to rate. But i like it, Stop asking me to rate. I Only like GAMES with painting abilities. Okay?
The developers have gone to this same well so many times it has become a joke.create the same game over and over again with a different graphics package. Repeat ad nauseam.

The game is alright. What attracted me to this evolution game in particular was how the phoenixes looked. I killed a few hours on this game, and I decided it's not for me. The ads are also way too frequent. I get that you guys have bills to pay, but I literally get an ad each time I go to Mars. There are also a few grammatical errors here and there, as well as an audio error I noticed. When I go to change the colors of my phoenixes and get interrupted by an ad (everytime I might add), the menu music and the main page music overlap each other. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if it didn't happen every single time I opened up that menu. The game itself can get boring after a while as well, so I'd only recommend this game if you have absolutely nothing better to do. Overall, it's an okay game, but it's absolutely swamped with ads and that really kills it for me.
Cute and delightful, the game is well worth some time. It's addictive gameplay is marred by the tap mechanics in so many other games.

I LOVE PHENIXES!!!  I love them so much I made up a warrior cat named Phenix paw. THANK YOU SOOOOOO MUCH FOR MAKING PHENIX EVOLUTION!!!!!!!!!!!!üê§ I know there not birds but they don't have phenixs but phenixs are birds on fire.

descriptionHTML:
How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!

Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!

No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!

(...or at least as long as you keep playing).

LEGENDARY FEATURES

🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.

HOW TO PLAY

🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix
🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge
🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!
🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🔥Doodle-like illustrations
🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)

What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.

If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Bought all the babies when I first downloaded the app. Everything was working great. So when the most recent (3) babies were available for purchase I bought them, but now those babies don't work!.... I'll give five stars when you get them to work. In the meantime, I think I should get a refund on my money.

My daughter loves this game and plays it all the time. I just bought her all of the last babies today for her to have them all and the bottle freezes and she can't play with her new babies. If someone could fix this for me or refund me that would be great. I just got 6 new babies and she can't use any of them which is ashame cause she loves this game.

I would like to give a better rating, since my 3yld loves this app.  But the newest babies are not working and there is no support on the Disney app page.  Would love to get this issue reported and fixed before they try to screw everyone over with 3 more dolls that freeze the game.

Bought the game early on, then after an update with new babies they mixed the new babies in.  So you are left with a child constantly wanting the new babies.  A horrible money grab.  Otherwise a fun game.  Shoyld not show the locked babies mixed in with purchased ones.

Dang, I wish the purchases I made on 6 more babies for my daughter would just work! She loves the app, but gets frustrated that the whole app freezes when she clicks to play one of the other babies. Wouldn't recommend this app because of that... it's just stealing my money..

Downloaded this game for my daughter and we never got to play because the game will not load. It gets stuck on the bottle screen and then has a black screen after that. She has Nabi tablet, so I will keep the app for now and just disable it. Please fix soon!!!

descriptionHTML:
Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself!


• CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.
Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.
• Care for your baby dolls by bathing, feeding, napping, and playing fun, interactive games with them.
• You can even capture their special moments and earn stickers in your very own customizable baby book.

So much to do!
• 12 baby dolls: Collect all nine—each with a unique theme, nursery, outfits & accessories
• Meal time: Feed your baby doll different yummy meals
• Play time: Bond with ticklish laughs and giggles
• Peek-a-boo: Surprise and delight to watch their silly responses
• Bath time: Give a soothing bath with lots of bubbles and fun
• Change station: Change diapers and play dress up with adorable outfits
• Nap time: Soothe your baby doll to sleep with different sights & sounds
• Baby Book: Capture your baby dolls’ special moments in your very own, customizable baby book
• Bouncer: Play with many activities like the xylophone, twirly flower and more
• Birthday Party: Decorate and celebrate with fun party themes, including your very own cake
• Doc McStuffins and Lambie are on-call to lend a helping hand!

Like us on Facebook for cool games tips & the latest news: www.Facebook.com/DisneyGames.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. This mobile app contains in-app purchases and advertising messages, including the option to watch ads for rewards. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, adjust your device settings. This is a limited app experience. The full, unlimited app experience is available to purchase at the conclusion of the limited experience. Not all levels or characters are included in the free experience. We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings.

This app uses the Read/Write_external_storage function to save your game's progress.
This app uses your mic to trigger on-screen interactions and animations.

Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.com
Children’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/
Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com

comments: My only issue with this game is that u almost have to end up purchasing tix to continue to play. App should provide ways to earn more tix, either thru a daily spin or higher rewards. *(since app developer replied to this review, I changed my review to 4 stars)

I really like this Bingo  game.  A few upgrades and it will  be better than all the other Bingo games.  I love the amount of tickets it gives you to play.  I love the extra stuff you can earn and not have to pay for.  A couple of things that would  make this game better would be all 4 cards on one screen in tablet mode, the power ups being applied automatically  and being able to daub that last number that's  called cause usually that's the one needed for Bingo.  Otherwise its great.  I hope  you find this useful.  I understand  if you can't  fix all three of these but the first 2 are more important  than the last and i understand  there can only be a certain amount of bingos i guess.  Thank you.  Real close to being a 5 but those 3 issues really hold me back as I'm  sure it does others as well.

I'm about to uninstall now. Its not the FIRST time this happened. But it will be the last! #GoodbyeBingo

comments: Don't get me wrong, this game is great, its fun, addictive and all around a 5 star, but I gave it only 1 because even if my internet connection is perfectly stable, I still crash mid-game because of "connection issues". And its not only once or twice, I've had days where I am hours upon hours trying to play, but I can't, sometimes I even crash before the game itself has started, so that's why I only gave it 1 star.

This game is a game I can proudly say I will never delete. I hadn't played this game for very long but I have loved it so much. The game is incredibly fast paced so you can play up to about 4 games in 10 minutes. It's never boring and always keeps you on your toes. Both sides are fun. (I feel the sniper needs a buff but this is just my opinion). Other than that small compliant  I love this game.

It was very fun testing the early access! And the thing that i noticed was the new token system. Im not saying the token system was bad, but i liked the older system better. On how there were bronze, silver, and gold stars, and the star depended how good the item was. I was wondering why you changed it. –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è!

Excellent game. Highly replayable. Fun and challenging. My only issue is that emotes switch from one side to the other when playing as a thief vs playing as a sniper. Plus, having to hit a button to fire vs just hitting the right side of the screen is a bit more difficult. Otherwise, almost perfect game.

WARNING: YOU WILL BE HOOKED AS SOON AS YOU START THE GAME. The game is really cool, I love the gadgets, the replayability, variety of maps, and how this could be free to play. Even though there are alot of glitches, these improvements will make up for them

Its greedy from the developer to make bigger price of silver and other chests every time when i get close enough to amout of gold needed for buying it. First the price of silver chest was 80 then when i got 60gold price gone to 110 then when i had 90 gold it got up to 130 its like they are pushing me to spend money and i never did that. Good game but so greedy that it deservs one star!!!!

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

Excellent game!!  Very addicting!  Can't put it down!!  :)  Only reason I am downgrading it to 3 stars is because of the horrible unfairness of what levels can attack other levels.  Like being a level 8 and being attacked by a level 28.  Needs to be fixed fast!!  One player will comme in and wipe out all of an Alliance that is much lower in power and defenseless.

One of the most unattractive games I've ever come across. Good idea to fill up the playing screen with so many icons, yeah that's not going to be a irritation for me when I'm trying to click on something. "Build an empire" they say. Well, with such bad graphics. I don't think I'll even bother building one. Horrible. That's the word for it.

The game has a lot of fun and addictive features. Its major drawback is that it's geared towards people who can spend $1000s  Don't get me wrong, it is still a great game, but if you don't plan to spend on a major scale, you will be disappointed

the customer support is the worst I've ever encountered. after a full month mailing back and forth I feel like I'm talking with idiot's. they don't care about there customers only taking your money. do not download, there are many different games out there who know how to look after there loyal players. don't waste your time or money. if your not Chinese they don't care

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.

comments: I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!

Awesome game and graphics, but pretty much have to spend money if you wanna compete. Should have more races available a t all times. Need to make ALL cars accessible to purchase, with preferably money earned in the game and not $20 of real money or depend on luck to get a good car in "rare imports". Especially, when available races are so limited, supply races, etc., unless you're satisfied with just regulation races.

Easy.to control. Great.graphics!!! Keep up the great work!!!!! Next make a truck one or bike. PunisherüëçJust updated and the game gets better and better! I even got my father playing. Keep up the good work CSR!! üòâ It has lost a bit from me and my father when I bought a set of keys and all three cars were the same. Just different colors. So I felt screwed over! You'd think a popular game would make good of it!....üòû I keep winning the same cars. It's getting boring.. It started off good then went down hill. I think you should win a special car when you reach a certain level ..

Why can't you buy keys from your winnings? Should also be able to buy parts you need instead of the random stuff from " Donna Banks". Graffics are great. Online racing is ok. Wish the game wouldn't freeze in the middle of a race. Takes way to much space on your phone

descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN

I downloaded this game for my little sister and the first thing she said was that there are way too many adverts and I agree because whenever she clicked on say the dress up or nail salon or gym and adverts would always come up. The game also lags too much even though she has a brand new IPad. However at this time I would not recommend this game. As well as the advert problems the game keeps telling me to buy everything and it pops up every time I think when you press the 'X' button it shouldn't show again. Please fix this now. As much as my sister loves this game the adverts really annoy her. Would not recommend this game!!

descriptionHTML:
All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!

WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!

Features:
> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours!
> Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!
> Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"
> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!
> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!
> Look like a real star gymnast! Get a makeover, a manicure, and a new hairstyle!
> Hit the gym & get in shape before the competition!
> OMG! Golden Gymnast magazine just asked you to be on their cover! Photo shoot, here you come!
> Impress the judges with stellar aerobic gymnastics moves like side aerials, triple full layouts, triple pikes, backward rolls & more!
> Ugh - gymnastics injury. No worries - the doctor will treat you in time for the big competition!
> Relax at the spa before the big day. You deserve it after all that hard work!
