decent minimalist animation, so game is smooth since u are against ai/bot. pretty much wont lose, when u have unlock all item and stats. need an update for tournament against real player. and additional moves or trick to create a bit complexity and thrill to the game. if u like something easy and relaxing this is the game.

Game was too easy. 99.4% winrate and just passed 6500 trophies. I was expecting more but unlocking elite level tournament was all. Even after winning elite tournament nothing happened. Its a bottomless pit, there is no more progression after reaching 6500 trophies and winning elite level. Basic games nowadays have at least a multiplayer mode with leaderboard for trophies. That would be a big game changer for this but for now, no purpose in this game at all

descriptionHTML:
The most competitive badminton games ever! Take on your friends in 1 vs 1 mode, or win the Badminton League trophy🏆 in Tournament Mode!

Customizing your character with tons of items. And level up your ability to do stronger smash and jump!

Now grab your racket to smash, hit the shuttlecock, do a crazy smash to your opponent like badminton star!

Features:
- Multiple game modes available, play with sports fans in local
- Create your very own character, and level - up
- Easy to control, challenging to win
- Simple and elegant UI design
- Cool stunts and realistic hitting shuttlecock experience
- Numerous gorgeous badminton outfits

How to play with friends in 1 vs 1 Mode:
1. Connect the same WiFi or Personal Hotspot with your friends
2. Open "Badminton League" and select 1 vs 1 Mode together
3. Bet with coins, tap "HOST" to create a room, then waiting for your friend to join
4. Check the name which shows on the board, then tap to join
5. Now you will know who is the Newbie

Remind your friends to download Badminton League before above operation :)

This game needs an internet connection to play.

comments: Its Cool but there is a lot of Flaws,  like the Gem system? 9.9  I can't update my special if I don't use Gem?   Upgrade system,  cost a lot and I earn little per completing stages so?  Gg!    More like play to win game!  Then every stage,  has 5sec adds..  I can't even have option to say NO?..  So 4 star coz it made me like it!  It has potential but it needs major changes tho~

Could of been 5 star. But Jesus the ads! You spend 40% of your time outside a match watching adverts! Didn't these people make Deep Town? and that's done very well... Also you hit a pay wall at the ice area where you have to pay to win. Unless you log on every day and collect the 1 gem, then you can upgrade in about 2 months...

The time for upgrades only increments when the game is running and the phone is unlocked. That is ridiculous.  Upgrades take too long and the gold to buy them is gained too slowly during game play.  If I go check my mail, talk on the phone, dock the phone for the night, etc, no time passes on the upgrades. If there is 6 hours left on the upgrade when I go to sleep, there is still 6 hours left when I go back and check the game in the morning.

Terrible game. Set up horribly. Plenty of room for more towers and easier gameplay. Little room for personal strategy which in turn guides you to purchase crystals with real money to beat the game... another garbage excuse tor a tower defense

Great game overall, I haven't spent a $ on it and beat the game in under 2 weeks all stages 3 stars but 3 challenges that I need to still upgrade my towers to get 3 stars.   The one downside I see to this game so far is not enough maps or stages to do. Once you have completed all stages you kinda have to replay the survival endless maps over and over again to get gold... just adding new stages would make this game a 5 stars for me.

As with others, it has its appeal but there's no getting away from its flawed gameplay, rather than heading toward victory, achievement, accomplishments, success, and all those positive responses of older TDG's; we're led toward spending to succeed. It utterly avoids the aspects that made TD so appealing to users. I found it impossible to feel good winning as a result which defeated its purpose to an extent.  Overall, two üåü, for entertainment.

comments: It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actual online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. I'm not a fan of the game opening apps, especially when all it says is "watch a video". Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Awesome game absolutely loving it. Keep the daily events coming - without them there wouldn't be enough incentive to play every day and there wouldn't be enough stamina. My main recommendation is consider introducing upgrading equipment e.g. 10 bronze fuel cells give you 1 silver fuel cell. Also consider lowering the cost of stamina refill to say maybe 20 gold. Cheers

The game is awesome. But my galaxy core prime freezes every time I play a co-op mission even when closing the app and opening it again it will try to reconnect, once it's reconnected it will freeze again. I know you worked so hard on this game but please fix this.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

comments: It's a good game except for some reason it used over 5 gigabytes of data on wifi in the background for some reason or another. It uses your wifi even when you tell the game not to run in the background. I just think that's really strange and I demand an explanation for why it is using so much bandwidth on wifi. I'm only really concerned because I am on a metered connection.
A somewhat ok game, has apparent flaws in game design and UI, but overall an OK experience. Would recommend to those interested in management games which require constant focus.
More features would be cool... not too much though i like how simple it is... but more features for sure maybe more business start ups to choose from, maybe some other stuff to spend your money on.
A really good game , overall. Butbit does get a little boring after a long time of playing...
I probably would've rated five stars, but the hints keep popping up constantly and almost every time i go to upgrade my office, it pops up the "get more money!" thing,
This game really makes me aware of financial and risk perspective of business. Good job, hope more features can be made in the next update
description: Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning. The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible. The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way. However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame
descriptionHTML:
Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!

Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.

3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.

Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning.

The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.

Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible.

The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way.

However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame

comments: The game play is fun until you collect everything, there's a serious bug; the score is only 32-bit signed integer, which means score will never go above 2.15B even that I collected 10B in a game, but nothing changed after that. After you collect everything, there's nothing else you can do, I believe there are many ideas that Voodoo can implement.

Every now and then the application would randomly shut down and have to be restarted. You cannot have more than 2.15 billion points to spend at a time but you can earn as many points as you would like, but you still don't have more than 2.15 billion points to spend. This game is still very addictive, I am level 1,000 for shooter speed and level 600 for shooting power.

It's a great game but there is too many ads. Every time a games ends, it pops to and ad. The game is s good play and you can just sit in the middle, do nothing and not move to collecting points to up grade. That's because the course repeats, not very challenging.

The gameplay is pretty good. Although it doesn't feel like you're .aking any progress because the game will just keep getting harder. The reason why i rated it 1 star, is because of the ads. There is an ad every single tome after you die. I just couldnt take the ads

It's freezing up on me for the past 3 days . my score is 1.03 million. it's like they don't want you to get any higher . here I am asking to please fix this game. I had a high score of 20.8 billion and does not let me get pass 2 .15 billion it didn't give me the points

Constantly force stopping. Cannot finish a game without the game closing on me.  Update: uninstalled and reinstalled game and did not fix the problem. Uninstalling until game is fixed. Other then that game has potential.  Update 2: after installing the game again, it finally worked. But now I'm uninstalling the game for good.  After scoring over 7b points in 1 game, the game only gave me just over 2b points. Game is garbage. Do not download this game!

descriptionHTML:
My Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Ann open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious drinks and baked goods.

The first episodes of your coffee shop adventure begins as you set off to a quiet town and open your own classy cafe with your friend Ann! Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive kitchen & restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

Download My Cafe: Recipes & Stories and tell your cooking story!

Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:
★ Build and scramble a diner, pizza bakery, or restaurant – hire staff, buy furniture, improve the kitchen and set prices on the menu.
★ Design your coffee shop with tons of glamorous decorative items – After all, comfort is in the details! Be the brightest café on the street.
★ Discover baking and cooking, including special food and drinks like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake, and more. Feel the cooking fever in our eating game!
★ Develop your own business strategy and management take big risks or go for slow to ensure you make a profit and thrive in Cafeland game.
★ Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colorful customers for kids and adults. Gossip with regulars and choose your own responses to influence the direction of the story, and make new friends in your neighborhood. Each story is unique in My Cafe: Recipes & Stories!

Features:

My Restaurant, My Cafe Story
• Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Learn the stories of your regulars, influence their gossip life, make new friends and experience your own Kitchen Craze restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator.

Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets
• Coffee mania, fast food, dinners, desserts and hot drinks for cafe fans of pizza games from crazy kitchen!
• Bakery treats and restaurant eats!
• Special baking and cooking recipes like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake!

Restaurant Mania & Cafe Simulator
• Design your own coffee shop with over 900 decorative items
• Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks or going slow and steady.
• Manage restaurant staff, hire, train and fire your employees in our making food game

Customized Cafe & Bakery Story - Gossip & Intrigue Abound
• Coffee shop gossip goes a long way! Investigate the town’s story, see how characters fall in love, make their choices and discover secrets the whole cartoon city wants to know!

Play with friends
Go social – see how your Facebook friends are running their own coffee shops and townships in your favorite game!

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is the restaurant story of a lifetime inside a casual game! Gossip with cafe guests and meet new friends in a story mode so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a happy world chef and build your bakery, sushi cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking dash to make the best dishes and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way, choose your story and start a true!

However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay.

Note:
An internet connection is required to play our cooking game

SUPPORT
Chef, are you having a problem with the game? Please contact us by going to the game Settings > FAQ or visit https://goo.gl/Bw6QVb.
Our support service: http://melesta.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new

Play the best episode of games with your friends, including friends from Facebook, and bring your exciting restaurant story to life in the exciting new business simulator My Cafe: Recipes & Stories. Join in the fun!

Time management games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story.

How to develop your coffee shop and choose your own story:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame

comments: Love it! Very addictive.  Keeps my mind sharp. It used to give an option every 20 mins to watch an ad to get a hint.  But it doesn't seem to be doing that anymore.  It's very sporadic now.  I would give it 5 stars if that was fixed.

The game itself is quite good, although it'll take a long time to finish all the levels. I've noticed a number of users having problems syncing across from one device to another. I had the same problem from my old phone to another. The developers tried to sorry the problem but didn't. It's a good game to play, but play it on the same device throughout.

It was fun until I let my 7yo play. She used all my hints on lower levels so when I got stuck later I had nothing. Reinstall and clearing all data doesn't start it over to a new game. I just want a reset.

The game idea is fantastic, but you need some help on the app. As you progress naturally it gets harder and it's very difficult to exit a game in the middle of it. Sometimes your progress is lost. Need a way to save partial games. Other than that I love the game. Wonderful challenge.

Your dictionary needs updated!!! Does it only have 50 words in it? Because when I find extra words the game has no clue. Most important, the puzzles won't let you spell the word. I spelled candle 50 times, used all the hints and it spells cand,..it won't allow me to put in l, e. !! Because there is another pre-used letter between.  Game sucks due to these reasons.

Oh my gosh! I downloaded this game to test out for my mom who has suffered from a brain injury. The idea was to see if it was fun and interactive as well as giving her brain a bit of a work out/ stimulate recovery and memory. I found myself addicted to it so i downloaded it on my own phone too - even my step father is addicted ha! Its fabulous. I also recommend paying for the lowest package of 'hints' because all packages remove the adds (which are the only down side to this game. I paid 69p for 10 hints and it removed all the add - yay!)
description: Join more than 30 million brainiacs and try WordBrain - Brain training at its BEST! This is a word puzzle for true word geniuses! It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. Exercise your brain and find hidden words, slide your finger over them, and see the letters collapse. Do it all in the correct order and you will be able to clear the grid. As you get stuck on a level, which you probably will, remember that there are no unsolvable levels. So think carefully before each swipe and conquer the ultimate word challenge while keeping your brain in shape! WordBrain is available in 15 languages with 700 levels per language, so even the smartest word game enthusiasts will have a real challenge to complete this game. In fact, only very few have!---WordBrain has been lovingly created by MAG Interactive, where we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle,Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/wordbraingame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!
summary: - # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -
title: Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration

Great time killer, I mostly played it when ever im BORED and it kills the boredom I have
This game is easy and fun to play. It's very relaxing but can get a little boring after awhile

description: Traffic Racer is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards. Endless racing is now redefined! KEY FEATURES- Stunning 3D graphics- Smooth and realistic car handling- 35+ different cars to choose from- 5 detailed environments: suburb, desert, snowy, rainy and city night- 5 game modes: Endless, Two-Way, Time Trial, Police Chase and Free Ride- Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.- Basic customization through paint and wheels- Online Leaderboards and Achievements GAMEPLAY- Tilt or Touch to steer- Touch gas button to accelerate- Touch brake button to slow down TIPS- The faster you drive the more scores you get- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash Traffic Racer will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game. FOLLOW US* http://facebook.com/trafficracergame* http://twitter.com/TrafficRacer* https://plus.google.com/115863800042796476976/
descriptionHTML:
Traffic Racer is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards. Endless racing is now redefined!

KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- 35+ different cars to choose from
- 5 detailed environments: suburb, desert, snowy, rainy and city night
- 5 game modes: Endless, Two-Way, Time Trial, Police Chase and Free Ride
- Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
- Basic customization through paint and wheels
- Online Leaderboards and Achievements

GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

TIPS
- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash

Traffic Racer will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

FOLLOW US
* http://facebook.com/trafficracergame
* http://twitter.com/TrafficRacer
* https://plus.google.com/115863800042796476976/

recentChanges: - Added a new car
- Increased money income around 25%
- Bug fixes and improvements
summary: The Next-Gen of Endless Arcade Racing
title: Traffic Racer

NEW: They have indeed fixed the ad problem. The new UI leaves a bit to be desired, but overall it does exactly what its supposed to do. Its Minesweeper. They successfully didn't screw it up. Prettier graphics than a lot of Minesweeper games on Android.  I am leaving the old review as a warning though. While they backed off this time, the fact the developer thought it was ever a good idea is questionable at best. But as it stands, highly recommend this game.  OLD: Was great. Then they introduced twenty second forced video ads.

descriptionHTML:
Classic Minesweeper game for your Android (also known as Mines). Exercise your strategic and logical thinking while having fun along the way! The goal is to uncover all cells that are not containing mines.

TIP: Use volume buttons to toggle mode Open cell/Put flag

Main features:
• Online highscores
• Large scrollable and zoomable game area
• Nice, clean and easy to use interface

Paid version is also available. See Minesweeper Professional. Advantages:
• No ads!
• Board Difficulty Control (3BV)
• Countdown timer
• Zoom tuning

German translation by CaBi Translation

Please feel free to contact me by email.

comments: Overall, the game is pretty cool. But, I feel much more can be added though. Great game. Just more needs to be added. It's a great app I wish the devs could make like, Sandbox modes where you can build your own... Em... Coasters? I dunno. You had to verify them first. Annnd in order to verify them you had to complete them yourself. Then you could publish them. And maybe a two player mode? Not sure how that's gonna work out. That's all that could be added. Most of all. 3 and a half out of 5 stars.

The only way to play online is Facebook and Google play! First, you can make a 3rd option for an in-game name, like in Clash Of Clans,  and make the Google play account optional if you don't want to download Google play (not meaning that Google play is bad). Many people can not even think of any name that is not already taken in Google play (including me). It still is a good game,just it needs some more work.

Don't get me wrong, it's amazing and seems to be fun, but there's one thing that ruins it all. Whenever I open the game, everything shifts to the right quite a bit, so I can't see about one fifth of the screen, which doesn't allow me to use the button control setup, and some other things. Would love to see this get fixed, as the game has some nice potential.

Love this game for the cool clip art graphics with all the chaos. Relly funny when they crash. Lol i just dont like the constant ads gou have to watcg when ever you have to open a prize chest and when you win. I mean you win and then you gotta watch a clip for 30 secs, then it feels like you lose. Lol

Its a fun game where you actually get rewarded for watching ads. Multiplayer is a little laggy but its a fun game over all. Only thing i would like to see is the aftermath after your character either dies or falls out of the vehicle (level automatically resets after about a second after you die). Maybe even move around like you can in happy wheels, even if its just in single player mode. But overall a good game.

Thankyou gor being creative i wish you add more challenge : crash crush. That is like just crush using vlad and rufus (example) and then crush make them crush so who is the winner. Using that game we can know who is the stronger

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

It's a fun game and I'm enjoying it. However, I've come from Hungary Shark Evolution and find that the tilt controls in World are vastly inferior to Evolution. Is there a way they can be made more effective? As it stands, I actually have to bend over just to get my shark to swim to the surface. Not fun at all.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

descriptionHTML:
The year is 3666. The Earth's Empire extends over hundreds of worlds. Peace is kept by the mighty star fleet and the secret Order of the Keepers. You are in command of a strong team of Keepers and mercenaries tasked to fight invaders and recover fragments of a powerful weapon scattered across the galaxy.

Galaxy Rangers is a brand new online strategy game that drops you in the heat of battle and let’s you decide on combat tactics and battle formations. Build a powerful army with hundreds of units and dive into the heat of battle!

FEATURES:
● TACTICS AND FORMATIONS - Devise unique tactics and create destructive combat formations.
● ACTION-PACKED BATTLES - Watch your tactics play out and trigger special skills in intense battles.
● A POWERFUL ARMY AT YOUR ORDERS - Unlock and upgrade units to create a powerful battle force.
● EXPLORE THE GALAXY - Complete missions to discover new worlds, defeat alien bosses and progress in the story.
● ENGAGE IN ONLINE BATTLES - Challenge other players in 1on1 destructive battles.
● JOIN CORPORATIONS - Unite forces with friends in corporations to rule the galaxy.

comments: Disappointed. Now unable to view the ads that grant rewards, so I'm stuck without gems. That's NOT relaxing!  Please fix for 5 star rating. Otherwise, the game is very nice.   Update : seems to have been quickly fixed! Keeping my word and rating 5*. Great Zen idle "game", and simple yet lovely animated creatures + beautiful effects.

This game is as advised relaxing and even uplifting, though the pop up support message vanishing before I can read it kinda sucks but I have dislexea so I read slow. Other thing sometimes I tap wall I watch to and the game has said some kinda strange things, " I wish I could talk to you" for one and " are you ok" for another.

This game is amazing, it really helps with stress, anxiety and just any and all negative emotions. With its calm, relaxing music and adorible graphics, this well thought out game is the perfect way to releave stress. I really recommend downloading this game, trust me, you'll love it!!!üòÅ

Very relaxing. I fell asleep playing this game. Though it's a bit addictive, so I don't like playing during the day. Another problem is that saving and loading the game between devices from the cloud are a bit confusing. There is no explanation and I haven't gotten it to work.

PLEASE DON'T IGNORE...I need help, there appears to be a glitched achievement and it's driving me insane. I wish not to be intrusive  about it but my Ocd's  preventing me from continuing on thinking I will not be getting the other achievements. It's the Disiplined V, which is the 4000 for the virtues, I unlocked the virtue but not the achievement . I even reset my oasis twice and nothing

Honestly I am quite disgusted at how many 1 star ratings there are. I agree it's boring, HOWEVER, only in some cases. I don't play for fun like I guess what most of the 1 star ratings are for. Its not meant to be played for fun but meant to try to calm down or relieve stress for anyone playing it. If you're playing for the sake of fun then yes it will be boring. DO NOT download this game if you are seeking something to entertain you. It is boring for me when I play like that. However if you play to try to find a way to calm yourself down, say you need something to distract you, it will really work. The game really works for me when I am in a mental breakdown or feeling extremely suicidal. Playing My Oasis in those state of minds has helped me to calm down instead of acting on suicidal thoughts. This game has also helped my older brother when he has a breakdowns as well because of his depression. This game IS a tap game but it is not pointless if you play the game for the reason you're supposed to play it for, which is to relax/calm down.

comments: This is the most addictive flight simulator I have ever played. The game is fairly easy to progress through without having to spend any money. If I had to find one fault it would be that you can't reverse when on a runway which means some times you have no option but to crash your plane as there is very little room to turn around.

So I love the app but in free mode it will let you play.missions.. In a couple of the missions I have noticed it has given me 200 passengers to bring to a airplane boat (forgot what its called) and you cannot land a plane big enough for 200 passengers on it! No room to land without the wing getting clipped off by the tower and no place to take off from it! Other than that it is an awesome game

I've been losing sleep for days now playing this incredible game. Hahaha! Great graphics, smooth controls, realistic sounds, and easy-to-navigate interface. It doesn't force users to pay real money to fully enjoy and access the game. I wish the game offers a first-person mode where you get to play inside the cockpit and navigate the aircraft. That would be so much extra fun! Hats off to the team behind the game's development! :)

Pretty cool app. I'd like it more the planes/jets could be personalized with personal/or existing airline company names and if you could play commercial type flying modes. All without having to level up or earn money or pay real money for. Like a free fly mode. Oh,oh... and that there was real life situations that happen as a result of no fly zones and stuff. Otherwise it's pretty cool so far.

A really good game to play if your board and have nothing to do. Its proberly one of the best flight simulators on mobile devices ive ever played. The graphics are acctually really good for a mobile game that runs smoothly. The controles can somtimes be wonky but youll get used to it. I love to play this game i really enjoy. The best thing about it is that, its FREE! Good job 'fun games for free' üëèüëåüñí‚ò∫

Was able to start playing right away because of the level of simplicity and yet you have to learn so you can challenge yourself in the more advanced campaigns that soon come up. The game will leave you finding out that a couple of hours has passed in a blink of an eye because of the fun you're having. I really just started the game so I will come back and update this in a few months as I advance in the game.

comments: Amazing game, great time-killer. I discovered a game breaker: if you go into the settings after you die, the number of coins you got in that level, [the number in the brackets] becomes equal to the total number of coins. Keep going back and forth into the settings, and the game will eventually ask if you want to triple the coins by watching a video. Instead of tripling the number of coins you got in that level, the number of total coins you have gets tripled.  Instantly triple your wallet every run.  I want the devs to see this and see if they can patch it because I really like this game and I want the coins I earn to be legit.  Thanks for your time, Mike C.

It has a progression system, but it's completely worthless. The only reason to try to win belts is to get weapons that serve no purpose. You can win most of them by paying 200 coins and getting a random one, but you can, for some odd reason, get duplicates. Not to mention the fact that coin combos actually do nothing, not even useless cosmetic items, nothing. I think adding function to the weapons (e.g. Making long swords slightly longer range or making small weapons quicker) could add more depth and more of a reason to play the game. Overall: It's a good timekiller.

Great game. Best for killing time. Great concept. Need to add a  counter for counting the number of people killed, otherwise awesome. Also there is not much incentive to play to win belts. Make playing with boss again free. Add new opponents (not bosses but the minions) . Make the game a little less challenging. Also remove the brief stun completely

Good game. Though it could be better. Make range on weapons and protection when you have armor on. Then you should be able to unlock new settings besides the train. Multiplayer would be cool. Another (and the last) thing you could implement is a way for you to go back and beat the bosses you defeated already to earn money. Despite all the flaws I've stated, it's a good game and time killer.

Really fun game. Nice graphics and simple controls. More depth to combat system would be nice. There is no point in achieving coin combos. It does not affect the amount of coins won. Add a multiplier for coin combos, as well as a score multiplier for chaining combos together without missing enemies or coins. Don't allow duplicate items to be won. Very annoying to grind and grind for coins, only to get a duplicate you can't do anything with. Lastly, an option to pay to disable ads would be nice.

The game gives you an unskippable mission to get kills with a certain type of weapon and then will never give you that weapon. I've opened over 100 chests and never got a two handed sword, so my options are pay real money for the the weapon (what they want) or delete this cancer app. I get you have to make money but there are better ways than stopping all progression and ruining the fun. Overall good game 6.7/10

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

comments: I love this game and would have rated it a 5 but suddenly the pause feature isn't working and I lost a game that was over 8000 points because I had a phone call. After I unpaused it set me back to zero. So aggravating. Also the 30 second ad for 30 stars doesn't show up anymore. Not sure what happened to this game in the last 2 weeks.

This used to be an awesome game. I played it every day! But after the latest update, the ads at the top cause the game to lag terribly and make the ball fall very slowly and the pieces disappear slowly.  I can't adjust as needed due to the lag. I'm unable to play due to this lag. Interestingly enough, when I turn on Airplane Mode thereby disabling the ads across the top, everything runs smoothly like it used to!! I am all for ads to support the developers  but this type they currently have causes severe lag which has rendered the game useless.

I have paid ¬£2.99 to remove ads and in still getting them. I emailed the developer two weeks ago and have still not had a response. You are forced to watch ads so often the game becomes unplayable and paying the money to remove them does not work. Save your time and do not bother even installing it. If you do install it do not pay the money to remove ads as it does not work!!!

Good concept. Too bad the ads ruin the calibration. Either the ad loads and is in the way or it doesn't load and shifts the page. This second issue is the worst of the two. This completely ruins the calibration and forces you to touch above or below the tile you want to remove. Often times leading you to remove tiles you don't want to

Sadly, it could've been a fun game if I could actually tap where I wanted to. The tap is off by like a few mm or something. I have to tap above the try again button to actually try again, or else I end up hitting challenges... So during the game play the exact same thing would happen, which makes the game unplayable.

There are way too many advertisements every time I start a game or lose or win a game I instantly get an 30 second ad which I have to waste my time on to skip it until I am finally done. Overall except for the advertisements it is a great game controls and game play is brilliant I recommend this game but you will get a lot of ads. Suggestion: Lower the amount of ads showen
description: Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points.  You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you‚Äôll find it‚Äôs not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower  or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it‚Äôs game over and you have to start all over again.  Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games‚Äô hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.Key Features‚óè    Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay‚óè    Challenge your friend‚Äôs high scores, challenge the world.‚óè    Fun and engaging graphics.‚óè    Engaging and addictive.‚óè    Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
descriptionHTML:
Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.

In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points. You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.

It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you’ll find it’s not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it’s game over and you have to start all over again.

Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games’ hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.

Key Features
● Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
● Challenge your friend’s high scores, challenge the world.
● Fun and engaging graphics.
● Engaging and addictive.
● Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - Minor bug fixes.
summary: Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play
title: Six!

comments: The puzzles are fun, but... I like these puzzles very much, but I have one minor quibble and one major complaint preventing me from giving this app a five-star rating. The quibble - the  language used in "do you want to quit yes/no" splash is Danish. Surely if you can offer puzzles in two languages, you can make the language in the exit splash match the language selected in Settings. The complaint - the ads are very intrusive. Forcing me to close a full screen ad every time I complete a puzzle is very user-unfriendly. If you must force ads on us, at least display them only on the bottom of the screen. Even better, offer a premium version/in-app purchase to eliminate the ads.

comments: I absolutely love this game & all criminal case games... we need more energy faster...
It is a fun game & can be challenging.  I like to be as speedy as i can against the clock.
It's a great game. You're not bombarded with ads and energy refills at a nice pace.
Good games

This is all I needed: another Criminal Case game to take up my free time! I love the whole four of them. The the hidden objects tease my brain to no end. Each game  is intriguing with an original story line. I do have my favorite crime scenes,  and plenty of friends(all over the world) whom play as often as they can too!

It would be nice if you level up and get full energy but your energy had some if not all left before you got it restored that you just increased by the full amount, the way it is now I lose energy when levelling up because it doesnt add any more to the 110 that is standard. I dont think it is fair to those of us who play daily. I never know when my pet will find that last batch of XP and cause the level up to happen. If I am over the 110 already, I don't even see the new energy. Some concessions need to be made for this. I love the game though, it is fun and challenging.

Go back to the 19th century and solve a series of murders in this captivating hidden object adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?

description: The Moneyville game was originally launched in 2008 and is now available as app in the following languages:Danish ‚Äì PengebyNorwegian ‚Äì PengebySwedish ‚Äì PenningborgFinnish ‚Äì RahalaaksoEstonian ‚Äì RahamaaLithuanian ‚Äì PinigƒónaiUK / Irish - MoneyvilleMoneyville is a free, educational game for children between the ages of 5-9, but children both younger and older will also enjoy exploring Moneyville.Through games, play and activity your child will learn what money is and what its value means. He or she will also be introduced to the difference between income and expenses ‚Äì to earn money and to spend money.There is a lot for your child to discover in Moneyville:- Your child will have his or her first chance to earn money at the city gates, which need to be painted.- They can also earn money at the apple stall or at the post office. - They can help the farmer feed his animals and learn about basic mathematics. - And they can use the money they earn on all kinds of fun things in Penny‚Äôs shop or travel back in time in the time machine. Moneyville gives you as a parent or teacher an easy, entertaining and alternative way to talk to your child or student about money.Moneyville has been developed in collaboration with leading experts from four different fields relevant to e-learning, including media experts, child psychologists, representatives from teaching organisations and online media experts.Moneyville is developed by Danske Bank and is a part of Danske Bank‚Äôs Financial Literacy Program. The basis of the program is a belief that a higher level of financial literacy and education not only enriches the life of the individual but also contributes to healthy economic growth in the society. The Financial Literacy Program targets children, young people, parents and teachers with the aim of preparing the ground for a healthy financial start to adult life. Since the launch of Moneyville in 2008, Danske Bank has expanded the Financial Literacy Program with several initiatives for the 5-27-year-olds including Control Your Money, an interactive website aimed at 10-15 year olds, Dream On, a social game for the 15-17 year-olds, Mind Your Money, an advisory website for young people and "0-18", a website for parents about children and money.The Moneyville app is free and requires no involvement with or association to Danske Bank. In addition, the Moneyville universe is entirely free of marketing, logos, colour schemes and the like that could be associated with the Danske Bank Group.Welcome to Moneyville!
descriptionHTML:
The Moneyville game was originally launched in 2008 and is now available as app in the following languages:
Danish – Pengeby
Norwegian – Pengeby
Swedish – Penningborg
Finnish – Rahalaakso
Estonian – Rahamaa
Lithuanian – Pinigėnai
UK / Irish - Moneyville

Moneyville is a free, educational game for children between the ages of 5-9, but children both younger and older will also enjoy exploring Moneyville.

Through games, play and activity your child will learn what money is and what its value means. He or she will also be introduced to the difference between income and expenses – to earn money and to spend money.

There is a lot for your child to discover in Moneyville:
- Your child will have his or her first chance to earn money at the city gates, which need to be painted.
- They can also earn money at the apple stall or at the post office.
- They can help the farmer feed his animals and learn about basic mathematics.
- And they can use the money they earn on all kinds of fun things in Penny’s shop or travel back in time in the time machine.

Moneyville gives you as a parent or teacher an easy, entertaining and alternative way to talk to your child or student about money.

Moneyville has been developed in collaboration with leading experts from four different fields relevant to e-learning, including media experts, child psychologists, representatives from teaching organisations and online media experts.

Moneyville is developed by Danske Bank and is a part of Danske Bank’s Financial Literacy Program. The basis of the program is a belief that a higher level of financial literacy and education not only enriches the life of the individual but also contributes to healthy economic growth in the society. The Financial Literacy Program targets children, young people, parents and teachers with the aim of preparing the ground for a healthy financial start to adult life.

Since the launch of Moneyville in 2008, Danske Bank has expanded the Financial Literacy Program with several initiatives for the 5-27-year-olds including Control Your Money, an interactive website aimed at 10-15 year olds, Dream On, a social game for the 15-17 year-olds, Mind Your Money, an advisory website for young people and "0-18", a website for parents about children and money.

The Moneyville app is free and requires no involvement with or association to Danske Bank. In addition, the Moneyville universe is entirely free of marketing, logos, colour schemes and the like that could be associated with the Danske Bank Group.

Welcome to Moneyville!
summary: Moneyville is a free, educational game for children between the ages of 5-9
title: Moneyville

comments: Awesome game. Good graphics, great sound and music, intricate leveling up system and character build, easy controls, variety in enemies, lots of replay value, lots of gear to find, and doesn't take much data space. Reminds me of a Diablo type game. The developer's really do deserve a lot of praise for creating such a quality game and not making it a p2w. This is an example of doing it right. I can tell that a lot of thought and care was put into it. Absolutely brilliant. I can't praise enough. A rare gem on the play store, and completely free. Just awesome. 6 out of 5 rating. Thank you so much for such a great game.:) Edit: Thanks for the update. You guys rock.

Greetings Making Fun,  Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love this game. It's entertaining, challenging and addictive. The storyline is engrossing and the graphics are spectacular as well. You can easily tell how addictive a game is by the amount of time you spend playing it at a stretch. Let me just say that I've been playing this game ever since I installed it. Whenever I sit down with my device, I start playing it and I keep on playing for at least two hours before I divert my attention to other matters. It's a really lovely and delightful game. Making Fun seems like the most suitable title of the developers because they've made something that is really a lot of fun. Well done. I highly recommend this game. DOWNLOAD IT TODAY.

Good looking game plays very smoothly. Fun to play and not too hard or too easy. Nice little details like the way your hero talks and has other party members. These things help make the single player game seem less lonely. I don't know if I am going to hit a pay wall or loose interest. The story is engaging enough. I just don't give out 5 star reviews.

The gameplay is the best ive seen for an android RPG Diablo type game. Slick graphics, awesome sound track and effects, no slowdown and you can play offline!! Absolutely love the game. Only down side is the worry of repetitivness of the game but i guess only time will tell

Incredible game. Very intuitive and unique with the swipe to cast system. The graphics are quite nice and the amount of memory the game uses is very acceptable for the quality you get. Music is very relaxing and well done. Level and NPC design are great, really feel like I'm playing an old school medieval RPG. Absolutely 0 need to buy gems, the game gives them to you for just killing normal monsters. My only gripe would be to maybe add a fourth class? If not more in future updates. Otherwise, fantastic game, well put together, well written story, great opening scene and whoever did that voice over should be looking to do more! Thank you for making a true RPG for true RPG fans, keep it up!

It had been almost 3 years since the last time I gamed. I looked at a couple games throughout that period of time, neither really jumped out at me. I tip my hat to the creators of a game that literally brought me back from the brink, no interest whatsoever in gaming. Absolutely love game. I look forward to seeing more of your work in the near future.

The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it‚Äôs also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game‚Äôs main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor‚Äôs sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
descriptionHTML:
Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.

Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.

With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.

Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.

The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.

Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.

As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.

Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.

Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.

Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.

Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.

Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.

Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.

Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.

Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.

Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.

Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.

Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.

Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.

Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
developerAddress:
Making Fun, Inc.
4096 Piedmont Ave Ste 944
Oakland, CA 94611
recentChanges: Various bug-fixing.
summary: A tribute to classic RPGs, made with passion, not greed, by old-school gamers.
title: Eternium
